Reviews.Content: I have purchased this TV after extensive research comparing wirh Sony. This TV outperformed in every angle. Overall very satisfied with the TV. Highly recommmended

Reviews.Title: Lovely, thank you Amazon & Samsung !
Reviews.Author: D. N. Liawidjaja "doglover"
Reviews.Content: I can't say too much but Samsung & Amazon just made my happy end of the year 2008. Owned the previous model, same size, for the living room, we love it so much, never have any problem. When Amazon had this promotion Thanksgiving deals $150off if bought together with blu-ray player, plus no interest for 24 months, I just can't stop myself to buy this TV for my bedroom. I've been waiting for a while until I've got this great deal. I like the red touch of color, looked exclusive hanging on the wall, pretty ! The Tv itself worked just great after 1 month used, couldn't find something better, blu-ray movies's pictures just perfect, regular DVD movies's pictures looked sharper with this TV & blu-ray player, our HDTV dish programmes (1080i) is just so clear...I read some of negative reviews about the delivery, I'm sorry but ours just great, very on time and they performed everything that Amazon described about white glove thing...and since we used the TV with home theater, so I've got no complaint about the speakers. After all, this is the best product that I've bougt on year 2008. Thank you Amazon & Samsung for make all of this happened !!!

Reviews.Title: Thank you Samsung and Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Mona Lisa
Reviews.Content: I can confirm what so many others have had to say about this TV. As near to perfection as I think any TV can be! Okay, the sound isn't the greatest. But we did use just the tv sound for about 3 days and it was quite acceptable until we bought and hooked up a Sony HT-C100 (Walmart $256) soundbar system. We aren't audiophiles, but the TV does lack a little if you want that theater experience. And as most on here and other review sites have already mentioned, most of us who are buying a TV of this caliber won't mind investing a few hundred more for a sound boost.The capabilities of this set are truly amazing. But keep in mind that source is paramount. We have watched blu-ray (got the Samsung player offered with this for $150 off) and you just can't imagine how incredible it is. We have a Dish 622 DVR and most HD programming is outstanding. Not all HD is created equal though, but you can expect this set to provide you with the best picture your source has to offer. We have played around some with the various picture settings and it is great to have so many options to tweak to your own personal likes and dislikes. Maybe a better picture could be obtained with a calibration dvd or a professional but I can't imagine getting it much better than you could yourself. It's already that good. And I have had our bedroom tv (Samsung 42" dlp) and our former living room tv (Panasonic 47" HD rear projection) calibrated professionally. It did help both of those sets. But this one is far superior without calibration than either of those afterward.I would also like to comment on Amazon as a seller. The morning after I placed the order, the price dropped $100. Because the tv had not been shipped (that is now their policy), they gave me the credit. However, when I had placed the order, the blu-ray offer was for $200 off making the player "free". By the time the tv shipped, the blu-ray offer was only $150 off and that was changed on my order summary to reflect that. All of this is just very minor, but I thought it might be useful to anyone who finds themselves in a similar situation. Bottom line is we got the tv and blue-ray for less than I could find for just the tv by itself anywhere else. And of course, no tax, no shipping charge. Our order was placed on Friday, received the blu-ray on Monday! Pilot was prepared to deliver the tv on Thursday but we delayed it until the following Tuesday as we were having our new stand delivered on Monday.Speaking of shipping, I cannot for the life of me understand why some on here feel compelled not to give this tv a true review because they might not have had a perfect shipping experience. These are, after all, "PRODUCT" reviews. I was one of the majority of customers who had a perfect shipping experience with Pilot. The only thing that was left off was they could not start up the set because of the extremely low temperature here at the time of delivery. Not worth damaging the set over. Obviously, they could not sit around for an hour or more waiting for the set to warm to a safe temperature. That is just pure professionalism as far as I'm concerned. They were very prompt, courteous, even going so far as to help my husband carry our humongous old set out to his shop because we had no one around to help us with that. We did give them a nice tip which they tried to refuse.If anyone has an issue with their delivery, they should take it up with Amazon, not take stars away from this outstanding product. One other suggestion is to verify with the delivery company when they call exactly what you expect. Just don't wait until afterward and then slam the review. And besides, the shipping is free after all.I will parrot what so many others have said: Buy it. You will be thrilled!

Reviews.Title: Worth Searching For
Reviews.Author: J. luhrs "Dave Luhrs"
Reviews.Content: I looked and looked at all the options and finally decided to go with the LN52A650. The reason came down to one simple thing (beyond all the positive reviews). I went and looked at Best Buy, AV Discount, Circuit City etc. and in every case the Picture on the Samsung looked better to me than any of the others. Forget the technical specs, response times, setting options, etc. What it comes down to is what looks best to you, and that was teh Samsung, hands down. Been watching it now with Digital Comcast HD and the picture is fantastic. Regular network programming HD channels are out of this world. I am coming from a regular picture tube TV so the Discovery channel, Survivor, even CSI are unbelievable. It even makes the Warriors look good and the Sharks are off the charts. The Niners are another story. The sound is NOT a problem despite the reports and I was afraid of that. The delivery was great and not tax and no shipping costs were another plus from amazon. I am not even worried that is it now about almost $100 cheaper. it was worth getting it sooner. I went with the cheap HDMI cables from Amazon (about $1.50) and they only carry 60mhz but you can see it vs COAX. I recommend them. I also got monster power cleaner / protection for Surge protection and coax Cable cleaner(only $20 online). The cable guy told me it is a scam and not necessary, all home circuits are already grounded but for $20 I now have $100,000 warranty against damage. He thought I paid the $100+ they sell for in the store said A surge protector is a good idea and with a half dozen power cords you need something anyway.I highly recommend this TV to anyone.My only complaint is the loud signal it puts out when you turn it on and off.... Must be some way to disable that.Can't wait to see the Giants next season on it.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: P. Mann
Reviews.Content: Can't beat amazon on the price and the TV is HOTTT!  The settings right out of the box were great, the setup for other stuff is very straightforward.  I'm lovin it...the football games in HD, man, what a sight.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 White glove
Reviews.Author: Henry S. Galaska
Reviews.Content: We live in a small town, 130 miles from the drop off point. The first two times the company tried to deliver, they could not find the address. It was finally delivered on the third try. White glove? Forget it. They had no idea what I was talking about. They put the unit inside the front door and left.I connected the unit and it worked fine for the first 4 or 5 hours then it went from HDMI to TV and started to hunt for a signal channel. Called the company and they sent out a repairman (94 miles one way). Changed two large boards the first trip out and a small board the second trip out. That fixed it. The company was great to deal with and stayed with the problem untit it was fixed including replaceing the TV if necessary. The unit has worked great ever since and we are happy with the picture and sound. Aside from the initial problem,I can find no faults with the TV or company.HankRuidoso, NM

Reviews.Title: A Product as Good as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Charles B. Rose
Reviews.Content: We have had this TV for several months and it still seems as good as the reviews that prompted us to buy it. The delivery was a little problematic as the delivery company sent a single 68 year old person with the unit - which is quite large with the shipping material. We were finally able to get it inside,removed from the box and set up and it has worked flawlessly since. I will have no hesitation about ordering large(and fragile)items from Amazon in the future.

Reviews.Title: Samsung ln52a650 review
Reviews.Author: E. Martin
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this tv and would highly recommend it to anyone, however you should ignore the part about "white Glove" delivery service. I had one delivery person(not two as stated) and had to help him get the box into my house and was left to unpack and get rid of the box.

Reviews.Title: Screech
Reviews.Author: Screech
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item online after MUCH review/comparison shopping.  I promise that you will be amazed by the picture quality!!!!!!!  Delivery was excellent.  They brought it around back of home and thru walk out basement, unpacked it, and plugged it in for me.  All we had to do was turn it on but waited since it was 18 degrees outside and TV needed to "warm up" before turning it on.  We also purchased BD P2500 Blu Ray and you cannot believe the picture quality!  Beautiful TV with slight red surround TV frame ~ adds a nice touch that screams "class".  My husband does not want to leave his "man cave".  Negatives:  TV was good deal when I bought it.  Went down another $200+ dollars within 7 days of me receiving it.  Amazon no longer provides sale price credit so basically what you pay for it when you buy it is it.  They state they have "changed their policy regarding credits" and refuse to budge on this which leaves this customer with bad taste for ordering anything else from Amazon as this rule applies to ALL ITEMS they sale.  So, do your homework in price.  This TV has gone from base of 2699. to 2059 to 1840.72 as of today.....quite a difference in price! Love the 52" 650 and swivel base feature and this TV is rated # 1 on several computer sites for a reason.  Nothing compares to this TV and I strongly recommend it for anyone thinking about buying a 52" Samsung....just watch for best price :)

Reviews.Title: Great Television - Great Customer Service by Amazon!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Barz "Master Amazon Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this set from Amazon and received it very quickly.  The shipper - Pilot - sent one person to deliver the tv, first thing in the morning, and did not take away the packaging, which was part of the white glove service offered by Amazon.  That turned out to be a good thing.  Exactly 7 days after receiving the set the problems began, starting with the sound, which would go to zero by itself, constantly.  When viewing a dvd the sound "slide" would show on the screen and would "ping" constantly.  Gradually I couldn't shut off the set and had to unplug it.  I contacted Samsung, who sent an email to a service shop 45 minutes away and in another state, then contacted Amazon.  AMAZON WAS WONDERFUL!  Samsung was not.  The first service shop never contacted me ... no, correct that, they contacted me 2 weeks later.  After much pestering, Samsung contacted another service shop, now 15 minutes away and in the same state.  They didn't contact me either - ever.  After emailing Amazon each day - and promptly receiving a response - they agreed to replace the set.  I kept watch of the shipping status and, when I found it had arrived at Pilot, I called regarding setting up a delivery.  They advised that they now had a third party delivering the set.  That afternoon they called and set up a delivery time for the next morning.  They arrived on time - and this time there were three delivery men instead of the 1 Pilot sent.  Additionally, since it was the first thing in the morning, and being New England and very cold, the set-up man advised that they couldn't test the set as it was unadvisable to turn it on.  When queried, they advised that since it was under 50 Degrees (it was probably around 25 outside) and the set was obviously cold (you could condensation around the edge of the screen), it was unsafe to turn it on until it had warmed to room temperature.  Smart man!  I believe this is what ultimately fried the circuits on the first set.  We waited until afternoon and turned on the set.  It worked just as the first had - beautifully.  16 Days later there are no problems with the set, except one slighly frustrating problem.  When turned on early in the morning the sound can be intermittent.  I found if you turned the set off, counted to 10 and turned it back on, it was fine.  When turned on later in the day there isn't a problem.  Is it annoying?  Can be, but the overall joy with this set is more than worth it.  Watching blu-ray dvds is totally awesome.  For that matter, watching anything on this set is a joy.  Also, the tv sits about 16 feet from the picture window in our living room, which has morning sun.  While you can see a reflection, we found it not to be a problem at all.  Very surprising - our last set was a very good Sony and the reflection issue created a problem in viewing tv during the day.  Would I recommend this model?  As a very annoying governor from one of our northern states would say, 'you betcha'!

Reviews.Title: Entirely Pleased
Reviews.Author: LokiDucks
Reviews.Content: As a person that takes literally months of time trying to decide the best purchase for his money, this one really should have been a no-brainer.Just about everything about this television is fantastic. The picture is crisp and clear. And even the built-in speakers sound great.The only negative mark I'd give this TV is actually its remote control. It's not great. The click wheel is difficult/annoying to use. And it's not programmable, so it can't be made to work with my Comcast cable box.But overall, this was a purchase I'm completely satisfied with and would recommend it to anyone looking for a TV of great quality at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Soeren Ahrens
Reviews.Content: This TV is simply great. it replaced a Sony 40" 1080p XBR LCD - and I have to say that this Samsung's picture is quite a bit better (of course the screen is also a lot larger). the reflective screen is not a problem - I have it in a room with a lot of windows. Picture is amazing with both HDTV (Dish Network) and Bluray (Samsung BDP1500). SDTV and regular DVD is also good. This TV is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Shazam!
Reviews.Author: Richard Waltman
Reviews.Content: Delivered as advertised. Perfect condition. Easy installation. Beautiful picture.

Reviews.Title: The reviews are TRUE!
Reviews.Author: JON G. MEYER
Reviews.Content: I initially received a unit with a stuck pixel.  Can happen to any display I guess.  Amazon took immediate action in getting it exchanged.  No biggy in my opinion.  Now have the replacement hooked up and I can't tell you enough how outstanding this LCD TV performs.  From the black levels to the phenomenal color.  Very vibrant display!  I have a PS3, Wii, and HD Directv connected.  Both games and Bluray look sweet in all their 1080P glory (HDMI).  The Wii looks great as well even with component connectivity.  THe 120Hz really does what it is intended to do, not just a phony feature to sell the unit.  One thing I will stress is the importance of turning this feature OFF when wathing movies and television shows.  If left on, it's like watching the making of the show through a window rather than giving that cinematic look.  Hard to explain until you see it for yourself.  If watching sports or anything meant to be viewed in a realistic setting, turn the 120Hz ON.  I found the factory settings seem to be the best.  Again, the only setting I feel needs to be changed is the 120Hz, depending on what yu are watching.  I see alot of comments on the reflective screen.  As my tv is in the basement with minimal outside lighting, I don't have this issue.  Hope this helps all folks seriously looking at this unit and hope you enjoy it as much as I.

Reviews.Title: Rock Solid
Reviews.Author: LD
Reviews.Content: Great t.v.!  Amazon's service was right on the mark and the Samsung's performance lives up to all the positive reviews. The red Touch Of Color is fantastic. It's subtle, but as I look at it now, I'm very happy it's not just plain old black. It took awhile to figure out how to utilize the Film Mode and I messed around with the Hz. settings to keep it from looking "too digital", but it's all set now and the Samsung does not disappoint. Best tv for the money by far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bones
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV in November, 2008.  No problems with ordering.  Delivery went very smooth.  White glove delivery worked great.  Delivery guys set up TV.  However, in our part of the country, it is cold in November, so I wanted to wait until TV warmed to room temperature to fire it up.  No problems.  TV is excellent.  Had been investigating this TV for a while.  This was my choice because of the 50,000:1 contract ratio & 4ms response time.  With the price drop and 2 year no interest financing, figured it was time to make the move.  This is my third Samsung and won't buy anything else as they have the best picture.  Go into any electronics store and compare side by side.  Samsung blows away all others. Some other reviews have criticized the TOC.  It is so subtle that I can't imagine anyone complaining about it.  No problems with screen glare either.  If you are looking for a new TV, you won't be disappointed with the 650 series from Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding !!!!!
Reviews.Author: Wakeboarding Mom
Reviews.Content: First time purchasing with Amazon, very, very, pleased with the entire experience.  Saved a bundle of money on shipping costs,  and the product was far less than retail store competitors.  Friends & family can't believe the picture, just outstanding!  Recommend to anyone looking to score a beautiful LCD HDTV.  Personally love the Red Touch of Color, looks fabulous with our red mahogany furniture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Tuttle
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52a650 is a excellent television. The features are outstanding. The picture quality is excellent.I am very satified with this purchase. I would recomend this tv to anyone that is looking for agreat picture plus it only uses one third the power as plasma.

Reviews.Title: No Regrets!
Reviews.Author: R. Strohm
Reviews.Content: I purchased this HDTV a couple of weeks ago to replace my good but aging 6 year old 55" Mitsubishi rear projection HDTV.  I researched for about a month before deciding on this model.I debated between plasma and LCD.  Even though plasma technology has come a long way recently, I was still worried about the slight risk of image burn-in.  With LCD's, I was worried about lack of deep black levels that plasmas are best at.  I had also looked at plenty of both types in the stores and had the opinion that none of them matched the overall image quality of my CRT based rear projection TV.  Everything I looked at in the stores just seem to amplify any digital noise in the image.  Knowing that stores are probably the worst place to evaluate a set, I decide to trust the many good reviews I've read about this model and ordered it.After it arrived, I set it up next to my rear projection HDTV.  Wow!  What a difference between the two.  The LCD was much brighter and vivid then I had expected.  The other big difference was the LCD was viewable from every spot in the room.  The brightness and color stayed consistent at extreme angles.  The colors didn't shift or reverse like some cheaper LCD's when viewing from the side.I did notice that any noise and compression artifacts in the image were amplified more by the LCD, however, the set was still at it's default factory settings.  I then went into the menu and put all the settings to values I found on a forum that someone with the same model had fully calibrated.  I didn't know how their settings would look on my set but decided to give it a shot.  I was very pleased with the outcome.  Noise wise, the picture now looked a lot smoother and comparable to my old TV.Black levels are absolutely beautiful.  Best I have ever seen on an LCD.  Even in a dark room, the blacks are black.  With a completely black screen the backlight is just slightly noticeable.  In a lit room it's non-existent.  Also, the backlight was completely even.  I saw no light bleeding or hotspots from anywhere with this panel.I love the features and beautiful menus.  The glossy screen posed no problems what so ever.  When the TV is on, the image just seems to burn right though any reflections that were there before.No complaints with the quantity or type of inputs on this set.  My HD satellite DVR through HDMI looked great and my Xbox 360 with a VGA cable was also stunning in full 1080p!  Even SD content was much more tolerable to watch on this TV.Overall, I have no regrets with this purchase and would do it again!  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Bought USED -not a scratch!
Reviews.Author: D. J. Cobb
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV from the used warehouse deals section...to my relief, the tv was flawless.  The box was opened once, but the tv was never unpacked.  The only finger prints on it are mine.  The tv is almost too clear... and I underestimated how big it is.  My Old 32" Sony seems to be half the size.  My eyes are still trying to adjust to such a big, bright perfect picture.  My sitting area is about 7-10 feet away from the TV and I am contemplating sending this one back to get the 46 inch.  Even standard DVDs on a standard DVD player look amazing in 480p resolution.  Star Wars II was so clear, I could tell completely when I was viewing computer animation or actors in front of a blue screen. It almost seems unnatural.  The unit has buckets of great features, even packaging on the unit is genius.  The unit has really cool power saving modes which makes this a good "green" tv choice.  The tv settings menu is very fast, user friendly and easy to operate with on screen help guides.  So far I have zero complaints...can't wait to see what this thing can do with a blue-ray player.  Also, a note on HD satellite and cable programming. Not all HD channels are the same.  I have 3 ESPN HD channels, but only the Main ESPN channel has a high HD quality to it.  The other two channels, while they are better than the standard definition channels, they are are not as good as the 480p DVD or the main ESPN channel.  The content provider companies (cox, dish and direct TV) have to squeeze and compress some signals.  Without more band width, there is no way to add more true high definition channels with out compressing signals which results in, in my opinion, non HD content.  However, it still looks good!  If you don't get this TV before Christmas and want to get one cheaper, buy a used one that was returned after christmas!  I bought this one used for $1684 and it was flawless!

Reviews.Title: My Best Purchase on Amazon
Reviews.Author: ThomasB
Reviews.Content: I waited and researched every review I could find. The 5+ rating is correct. We couldn't believe the clarity and quality of the picture. It's got all the bells and whistles for adding additional components, plus the jacks to accommodate them. If you planning on using as a wall mount, be sure and buy a good mount. We researched that as well and got one that would handle the weight of this unit. This Samsung will make a great addition to any family.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" HD TV
Reviews.Author: Gary E. Gallimore
Reviews.Content: After seeing my friends tv ordered on line from Amazon I decided to order the same tv. Its a great tv with an excellent picture. The tv arrived on time and delivered without any problems. I highly reccomend this TV.GaryEads, Tn

Reviews.Title: Beautiful! at first
Reviews.Author: Ines P. Peery "inesp56"
Reviews.Content: After 1 year my opinion has changed.. the frame around picture is not right it apears to be coming loose up close to picture.. I have tried and tried to contact someone on this matter and no return emails. or anything. Soooo i am not happy with service of this product.. so would not recomend it to anyone or if you have it and have ANY kind of problem DO NOT WAIT CALL REPAIR NOW.....have had about 4 weeks.Received tv on day they said it would arrive. My first LCD HDTV and must say LOVE IT,color is great,so sharp. buy it. Now for delivery.One fellow delivered it and sure wasn't that friendly like I have read on here.I admit its not real heavy but it is large and should have been two people.The black around the picture was finely scratched. The tv its self is great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52in LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: G. Rich "Sandman"
Reviews.Content: I love the TV, and delivery was prompt and condition excellent.  The delivery man helped me bring it in, and set it up, then hauled away the  box,etc.  Amazon was very good about notifications as the order was being processed.  Very happy, I'll do this again with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: K. Hunter
Reviews.Content: I ordered my tv off of amazon on thursday night. i got a call on monday morning that it would be delivered later that afternoon. we unloaded the tv and set it up. it looked perfect! no scratches, no dings, everything was great! i was worried about broken pixels too, but i inspected every inch of the screen and i found nothing!i was a little worried buying from amazon bc it's not a brick and mortar store, but from all of the positive reviews, i decided to give it a try, and im glad i did. i saved $800 by buying it online. it feels like a sturdy, lasting tv (the spin wheel ipod wannabe selector is the only thing i could live without, but its a nice addition for something new).the tv is great. i did a lot of research before buying it and im sure glad i did buy this one. samsung is a very reputable brand that stands up there with sony in quality. im hoping that this being a higher end LCD it will give me many years of viewing pleasure.

Reviews.Title: You always feel great in picking a winner!
Reviews.Author: T. M. Caridi "TC"
Reviews.Content: I've had the LN52A650 for just over two months now and what can I say. It is absolutely the best price performing LCD on the market today (in my humble opinion) in the 52" class. Even Consumer Reports recognizes this model and I often use CR as a benchmark when making purchasing decisions.I waited well over a year for the technology to mature and for true market competition to bring HDTV's within my price range. After agonizing over the LCD vs. Plasma decision, I was gunning for the Sony 52" XBR4/XBR5. Needless to say, Amazon offered a terrific deal on this Samsung model plus free shipping. So I made several trips to Best Buy just to compare the various brands. It was pretty easy to walk away feeling that Samsung hit a home run with their ToC line and I did the deal through Amazon. I received the TV through a third-party shipping company (CEVA) in less than a week. Totally happy with Amazaon since they honored the 30-day post price guarantee and knocked off another $150!Now if you want a thorough technical review, you'll find plenty of knowledgeable people in these reviews. Do your research like I did. But just let me tell you that you will be in awe when you hook this up to your cable or satellite dish. I have Verizon FIOS and even standard defintion looks great, while HD is utterly breathtaking. I mistakenly bought into HD DVD (just like Betamax), but when I played the Bourne Identity, it was like we were right there on the set!I have it hooked up to my 5.1 Sony AV Home Theater system and I'm pretty delighted with the audio signal from Verizon FIOS. We only use the TV audio when I connect my camcorder for home movies, and it's sufficient.Friends and family alike will be impressed, not only with the beautiful, sharp images coming from the flat panel display, but with the overall packaging and ToC design. It is a beautiful piece to add to anyone's family room.I watch mostly sporting events and the Action Motion Plus feature does the job. I have noticed some blurred images, especially with soccer matches where the camera view is so wide that player detail is very small. I've watched golf, tennis, hockey, baseball, football, etc. and the picture is just fabulous.On the downside, my wife and I have become couch-potatoes...big time. I can't wait to add the Playstation 3, primarily for Blu-Ray and for some games.  My biggest problem now is finding time to get to the gym!

Reviews.Title: Best Price for a great TV!
Reviews.Author: Helena Pastrano "Kay"
Reviews.Content: This was my first ever purchase on-line, especially for something big like a TV. I had been scouting the best price for this TV for a few months.  Bit the bullet..got a fantastic deal..Circuit city admitted they couldn't beat! It was quickly delivered! Overall extremely happy with the experience. Wish my install had gone as smoothly!

Reviews.Title: Speechless
Reviews.Author: sambo
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but positive words to say about this TV.Picture is awesome.Delivery was without a hitch.Price beat out any retail outlet by a long shot.Very impressed with Samsung quality, would recommend this 650 Series over 550 Series because of picture quality. Do not hesitate on spending more for this series because it is worth the money.I almost purchased the 46 inch instead of the 52 inch. I installed the tv above my fireplace and am so glad that I went with the 52 instead.In closing I would have to tell everyone to purchase through Amazon.Honestly I was a little hesitant about purchasing online, but 5 stars to Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Picture and Service from Samsung
Reviews.Author: L. Schoonover
Reviews.Content: Fantastic Picture and Service from Samsung... simply stated, best purchase I have made in a LONG time and great price on Amazon. This tv is beautiful and has a great picture. The HD for sports is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: I researched this for awhile
Reviews.Author: M. Cashen "The MïC"
Reviews.Content: Bottom line: It's the best and I have no regrets.I researched it on ConsumerReports (CR) and numerous other websites prior to making this purchase; I figured if anyone would truly know which is the best LCD, CR would. This one was considered the best for its size. There is a claimed issue that there is some sort of loss of color and visibility at the wider viewing angles (its only at the extreme angles but that makes sense) and that there was too much glare; once again I fail to see this as an issue especially compared to some other brands and I have no problems. The non-HD channels don't appear that great (look what you're comparing it to though) but the movies and HD channels are awesome and that's with my cable company only being able to support the 1080i (no 1080p) format.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 52 TV
Reviews.Author: Benjamin R. Williams III "FF/EMT"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. I looked around at a bunch of different ones. I almost got the W series Sony. This one was cheaper and has a better picture. Buying from Amazon.com was great. Free shipping on top of a great price. I figure I saves about $600.00. I recommend the Samsung and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Surpassed expectations !!
Reviews.Author: DKJK "DK"
Reviews.Content: I have had a 4 1/2 year old samsung 50"dlp 1080i tv and comtemplated for a long time whether or not the 650 lcd would be that much better. I finally decided to go for it and hoped for the best. All I can say is WOW!!! Delivery was fast and courteous. TV performs better than I ever imagined. The picture is so life like. Definitely made the right decision. Blu ray dvd's pop out at you. Awesome TV!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: C. Simon
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV. Shipped fast and was delivered in perfect condition! Make sure when you get the TV to call Samsung or read the manual about the 120Hz. You will need to adjust when you use the 120HZ. It's great for sports but if left on for normal programming, motion gets weird...almost slow-motion. Overall, extremely pleased. Great pic, crystal clear! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Top quality in picture quality and audio
Reviews.Author: C. Wang
Reviews.Content: No wonder Consumer Report rate it the top pick in 50 and above LCD TV.  I bought it at local electonic store (they are promotion with 0% interest for 36 months) and pay few hundreds more than Amazon.  I did cross shopping with other brands: LG, SONY, Panasonic and Toshiba.  I didn't compare the SONY XBR model since they don't have it in tsock.  For color and picture clarity, this model is the best.  Sony has richer color but not as crisp as this A650.  I also consider A750 which has USB port as well as menu page to make configuration easier.  But for $200.00 difference, I skip it and choose A650.  Only thing Samsung can improve is teh remote design.  I appreciate the back light design but some function is not intrusive enough to learn withouot reading the menu book.  Overall, it is an excellent choice in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: This Television Is Great
Reviews.Author: Trade Wind
Reviews.Content: I was a bit sceptical at first about buying such a large ticket item through the internet/mail but Amazon.com changed all that. This TV arrived on time, Saturday delivery without a scratch. The delivery guy even offered to set it up for me. I waited about four months to review it and I can say I have no regrets. The firmware was already updated so I didn't have the problems as written by other reviewers with the shutting off. The picture even in standard def is amazing as is the standard sound. The infolink is pretty cool too. I watch for headline news in the morning to avoid the talking faces on the networks. The TV has just about any connection type you can imagine and you can connect it to your PC with DVI and you have a 52" PC monitor -- very nice. Anyway this TV and Amazon rocks.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!!!
Reviews.Author: JW88
Reviews.Content: This TV is AWSOME!! 10x better than expected.Equipment: Directv HD DVR, PS3 Blue ray,Sony HDX576WF home theater, All HDMI connections, optic audio(tv 2 home theater).I have had no problems with the on-off issue. the audio could be better, however when used with the home theater its better than going to the movie theater. The picture is perfect. This is a good TV at a good price!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Television
Reviews.Author: Michael Lisanti
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung LN53A650 about 1 month ago. I absolutely love it so far. The picture is wonderful. I don't know what happened with the white glove delivery. The guys were nice enough to bring the TV inside for me, but they didn't unpack it. The sound on the TV isn't too great but the picture more than makes up for it. I bought a PS3 and watched 2 Blu-Ray movies on it. I couldn't be happier about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Arguably the best picture out there!
Reviews.Author: John Anthony "leadership doc"
Reviews.Content: I researched quite a few formats including LCD, DLP and plasma before deciding that the sharpness and lifelike image of LCD were most important for my personal viewing.  It came down to the Sony 52XBR4 and the Samsung LN52A650.  They are both excellent performers, but the 650 has the advantage in picture clarity and the "through the window" look. At first, I felt the Touch of Color was gimicky and was actually a deterrent.  After seeing it set up in my home, that slight hint of cherry red makes the set look unique and classy.  My friends have commented on how good this unit looks, just setting there!Delivery was ahead of the estimated time and the service men did an excellent job of placement and of answering my questions.  They were perfunct, but pleasant and thorough.I highly recommend purchasing a Blu-ray player or PS3 and a few BD's to accompany the 650. Every picture looks good on this set, but the Blu-ray connected via HDMI creates an image that looks almost 3D.The TV's settings are highly customizable using the remote.  The control's wheel takes a bit of getting used to as it can be tricky at first to coordinate the press of the remote and the zipping by of the on-screen menu selections.  All in all, this is  a very minor complaint.  Buy this set and you won't be disappointed.A final note about Amazon.  They have one of the best cusotmer service policies in the busines and they back up their word.  When I purchased the LN52A650, Amazon's description including a comment that was easily miscontrued to imply you were getting an additional discount of $200.  Actually, the offer was for $200 off some sports items.  While Amazon, technically did nothing wrong, they later issued me a $100 gift certificate, an apology for any misunderstandings and still enabled me to use the original $200 sports offer if I wished.  In a business environment where "customer service" is more of a mission statement than a reality, Amazon.com gives their customers ample reason to return.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase
Reviews.Author: Happy in Minnesota
Reviews.Content: My Samsung 52" LCD purchase from Amazon went perfectly. The TV was delivered right into my home, no hidden or extra charges,and works flawlessly. I did a lot of product reviews before making my purchase - and agree that the Samsung 650 is a great TV and a great value. Beautiful picture quality, easy to use - and is everything I hoped it to be. If ordering a product online, buy from a reputable company like Amazon since there are some disreputable sellers preying on unsuspecting consumers.

Reviews.Title: Best LCD I've Seen
Reviews.Author: Kevin Brackett "Kevin"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color.  I've been watching it now for about two weeks and it is unbelievable.  All the other reviews on this are right on the money.  Watching football is like being there on the Field.  With the right camera angle I can watch the QB's eyes from my Lazy Boy chair.  I also got the Samsung BD-P1500 1080p Blu-ray Player, Cables To Go - 40315 - 2M (6.5ft) Velocity HDMI Digital Video Cable (Blue), Antennas Direct DB4 Multi Directional HDTV Antenna, Peerless SmartMount Universal Tilt Wall Mount ST660P - Mounting kit ( fasteners, bracket, tilt wall plate ) for flat panel - black - screen size: 37" - 60" - wall-mountable, and Tripp Lite A102-02M Digital Optical Audio Cable, 2x Toslink - 2M (6ft).  Everything works great.  Amazon is the Best!  This was my first big purchase and I was a little scared but after reading all the reviews I did it.  I saved over a $1000.00 by being patient and smart by using Amazon.  Everything arrived in perfect condition in a little over a week.  Like others here only one guy delivered the TV.  He did un-box it for us.The only thing I haven't figured out is the Touch of Color.  Is this frame suppose to glow or light up?  You can barley see it.  All the pictures on the web show the frame as a dark red or even slightly glowing.  Mine is there but you got to get right next to it to see the dark red top and bottom frame.I'm also the only person left in America that doesn't have cable or a satellite.  I'm using the Antenna mounted on my roof and I can pick up eight HD channels.  All look great.  So the tuner in this TV is good.  The delivery guy said he has never been in a home that didn't have cable or satellite.  I just laughed and thought to myself on how much money and time I save by not having them.In closing this TV and all the stuff I bought are GREAT, you can't go wrong with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great television
Reviews.Author: vinb "vin b"
Reviews.Content: Picture is ultra clear, PS3 games and Blu-Ray DVDs are absolutely spectacular.  The 120hz looks a little awkward during movie playback but can be disabled or lowered. Highly recommended!  Amazon/CEVA delivery was awesome.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Realalien "The Grey"
Reviews.Content: As soon as I turned it on and tuned into a HD cable movie it blew my socks off. It gives a whole new experience to watching and studying films. You almost feel as if your standing on the film set. The picture has amazing blacks and color space.I went back and forth with the plasma vs LCD but I'm glad I went for the LCD for the sharpness and with no burn in.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 650A 52 INCH HD TV
Reviews.Author: Frank E. Fiorilli
Reviews.Content: I FOUND THE ENTIRE AMAZON PROCESS TO BE ON TIME AND THE DELIVERY NEAT CLEAN COURTEOUS AND HELPFUL. THE PICTURE ON THE SAMSUNG IS BRILLIANT AND AT ANY ANGLE,AND THE ABILITY TO SWIVEL THE SCREEN LEFT OR RIGHT IS HELPFUL IF YOU WANT TO MOVE YOUR MAIN SEATING AREA FROM ONE AREA OF THE ROOM TO ANOTHER. I'M NO TECHIE SO I CAN'T DECRIBE THE PIXEL,HZ KIND OF THINGS BUT WHAT I CAN SAY IS THE PICTURE ON THIS TV IS A DREAM.ICAN SEE THE PORES IN PEOPLES FACES AND UP CLOSE SCENES WITHOUT DISTORTION. FOOTBALL IS AMAZING TO WATCH SO YOU MUST BE GETTING THE IDEA THAT I'M QUITE PLEASED WITH MY SAMSUNG

Reviews.Title: Flawless
Reviews.Author: D. Rudometkin
Reviews.Content: This TV has exceeded my high expectations in everyway- it's flawless.  I like the red touch of color, the 120Hz, the black levels, the picture quality, the price, everything.  Great value here at amazon for this set and the delivery was flawless.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: E.L.
Reviews.Content: Fantastic TV.  Great pic quality.  Touch of color adds a nice contrast to the typical 'black' TV.

Reviews.Title: samsung 52" lcd A650 series
Reviews.Author: Baskaran Adikesavalu "Baski"
Reviews.Content: very good buy. planned to buy Sony but after taking a glance at the samsung, I switched my decision. It is month now, we are very happy to have this tv in our living room. The clarity is good, the picture  appearance with black frame is really good. The remote control feature also unique. Sound may not be that great. But hometheater is for that. Overall I am very satisfied with the product

Reviews.Title: Samsung Lcd
Reviews.Author: Chloe B.
Reviews.Content: Pros:- Great quality with HDTV input- Great method to update firmware through usb port- Frame is nice (touch of red)- Bought this and a 7 series, but prefer the 6 series because it does not have the halo effect around the frame)- Regular cable looks good. Somewhat pixelated, but good.Cons:- Red might be too bright when sunlight hits- Fine scratches show up everywhere on the frame, but can only be seen close up

Reviews.Title: You will not be disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Brand "Happy in WI"
Reviews.Content: After many months of research and driving my wife nuts, we bought the Samsung 650 series 120 Hz LCD 52".  The picture is amazing.  In HD the people look like they will jump right out of the screen.  Everything has exceeded my expectations.The shipping was fantastic too.  I ordered the TV on a Thursday night, and received it that next Tuesday.  I am so impressed.If there is anything to look negatively at are the speakers.  Since they are at the bottom, the sound is a bit soft, but it is not bad in the least.  Do not let that sway you from a terrific TV.

Reviews.Title: Incredible!
Reviews.Author: Catharsis
Reviews.Content: I've had this television for only three days, and it's incredible!  I've "made due" with a 36" Hitachi Ultravision for almost 7 years, routing my PC through it, and the sound through a Kenwood amp.  After reading the reviews and comparing for almost 6 months, I finally bought it and an X-box 360.  The delivery left much to be desired, since the company sent a single old man to deliver the tv, so I had to help him carry it up the stairs, and then he flatly refused to stand by while I opened the box to veryify the television was functional and undamaged saying rather rudely "I don't have time for that."Luckily, it was fine, and the television quality is incredible.  My PC games and applications are eye-searingly bright and detailed, and the X-box 360, connected by HDMI brings a tear to my eye.PROS:  Plenty of HDMI inputs, PiP, PC inputs, and a swivel base makes it easy to connect cables.  I haven't had the glare problems that others have complained about.  The picture is phenomenal, particularly when viewed with a HD signal.CONS:  The remote has a wheel similar to the iPod, but far less responsive.  It lasks a single PiP button that you can hit, instead you have to go through an annoying menu. Other than the delivery service sucking, and the poorly designed remote, you can't go wrong.  Worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: It's a good one
Reviews.Author: Richard L. King
Reviews.Content: Awesome.  The picture is outstanding.  I have had this product for just a few weeks but so far so good.  The picture is as clear as standing in front of someone.  I would recommend this TV

Reviews.Title: Amazing Television - Update
Reviews.Author: L. Lunsford
Reviews.Content: I've had this television a few weeks now and I can't believe the difference in picture quality from the HD set it's replacing.  The picture size and quality make you feel as if you are a part of the scene.  I would recommend this TV to anyone considering purchasing a large screen LCD TV.  On another note, the price was appox $600.00 less than Best Buy and no sales tax!February 25, 2009,I've had the TV now for a few months and it is currently in pieces in my living room.  I'm on my third repair and parts are on backorder from Samaung. I called them today to file a complaint and it went nowhere. They have no desire to satisfy their customers and their local support is a joke at best.  I will never buy another Samsung product. While this TV had great reviews, so far mine has been a total disaster.

Reviews.Title: Just purchased TV
Reviews.Author: Stacy T. Lanier
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived just 2 days ago and the only problem I've had was to upgrade the firmware since it was turning off like what was reported. The TV is the best I've seen and can tell you know it is worth more than I paid. I am glad Amazon offered this product at the best price anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I ever owned
Reviews.Author: Pumpkin729
Reviews.Content: The color and picture quality of this TV is amazing. I have never seen so many hues of the colors. It is the truest color I have ever seen in any TV. The sound quality of the tv is very impressive also although it does not have the volume level. My old rear projection tv I used to set the volume on 10 while this requires 50 to get the same listening level. I will be hooking up to surround system in the future. While I was told by the delivery man that the tv was controlled solely by the remote because the tv has no buttons on the TV this is not true. On the lower right side of the bezel there is a touch panel for volume, channel, on/off etc although it is very hard to see. You have to be right at eye level to see them. They are right by the standby light. I watched a Blu Ray movie and it was Fantastic. Very accurate flesh tones. For gaming it takes you to a whole new level, My Xbox looks so much better. I highly reccommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG The Best LCD HDTV Money Can Buy!!!!!
Reviews.Author: H. Hill
Reviews.Content: I just received my Samsung LN52A650 LCD HDTV and let me tell you right off! If you're looking for a TV with stupendous Picture quality, color, contrast, brightness and motions are outstanding look no further than Samsung LN52A650 this TV is the best you can buy at any price. Make sure you add a upconverting DVD player (will play all your DVD in HD) the picture is unbelievable very close to blueray.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Delivery Service of Samsung LN 52A65
Reviews.Author: Arthur F. Camp, Jr. "Art Camp"
Reviews.Content: After reading many glowing reviews about purchases of the Samsung LN 52A650 through Amazon, I decided that I would take the plunge. The delivery was pleasantly ahead of schedule and a strong delivery man brought the HDTV into my house,unpacked it from its shipping box, and set it up on a table that I had positioned. He attached the power cord, connected the antenna and selected an on-the-air HDTV station. His delivery sheet was in the form of a check-sheet that allowed me to acknowledge its mechanical condition, as well as, its operating performance. I was very please with the whole process. At this point in time I am one happy  customer.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED!
Reviews.Author: TNSMOKEY "TNSMOKEY"
Reviews.Content: THIS A GREAT LCD.  I WANTED A 60" BUT THE SAMSUNG LN52A650 WAS THE LARGEST LCD WITH 120 HZ AT A REASONABLE PRICE, BUT THE PICTURE IS SO CLEAR 52" WAS LARGE ENOUGH.  LOVING COLLEGE FOOTBALL IN HD THIS YEAR.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Greg M. Luey
Reviews.Content: Nothing less than spectacular!Also, ordering to shipping to receiving was seamless.

Reviews.Title: You Have to Have it To Believe It
Reviews.Author: Sabo
Reviews.Content: This is an unbelievable LCD. There is absolutely nothing negative to say. From placing the order to setting up the LCD, you couldn't ask for a smoother process. The colors, clarity, beauty of the set itself, and the cost is unbeatable. Look no further.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Roy K. Hart Jr. "yankee fan"
Reviews.Content: Delivery was faster than predicted and was shipped well packaged. Television is super sharp with excellent HD quality and DVD picture is excellent. My only fallback is our Sharp LCD 20", you can go between cable & satellite a lot easier(with the push of one button on your remote). My final decision between the Sharp & Samsung was Consumer Reports rated Samsung LN52A650 as #1. Amazon even sent me money back for there 30 day price gurantee. I have only had this tv for a month, but would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality, excellent value
Reviews.Author: Michael R. Grimaila
Reviews.Content: After spending a few months doing my research on the CNET website ([...]) and the AVS Forum ([...] I decided on the Samsung LN52A650.  It was delivered sooner than I expected and the installation was a snap.  The price dropped a week later, so I contacted Amazon and they refunded me the difference.  Overall, an excellent experience,

Reviews.Title: Best TV Buying experinece ever.
Reviews.Author: Jack Benson
Reviews.Content: I was in a big blue box store looking at all the flat screens when this guy walked by comparing TV's with his note paper.  I started talking to him and told me that Amazon has the same thing for much lower.  That was the start of my perfect buying experience.  I went home looked up a few TV's and wow what a difference in price.  After all the reviews, I decided to go with the 52in Samsung 650.  Wow, what an amazing view.  I could never imagined such a good picture this could have.  Now I have to make myself get up and get away from it.  The picture quality is amazing.  This along with an Upscale DVD, AV receiver and HD source is a great viewing experience.  Amazon shipping is awesome.  I placed my order on a Friday and had it delivered, unboxed, and cleaned up (by Amazon for FREE!) by the next Friday.Now to top it off.  The price dropped $190 within the 30 days of shipping so I emailed them and without hesitation they refunded to my CC.

Reviews.Title: amazing tv, very satisfied purchase
Reviews.Author: B. Tran
Reviews.Content: I was going to get the a550 in the first place.  After comparing the a550 and the a650 at a local Sears, I saw the difference.  I really liked the more vibrant colors from the a650's glossy screen.  Glossy means glare but it's really not in issue.  I have windows on the side of the living room and it's fine.Then the price of the a750 came down to 2318 (early July?), which was lower than the a650's price at that time.  After comparing the two, I went for the a650 instead.  Picture quality-wise, they're the same.  I liked the more curved design of the a650 vs the rectangular shape of the a750.  Also, the a750 does not swivel and a number of people complained about the "halo effect."  It's hard to see it at the local store.  I wasn't going to take the risk and plus, a TV is also a decoration in the living room (IMHO).  I just waited for the price of the a650 to be a little bit lower...After reading all (or almost all) the reviews here about the TV itself and buying from Amazon, I pulled the trigger when the price went down to 2269.99 from 2299.99.  I felt very comfortable purchasing a big TV online from a big retailer.  Everything went as expected.  My purchase was made on the night of the 15th (Tuesday).  It shipped out the next day and the price was lowered to 2199.99, which Amazon refunded me after I simply emailed them.  The TV was delivered on Friday afternoon (18th).  Two guys carried it in, set it on my TV stand, connected the DVD player to it, and made sure it works.  They took all the trash with them and reminded me to keep the box for 30 days in case of a return/exchange.The TV is great!  Enough said.

Reviews.Title: CEVA Telephone Number
Reviews.Author: FroggyM
Reviews.Content: In case you need to call CEVA to reschedule a delivery time, this is their number: 1.800.888.4949, M-F from 8 a.m. - 5 p.m. CST.  Just ask to be transferred to the local office that has your tv (e.g. the Baltimore, MD office).  Have your tracking number (which is found on your amazon order page) ready to give to them.TV is great so far.  I'll write a longer review once I have more time with it.Aesthetics: this tv is GORGEOUS.  When the tv is turned off, sitting black and sleek, it just looks incredible.  I'm really glad I got the 52" (as opposed to the smaller one).  It's massive and stunning.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST TV I'VE EVER OWNED!!
Reviews.Author: LWDRUMZ
Reviews.Content: I got this tv today and when I got it up and running I was blown away!!! I had a 50" DLP with a really good picture, but nothing like this! If you own a Playstation 3 or an Xbox 360 you should own this tv!! The first test I did was to watch a little bit of Resident Evil on blu-ray and the picture was just unreal!! The next test was to fire up Call of Duty 4 on the Xbox 360. Oh My God, this tv made this game look REAL!!!! I got killed so many times because I was just standing in awe looking at the surroundings!!! Do yourself a favor and buy this tv!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV, Great Price, Easy!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did all the research, Consumer Reports etc. This is the best LCD TV for the money, period. I shopped all over Amazons price was incredible. The free white glove delivery was so easy, I would not hesitate to use this service again. Guy carried it into my house, un-boxed and waited until I checked out the TV and signed off.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Susan Kraemer "sci fi geek"
Reviews.Content: I had a Hitachi LCD 50" who's picture was getting very faded. I know that getting a new bulb would have made it better, but... I wanted a new TV because the Hatachi did not have an HDMI connection and I have a Blu-Ray player and an HD DVR. I researched extensively, including Consumer Reports. What I found was that dollar for dollar the Samsung was top notch. I got the 52" and it is AMAZING!!! The picture is sharp and crisp. The color is unbelievable. I couldn't imagine a better TV.There is none of the glare that some have mentioned. The remote is easy to use, though not being a total TV junkie there are a few things I don't really understand, but have not needed to. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: James "JBR"
Reviews.Content: This TV is outstanding!  There are no glare problems and I've watched it in bright and low lighting conditions.  The remote is a little cumberson when accessing PIP and other menu items, but the TV more than makes up for the slight inconvenience.  I read all the reviews before buying and did purchase the $10 HDMI cables.  They didn't work.  The sound would occasionly go off then come back on.  I switched to component cables and the problem went away.  I learned that when you buy HDMI cables, Samsung recommends buying cables that are v1.3 or better.  I found some on the internet that are certified v1.3 for $35, but have not received them yet.  I also learned that I may have low signal strength or an incorrect coax cable type from my cable company.

Reviews.Title: I agree with positive reviews
Reviews.Author: David C. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I'm certainly glad I read the reviews on Amazon. Excellent quality product at a reasonable price compared to the competition.  Delivery was excellent and within 5 days.  I highly recommend Amazon and Samsung. Both are 5 star suppliers.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic HDTV
Reviews.Author: W. Gates
Reviews.Content: I read reviews and specs of this and competitive products, and I have no regrets for having purchased the Samsung LN52A650.  A superb picture makes it a joy to watch.  Coupled with an Oppo DV-981HD upconverting DVD player the picture comes alive.  Any complaints I may have are trivial.Amazon customer reviews were the deciding factor in my selection.  It is unusual to see a product with so many five star ratings.  There are a lot of happy customers out there and I joined the ranks!  To borrow a phrase from a beer commercial: "It doesn't get any better than this."

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: B. Gries
Reviews.Content: I haven't been able to view this TV in the full beauty of HD just yet (getting Dish Network very soon). I will say that on a nice TV like this, standard def. looks like junk.  I guess I'm an HD junkie without even having had it yet.I can't really say too much that hasn't already been said in the numerous reviews already (trust me I read a lot of them). You can't go wrong with this set. Definitely happy I ordered on Amazon rather than buying at a big box store.  No sales tax and they bring it in your house and unpack it and make sure it works for you.The one thing I did not read that kind of surprised me is that after you hit the power button on the remote, the TV takes about 3 seconds before it comes on. I'm guessing to warm up or something.  Also the remote signal receiver is on the right side of the TV, so sometimes if you're pointing to the middle-left it doesn't react.I like the RSS feed feature from USA Today. You can check the weekly weather, stock market, and the day's news stories in all the different categories. Pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: Awesome LCD!
Reviews.Author: Laura Matsumoto
Reviews.Content: I've been mesmerized by this beautiful LCD TV for the past month! I'm SO glad that I got it just before the Summer Olympics - what a treat to watch all the glory in HD splendor. The SD content is decent - and can be somewhat tweaked with the pic settings. I've been reading through the AVS Forum pages for recommended adjustments, etc. Watching Bluray via my PS3 may keep me out of the movie theaters from now on - spectacular clarity (and probably a bit cheaper in the long run). The slight red in the bezel is elegant and I really like the curved lines of the 650 model. Thank you Samsung!BTW: The delivery company was excellent - on time and helpful.

Reviews.Title: This television ROCKS!
Reviews.Author: W. Cimbalik
Reviews.Content: Growing weary of the upselling pressure at my local Best Buy, I walked out and decided to purchase this set from Amazon.  My product decision was based on CNET and other reviews.  The Amazon price was excellent as was the delivery service.I want to add that I was concerned about the high gloss screen in my large-windowed family room but that hasn't been a problem, the brightness of the set makes the ambient light a non issue.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture !!
Reviews.Author: bodie358
Reviews.Content: TV is wonderful - great picture right out of the box. Remote control needs improvement because the flywheel is difficult to maneuver. This is the best LCD you can buy for the money.I must comment on the shipping company. The TV did arrive on the promised date but it would have been here days earlier if it had not been accidentally rerouted to a city hundreds of miles out of the way. One of the two guys that delivered it was a total jerk and acted like he was doing us a favor. The other man was nice though and they did set it up and made sure it worked before leaving. Also, do not rely on the tracking info on their website as it is not accurate and they are slow in updating. I saw that the TV went to the wrong city at about midnight and I decided to call them in the morning to find out what was going on. By that time the tracking had been deleted from the website (I think they tried to cover up their error).Anyway, alls well that ends well and I love the new TV.

Reviews.Title: Beijing Olympics Never Looked So Good!
Reviews.Author: Colm
Reviews.Content: Thoroughtly satisfied with this product. Having debated between the 46" and 52" - so glad I went with the 52" for the extra ~$200.Every bead of sweat, every agonizing tear from the Olypmics has been  displayed in crystal clarity.The built in QAM-tuner saved me having to upgrade my Time Warner DVR box - so I can get HD channels without waiting for a new cable-box.A buddy summed it up - it looks more real than reality! Worth every penny.One slight negative - Amazon's shipping company CEVA - transcribed the wrong contact number for me (my contact number in my amazon profile was correct).So when Amazon's shipping notice page said I had been contacted (when I had not) - I had to call Amazon to find CEVA's main number, then their shipping hub - and then arrange deliver myself. Apart from this minor delivery issue, still very happy!

Reviews.Title: The best 52" LCD out there at the moment
Reviews.Author: W. Bryan Miller Jr.
Reviews.Content: Bought a Samsung LN-T4671F last December for a game room (after months of evaluations) and thought that picture was great, but this LCD is a even clearer, even though being a bigger set. Always felt Sony was king, but after spending time with these two LCDs, believe Samsung has passed Sony in LCD technology.Easy decision. Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV!
Reviews.Author: D. Merrin
Reviews.Content: I love this TV! The look in my living room is gorgeous. Everyone comments on how beautiful it looks and how unusual. I was buying 2 consoles from the Pottery Barn that have a rustic look with red in them. In searching for a TV, I was fortunate to see this one. The combination couldn't be more perfect! It's an extremely handsome TV. The red in the black bezel is very subtle and more of a maroon red...stunning! The stand is beautiful too and it tilts so easily and gives easy access to the panel. The picture is so crisp and vibrant. I received the TV just before the Olympics and watched the opening ceremony...all I can say is "WOW", what a picture! I bought a Samsung Blu-Ray and it synchronizes with the TV automatically. Kudos to Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Nearly perfect
Reviews.Author: A. Feigenson
Reviews.Content: I'm quite pleased with the set.  It's great.  There are 200+ reviews to say that.So let's focus on the one drawback I've seen, which was a real bummer for me.I use a ten-year-old receiver for speaker output.  It supports digital optical in, but obviously not HDMI.  I was psyched to find out this set would output optical.  Multiple HDMI sources come in, one optical audio out to my receiver, right?  Wrong.  Output is limited to 2-channel so 5.1 isn't used.  Not sure why they would even bother giving you that feature if they limit it to 2-channel.  I guess 5.1 is used if using OTA but let's get real.  Who buys a set like this, uses optical out and WOULDN'T pay for HD programming?To be fair, almost any device with hdmi also has optical out.  But having optical out meant fewer cables (and one less dongle hanging off my Xbox 360.)Other than that, it's killer.  Who cares if the remote sucks.  Pay $50 and get a universal.  Watch for price changes within 30 days and get a price adjustment.  I saved $120.  And go to AVSForums.com for calibration settings.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Lyfeizgudd
Reviews.Content: I finally scraped up enough money to buy our long awaited big screen TV!  I was overwhelmed by all the choices and did as much research as I could.  I finally settled on the TV based on all reviews available and price.  As always, Amazon beat everyone's price bar none.  That given with free delivery and no slaes tax, we saved somewhere in the neighbordood of $1000.That being said, delievery was fast.  The TV arrived about 5 days ahead of the promised date.  The only complaint regarding delivery was that the guy showed up alone.  I am not quite sure how he would have gotten it in the house had I not been physically able to help him, but I was so it is a moot point.  I was a little surprised he did not mention this when he called ahead though. Anyway, he was very helpful and waited patiently while we turned the TV on to make sure it was in working condition.  He offered to take away the packaging, but we opted to keep it just in case we needed to ship it back for any reason.As far as the television itself, I am very, very happy with it.  It is light (as compared to my old tube style TV) and you hardly noticed the red border.(I was concerned about this at first)  I actually like the subtle red accent.  I find the remote easy to use and was very impressed with the quality of the sound that comes from the television even when the surround sound is off.  Now I only use my surround sound to watch movies or special programs which I believe is an energy saver- every little bit counts.I am very particular about my coler viewing; particularly fleshtones and reds.  I had to do very litte "twoaking" with this set.  And what I did do, was very simple to accomplish.  Even with all the fiddling around I have done learning everything, the AA batteries that were included with the remote are still working fine after a solid month of use.  Eventually I plan on replacing them with rechargables.I highly recommend the A650 as well as Amazon's service.  Amazon has never let me down and I use them for more and more of my shopping needs.  This was the biggest purchase I ever mad and I was nervous but will not hesitiate in the future with large purchases.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HD Television with a few flaws
Reviews.Author: Casual Reviewer
Reviews.Content: You can't go wrong with this television. It's awesome. The flaws are few and, in my opinion, relatively insignificant.The most glaring is the wheel on the remote. I expected it to work like an iPod, but it doesn't even come close. The other small thing is that you can't custom name the inputs. So if you have both an XBox 360, and a Playstation 3, you're stuck with "Game." I have no idea what to name my Apple TV, Tivo, and Roku Netflix box. "VCR???"Before I purchased this TV, I was concerned about the glare and about the "touch of red." On the glare, I have a very bright room and there is some glare during daylight hours, but it is minimum and it doesn't bother me. If you are an extreme videophile, this might bother you during daylight. On the "touch of red," it looks fantastic. Very classy.All in all and as so many others have posted here, this is an outstanding HDTV that not only has an incredible picture, but it also looks fantastic in my house. I have absolutely no regrets about purchasing this HDTV.*UPDATE*After 7 months of using this TV my opinion stays the same. This TV is awesome and I am 100% satisfied with it!P.S. There was an audio issue where the TV speakers would pop on when the resolution of the display had to change. This was very annoying. The firmware upgrade solved this issue. Do yourself a favor and install the most recent firmware upgrade available on the Samsumg web site as soon as you get the TV.

Reviews.Title: Made the right decision
Reviews.Author: C. W. Phillips
Reviews.Content: I studied HD TV specs for at least a couple of years, mostly waiting for prices to come down.  My room where it would go has problems.  There are windows everywhere, and no blank wall on which the TV could be placed.  So it had to go in a corner, which creates an off angle view for most viewers in the room.  I initially had planned to get a plasma because they had good off angle brightness.  LCD TVs had a bad rap for not handling fast motion, and having poor black level.  At the last minute I switched and bought the Samsung and I'm glad I did.  It had effectively addressed all the weaknesses of LCD TV, except the reflections off the screen.  The brightness off angle is good, the motion is great with the 120 Hz refresh, and it can make black as good as any plasma.  The only reason I knocked it down a notch is the remote control.  The rotating control button takes some practice to avoid selecting the wrong option.  I've been using this TV for over a month, and am still very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Danokayth
Reviews.Content: This TV is awesome.  Service was great and delivery was a week early.  Great job Amazon.com!

Reviews.Title: Great Price and a Great TV!
Reviews.Author: J. Serpas
Reviews.Content: TV arrived a few days ago.  Amazon and CEVA delivery experiences were both outstanding (about 5 business days from check-out until setup in my home).  The 2 delivery guys carried it up 2 flights of stairs and had it setup and on the stand in about 5 minutes.  They even waited around while I hooked up the HDMI and power to make sure the LCD screen survived the trip.  I'll chime in with the rest of the reviews... the picture is amazing!  Since my TV isn't in the exact center of the room, the swivel stand is a wonderful little feature that is lacking (or so I hear) on the 750 model.  I don't have windows behind me when I'm watching TV, but I can understand the reviews that are upset by the glare.  The panel surface and frame are very reflective... That's one thing you should check out at your local TV store before you purchase.  Did a lot of shopping around and Amazon's price at the time of my purchase couldn't be beat!

Reviews.Title: The best 52" LCD around ... go ahead and get it!
Reviews.Author: hitech "Mark"
Reviews.Content: I'll admit this was a little bit of an impulse buy.  I work in a service industry where I'm in many different people's homes and businesses on a daily basis.  I had a 30" HDTV (CRT type) that I bought a few years ago as a necessity when my old 27" SDTV died on me.  It looked good but I really liked the flat-panel look, especially with all the wires hidden/fished in the walls, which I'd seen in many homes.  The space you'll save without an entertainment center if you wall mount is incredible.I'm really into movies and sports, and I liked what everyone here was saying about the Samsung series 6, so I went over to my favorite big box electronics store to compare and see them in person.  I really was set on the 46", but I'll tell you the 52" is the way to go if you can swing it.  It looks so much better at a distance of 12' or greater over the 46", and I love it.The picture is number one as far as I can tell, compared to anything I've seen in the stores.  So I pulled the trigger, at least I thought so, Amazon approved me for exactly $100 less than the TV cost to get the 0%/36 mo financing offer on their card.  They "said" they would ask the bank for $100 more on the limit, but I never heard anything, and you can't put part on the Amazon card and part on a debit card or the like, so I cheated (like someone else here mentioned) and bought myself a gift certificate to make up the balance.  And away we went.CEVA/Eagle Logistics showed up about 2 days before the original delivery date, so I was pumped.  The fellows set it up (initially) on the stand and plugged in my HDMI DVD player to make sure it worked, and were very courteous.I then wall mounted the unit, along with fishing all my HDMI cables in the wall, along with a recessed AC plate installed behind the TV.  (I do low-voltage wiring for a living). It simply looks amazing.  I bought an audio pier for my components below, and it works great, very high-tech looking.The TV is simply stunning.  And you can't go wrong.  Just do it.  Do yourself a favor and schedule your upgrade to HD with your satellite or cable provider as soon as you order, so there won't be a lapse in SD to HD programming.  SD looks OK, but a 52" makes it look worse than say a 30" LCD.  I went to a Dish Network VIP 722 Dual Tuner HD DVR.  You'll probably also want an Upconverting DVD player with HDMI or a BluRay player if you watch a lot of movies.Make sure to check in for price drops over the first 30 days, Amazon gave me a $95 refund during this period to make it over $700 cheaper than BestBuy.

Reviews.Title: A gem to behold
Reviews.Author: Skinner "Skinner"
Reviews.Content: Waited a long time before replacing a SONY 17inch color TV purchased in 1974. No blur movement, deep contrast, beautiful finish on case. You will want to run the audio through external speakers or an audio home theatre system as the speakers do not do justice to this visual gem of a TV. Very glad I went with the 52 inch model as it intially appeared large for my room but now I cannot wait to watch programs on the large screen. The delivery went without any hiches and drop off date was arranged for a mutually convenient time by very polite, courteous delivery staff. Been up and running for 2 months and absolutely problem free. Very pleasant experience from purchase to viewing. Would purchase a large TV from Amazon again without any hesitation. Got a great price and fast, competent delivery.

Reviews.Title: Amazing LCD!
Reviews.Author: IndyMart18 "Indymart18"
Reviews.Content: If you're on the fence about buying this tv and are having a hard time swollowing all the positive reviews, don't sweat it, they're right it's amazing. The blacks are Pioneer Kuro close, and the colors are amazingly bright and vibrant. Plus, for all you tweekers, the adjustability and option choices are awesome. One note for gamers, you probably will notice some game lag on timing based games like Hot Shots or Guitar Hero on most modes, however, the Game mode in the Entertainment Modes eliminates it. Do yourself a favor if you can swing it, pick one of these up, you won't be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: I love well-applied technology
Reviews.Author: C. Valdes
Reviews.Content: After much research and review of my LCD options, the SAMSUNG LN52A650 turned out to be a fantastic choice.  I knew that Samsung has the best technology out there at reasonable prices.  I debated between the 63 inch rear projection DLP Samsung and the LN52650 and LN52750.  The 750 is priced about $500 more than the 650 for a couple of features that I didn't care for. So to me they were identical TV's.  With the $500 that I saved, I bought the Panasonic DMPBD30K Blu-Ray player and Monster HDMI cables.  I could not be happier with my AV solution. I agree with everyone that scored this product with 5 stars.Technical Comments:1) Make sure that your receiver can at least handle Dolby surround sound. PCM signal is ok, but does not convert to a rich surround sound. I have an Integra receiver that lets Dolby fly. Unfortunately, it is old enough not to have the DTS HD or other HD audio converters. But for now, I'm very happy with Dolby via optical cable.2) My Cox Cable HD feed is fantastic. Although some HD programming differ in quality, I can accept some shortcomings and "blurriness" and "pixelation". I can't wait for the Olympics and the NFL season.3) Blu-Ray HD quality is the best I've ever seen.  I watched Underworld:Evolution last night...Wow. I thought Kate Bekinsale's face was flawless until I watched the movie. She's got imperfections like all of us, regardless of make up.  The movie seemed like it was computer generated and in 3D sometimes.  Netflix is now my best friend.  Will I ever see the sun again and leave my couch???

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: J. Gibson
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture quality. I was between this model and the a550 and went with this after a demo of the 120Hz processing to take care of motion blur. Yeah, sometime the AMP (Auto-Motion Plus) can be bad by creating artifacts and making normal shows look "soap-opera"-like, but you can always turn the AMP to low or off.

Reviews.Title: THIS TV ROCKS!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amanda L. Boley
Reviews.Content: I spent a lot of time researching TVs and prices.  Originally I was going to get a Sony XBR4 or XBR5 because my friend and I were looking at televisions ( at best buy) when we came across this particular model of Sony we both stopped and our jaws dropped!  It had the most amazing picture and so much detail.  It was like looking out a window, it was so clear we could have been at the archaeological dig site they were showing.  I was sold!  Had I had the thousands of dollars required that day I would have went home with that TV.  But I didn't, so I was looking on the internet to try and find cheaper prices, but I accidently stumbled across something that said Samsung had something better and it cost less.  I couldn't imagine something being better and CHEAPER!  So again I start reading reviews and such and found that people were debating which model was better, although all stated Samsung was cheaper.  Finally, I went to consumer reports and found that they stated that the Samsung LN52A650 was the best model they have ever tested.  It rated #1 and Sony XBR5 and then the XBR4 came in a close 2nd and 3rd.  With that and the Samsung being  about $1,000 cheaper  I decided on the Samsung, now where to buy it from. I again looked all over and was pricing various places.  I wanted to buy from a "brick and mortar" store so that if there were problems I would feel covered though it would need to be delivered.  I looked all over and Circuit City was the cheapest at $3,200 after shipping, but when I looked at Amazon it was $1,000 cheaper after shipping (which was free)  so I looked further and that was the cheapest price from a reputable internet site.  So, I decided to give it a shot and get the TV from Amazon.  A great TV and one that I would save a thousand dollars on...AMAZING not to mention it was already cheaper than the Sony I was looking at!When I got the TV, what can I say but WOW!  What a beautiful picture.  The touch of red bezel isn't as bad as I had read about, it's just a touch, sure I would have rather had blue or green instead of red, but it doesn't show up that much and in the end it's hardly noticeable because I'm too busy drooling over the picture.  The wheel thing on the remote is a little difficult, but I'm not used to that sort of thing and it's not that bad it just takes a little getting used to.  I am going to hang the TV on the wall, it seems that the base is a little less than stable, but I planned to hang it on the wall anyway.  I am glad I bought this over the Sony!CEVA was alright too!
