Reviews.Author: Jobs Gates
Reviews.Content: Very happy with purchase.  Delivery was fast.  Setup was a breeze.  Picture quality is excellent.  Features are extensive.  Nothing but positive comments so far.  Looks great hanging on my wall.  First experience with Samsung, and I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Xinnie
Reviews.Content: I received my television yesterday.  It was supposed to arrive on Monday but it arrived on Friday instead - I had taken the day off to handle a plumbing problem & it was a pleasant surprise that I received the television prior to the weekend so I could play around with it.Delivery from CEVA was fantastic.  The two guys set up my playstation with the television & before I could blink everything was set up.Amazon is the only way to go when buying a big screen T.V. for all the reasons previously expressed by others.  I waited a year before pulling the trigger & I now I wish I hadn't waited so long.  If you are waiting don't wait too long...it's a worthwhile purchase.  The television is gorgeous & works beautifully....I'm so glad Amazon is around because otherwise I would have had to pay $2,400 at Best Buy with tax & delivery charges.  This is the only way to go.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" 650
Reviews.Author: Paul B "Paul"
Reviews.Content: Researched all the 46 and 52 inch LCD's. Was sold on Sony until I looked closer at Samsung. Sony just does not have the clarity or color depth of the Samsung. I recommend the high gloss screen. We have it in a bright room and there is no glare problem, well worth it for the better picture quality than the 630.

Reviews.Title: great tv great delivery
Reviews.Author: jj
Reviews.Content: i just bought a samsung 650 52" couldn't be happier.  love the tv.  delivery was simple.  i would recommend this tv to anyone.  i saved a good deal of money buy getting this tv at amazon as opposed to a box store in my city.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Sherry W. Sterritt
Reviews.Content: The TV has a wonderful picture.  Very pleased.  Have had none of the problems with the TV that the negitive reviews talk about.  No glare on the screen when TV is on or off and it is sitting right beside a window.  No problems with the TV turning on and off.  The wheel on the remote doesn't have to be used so don't really know if it is a problem.  The red trim is so dark you can't tell it is red unless you get close.  I made the right choice after hours of reading reviews.  The only problem I had was not with the TV but with the delivery.  Delivery date was set, took off work, and they never showed even though I was in contact with them through out the day.  Second delivery day was set with afternoon delivery.  That day, my neighbor called in the morning saying they were there to deliver TV and leave it at her house because they couldn't come back!!!  When it was finally delivered to my house, I had to insist that the guys unpack it and set it up....some white glove delivery.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Deek
Reviews.Content: Just took delivery of this unit a few days ago and so far I am extremely happy with the purchase.  First night hooked up a PS3 and watched a couple of blu ray movies, Wall-e and Transformers and both were amazing.  Color, depth, crisp picture.  Everything was how i wanted it.  Played Rainbow Six Vegas on the PS3 and again, great picture.  During the loading scenes when the screen is black i did notice some of the "clouding" issue that others have mentioned but it in NO WAY cause concern.  As soon as the game was loaded, didn't notice it at all even in dark scenes.  For some reason, either it didn't happen or i just can't see it during the movies.  The remote is easy to use and navigation works well.  I play everything through a surround sound system for movies and games but for standard low level listening, the speakers work fine.  The touch of red on the tv is also a very appealing.  I would definitely recommend this TV to family and friends.  Hopefully i remember to update this review in a few months with more details.Also, delivery was quick and efficient.Update 9/14/09:Well the TV is almost 6 months old now and it is still amazing.  I went on a weeks vacation and all the hotels had standard tube tv's and as soon as i got back and turned on Samsung, i was floored as i was when it was new.  The "clouding" and "flashlighting" issues are minimal and have even gotten a little better.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Mack "Finbogg"
Reviews.Content: The entire process for purchasing this tv was a snap. They even delivered it a whole week ahead of schedule. Picture looks great especially with high def products such as bluray and game consoles. The only thing that I am not 100% happy with is the speakers. They sound fine but there is a constant buzzing noise. Maybe I got a broken tv. I am hoping it will go away when I hook up a sound system

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: M. Herman "dracula"
Reviews.Content: Just bought the LN52A650 and I am very happy about the quality of the picture and its features. I received it only three days after my order beating Amazon's time estimate on the delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Matt B.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv after a couple months of researching tvs.  I came down to this model and a Sony model.  This model had a better contrast ratio and better reviews than the Sony.  Let me start with saying the shipping on this was tremendous!  I purchased this on Tuesday, Feb. 17th at 1:00 p.m.  It said the estimated delivery date was the following Tuesday, Feb. 24th.  I'm not very patient but it was worth it because the cheapest I found this tv in the store was $2499 at Best Buy.  I purchased it for $1868.00.  I saved $631. Not to mention I didn't have to pay for shipping or tax when I ordered it.  I also would have had to pay taxes at Best Buy which would have been around an additional $200.  The morning of Wednesday, Feb. 18th I had a call at 6:30 a.m. with someone asking if I would be home so they could deliver my tv.  I was in complete shock.  I received my tv in 18 hours after I ordered it.  That is the best online shipping I have ever had and once again the shipping was free.  The gentleman delivered it and brought it in all by himself and was very friendly and helpful.  The tv looks fabulous!  It has a much better picture than my previous Sony Wega tv.  I watch a lot of sports and having the 120hz is great for this.  There's no blur or blocks.  This was my second tv purchase from Amazon.com and I have no regrets ordering it from them.  Everyone should order from Amazon you will save money and they have great shipping.  Thank you Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LCD
Reviews.Author: James F. Klizas
Reviews.Content: I ordered the TV on on Jan 20 and received it on Jan 28.  The delivery went smooth, they brought the the TV to the basement, unpacked and made sure that it worked before leaving.  The picture is fantastic and I would highly recommend this TV to anyone and Amazon's shipping service.

Reviews.Title: Still beautiful
Reviews.Author: iamblade
Reviews.Content: I love this product, no matter what anyone says. Best TV on the market.=D

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: James H. Frelich "shoe man"
Reviews.Content: I did some comparison shopping -best buy, circuit city(going out ofbusiness) and ended up at Amazon. I'm very happy with my purchase. I saved $300.00 plus and also sales tax. Delivery went smoothly and sodid set up until I had to take the base off the tv to mount it on the wall. You need  a magnetic screwdriver to take the base off. Once that happened I am thrilled with the picture and appearance.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 650  52in LCD HD works great
Reviews.Author: Alan Kellman
Reviews.Content: I ordered this through Amazon and it was shipped by Vanns. I got it quickly, and it works great. The HD is great, I had it for the Super Bowl and I had a party. Everyone was impressed.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Barbara Notko "Barb"
Reviews.Content: I viewed every LCD out there and this TV for the money is off the charts. I ordered it, it was delivered just like Amazon said. The picture is outstanding, easy to use. If you decide to by this product you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Lovin it!
Reviews.Author: C. Kachulis "C Kach"
Reviews.Content: TV was even better than expected.  I was watching this tv for about 8 months.  I have read review after review and decided that this was the tv.  The final decision was when my neighbor bought the exact one.  I went over and fell in love with it.  Picture quality great - sound quality great - look great - Amazon great to deal with, great customer service - delivery co, i read some negative things but I can say nothing but positive things.  They even went as far as taking off their shoes when entering the house.Great experience over all.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 is Hot
Reviews.Author: Marasmas
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great quality, great sound, great features.  I couldn't be happier with this product!  This TV needed to sit at an angle on a fireplace hearth so the the swiveling base was a pleasant surpise.  The side panel contains contains easily accessible input connectors for s-vidio, a USB port for video and audio files as well as an HDMI port.  Highly recommended product.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: I want to thank all the previous entries on this TV because it was very helpful.  I also want to mention that the delivery was great, efficient, and right on time.  Mikefyi - The purchase coincided with the promotion of NFL.com.  I forgot to remove the bar code from the box but the operator at NFL.com said they will accept a copy of the cover page of the user manual.

Reviews.Title: 52" lcd Samsung (LN52A650)
Reviews.Author: J. Dee Teague
Reviews.Content: I could not be more pleased.  What an improvement from my 6 year old 65"  projection.  Viewing from an angle is much better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: W. Stillman "desert horticulture"
Reviews.Content: Likes, excellent viewing performance, and angle viewing.  The only dislike is the sound system --poor quality, unless used with a separate system.Purchase went smoothly, and delivery was excellent.  The single delivery person, brought the TV into the residents, uncrated it, placed it on the stand and hooked it up --could not have been smoother.Initial set up was a breeze, as were using the HDMI ports --would highly recommend Amazon and their contract delivery systems

Reviews.Title: Great TV with good value
Reviews.Author: Busy Bee "zsjuhsu"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV on after-Chritams sale.  So got a good price for it.  Delivered in a week.  First LCD TV and don't have up-to-date Blue-ray DVD player and other sound system to go with it yet.  So haven't really ultilize its full function right now.  Still, we enjoy the nice new TV with regular programing and it fits nicely in our family room.  The red trim on the TV matches the new TV stand that we got from Costco.  The only thing that I don't like is the sound quality.  Maybe it's because we don't have suround sound system.  It's still #1 rated TV on Consumer Report and we don't change TV by chasing the technology trend.  So it's a great TV for us and we love it.

Reviews.Title: couchpotato
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Dewey
Reviews.Content: Great product!  Clarity of picture is amazing.  HD with Directv is a great combination!  Setup is easy no issues of any sort!  Delivery took a bit longer than expected but wait was worth it!  Price was more than competitive with the free shipping and inhouse setup plus sales tax savings makes this purchase a no-brainer!  More than enough audio/video options for current and future connections!  It's hard to watch the non-hd tv's and channels once this samsung came into our lives!  Have fun!!

Reviews.Title: Great Big HDTV
Reviews.Author: B. Stevens
Reviews.Content: Great buy and great service all provided by Amazon. Ordered and received within 5 days. Sure wish there was a REAL universal remote [to include satellite], cuz the one with the TV is so cool!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 TOC TV
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Garrett
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV about a month now and absolutely love it.The picture is amazing in HD and is far superior in SD than my Panasonic. I am NOT a audio/video guru, just a guy who thinks this TV is the best value on the market.I run all my equipement through my Denon 1909 AV receiver, and could not be happier with the sound from my Bose surround sound speakers.The delivery was as advertised... the TV was brought into my living room, uncrated, set up, tested, and all packaging removed. A great buying experience.I did not considered the higher end TVs... $4000-$6000 dollar range so I can't make a comparison. But this TV is certainly the best of it's class in the $2000.00 range!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 review
Reviews.Author: Steven E. Stombaugh "Flyboy"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had shopped at the big box retailers and decided, based on viewing, this was the TV we wanted.  I shopped price and found Amazon to have the best price, especially when it showed up in my gold box deal... 8-)  I ordered it on Monday night, it was delivered to my house first thing (7:45am) Thursday morning.It was easy to hook up, offers as good or better picture than expected (HD, with ATT uVerse), great sound, etc.  My only dissapointment is that the remote will not operate my DVR/cable box.

Reviews.Title: 2nd Purchase
Reviews.Author: Patrick Foley
Reviews.Content: Bought the LN40A650 in November and was so impressed that I bought the 52" model and love this one even more.  Great price and great Amazon service.  As a side note, Pilot Air delivered my second unit and their service does not compare to Ceva Logisitcs who delivered from my first unit.  Overall, great product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650, Amazon, & Pilot Freight All 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: Ray L.
Reviews.Content: First, I would like to thank all the previous individuals who took the time to write reviews which helped in my decision making.I just received my LN52A650 yesterdy. All I can say is WOW!  Cnet, Consumer Reports, and the majority of nice folks here are correct. This TV is spectacular!  Easy to set up. I was up and running in less than 15 minutes(cable box, DVD, and home theatre).  Fantastic color out of the box.  Will still do some tweaking to see if I can do better, but I think I would be hard pressed.  I want to mention that the off angle viewing is not an issue. I was watching Duke & N.Carolina last night and purposely stood way off to the side (well over 90 degrees)and saw no color degradation.  I haven't notice a glare issue either.  The room were using it in has two windows, and a sliding glass door all along the left wall, and equal to or beyond the seating area.  It certainly doesn't reflect anymore than our old Sony CRT did.  TV 5 STARS.I received it from Amazon in less than a week from ordering. Easy to track, and as usual great communication from Amazon.  AMAZON 5 STARS.Pilot Freight was the company that delivered my TV.  I received a call from them on Saturday (ordered on Thursday)to set up a delivery time.  I told them Wednesday would work for me, and so we agreed upon a time between 12-4pm.  A two man crew arrived at 12:20pm, introduced themselves, and asked where I would like the TV.  After showing them the location in our house, they advised me that sometimes the boxes are dirty on the bottom, and that I might want to put something down to keep the floor clean (a nice touch).  They had it out of the box and on top of our new home theatre furniture in no time.  They even took extra care in making sure no damage was done to the furniture (another nice touch). WE thoroughly checked for shipping damage, and thankfully none occurred.  They then plugged it in and made sure it powered up, and that the remote worked.  They also offered to take all the packing material and box with them, or if I wanted to keep the box, they would gladly take it to the garage or basement.  These guys deserve mention because of the extra steps they took.  I was concerned about Pilot after reading some reviews here, but I guess I got lucky and got outstanding delivery service.  PILOT FREIGHT 5 STARS

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Landis
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV after spending a few weeks reading everything I could about the latest wave of LCD's.  It came down to the Samsung or Sony and I typically go to Costco for these types of purchases.  Costco had a Sony however it was a lower end model that did not have the 120Hz.  I figured I should get the most I could for what I could afford.  The TV is fantistic and the HD sattelite is a real eye opener. I went with Consumer Reports top rated model (this one)and saved by buying through Amazon.  Free shipping and no sales tax really made a difference.  I was somewhat concerned about buying something this expensive online but Amazon delivered it quickly and efficiently as usual.  Overall I could not be happier with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Terrific!
Reviews.Author: Dee J. Danner
Reviews.Content: I researched before buying and this is everything they said it would be and more. Great picture! Amazon shipping was terrific! I would not hesitate to order big purchases from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: BEST of the BEST
Reviews.Author: Despo444 "Despo444"
Reviews.Content: I have to say that this was by far the best purchase I have made on Amazon to date (the television was better than I could have imagined).  The picture quality is so vivid and lifelike, even on Standard Definition channels.  I have had friends come and see the set, only to go online and by one themselves (I'm telling you, beautiful picture).  Blu-rays stand out, and it's almost scary the quality.  I have since purchased another one for our bedroom because the Sony LCD we had could not compare - trust me that is not an easy sell to your wife when you already HAVE a good working T.V., but she even commented on the difference being so overwhelming it was justified.  Bottom line, FANTASTIC buy at the prices offered right now - you can't beat it (and I may even shell out for one more, just in case ;) ).

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Rivera
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52A650 lcd is a FANTASTIC SET!!! Amazon's White Glove Delivery Service (Pilot Freight Services) was PROMPT and COURTEOUS!!!I highly recommend this LCD SET!! THANKS AMAZON!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great Value!
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Rivera
Reviews.Content: This TV rocks... have had it for about 2 months now and loving it everyday. I use it mostly with HD cable and as a computer monitor to watch movies from my laptop. Image is pretty crisp and clear in both cases.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD 52 inch TV
Reviews.Author: John E. Gledhill
Reviews.Content: Came in a timely manner.  Was installed by the carrior.  Very cordial procurement and installation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!
Reviews.Author: Happy Customer
Reviews.Content: This TV has exceeded my expectations.  I love everything about it.  Amazon was great to work with and the TV shipped quickly without any problems.  I highly recommend the TV and buying it from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Tv for my setup
Reviews.Author: B. Chiang "redheaven"
Reviews.Content: I have done extensive research on a good lcd tv for me. The LN52A650 fit the bill with the right price and right size. The unit I got was very new( manufacture date december 2008) and it had no backlight bleed or flashlighting or the mura effect. CEVA delivered my tv promptly and without hassle. I have heard bad reviews of CEVA, but I guess it depends on where you live. I live in NJ so I guess the service is better here.Playstation 3 games look awesome as well as hd movies. The gloss on the screen is not very noticeable. It adds to the color depth though and the black level, which is superb!! I guess I am use to the gloss since I upgraded from a CRT TV.Best purchase made.

Reviews.Title: Very nice LCD
Reviews.Author: Robert Miller
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice LCD.  I bought this LCD without first viewing the Touch of Red.  For me, it is a nice change from the same old boring black.  It is truly just a touch of red.Performance is outstanding, picture is unbelievable.Menus are easily navigated.  I have been using it for only a few weeks now, and so far I am very impressed.

Reviews.Title: Super TV.......Great delivery service!
Reviews.Author: Buster Brown
Reviews.Content: I was a little reluctant to make a purchase of this size online, but after reading the reviews decided to give it a try.  I couldn't be happier.  Amazon promises "white glove" delivery and that's exactly the kind of service we received!  Delivery came very quickly after our order date.  We were called to set up date for delivery, an enclosed truck arrived, two gentlemen carefully unloaded our 52 inch TV, carried it in the house, unpacked it, set it up where we wanted it and checked it out.  They even offered to take all packing materials with them.  The TV arrived in perfect condition!  The gentlemen that delivered it were just that; Courteous and careful gentlemen!The TV is great.  I don't think you can find a better picture.  I will certainly recommend this TV to anyone wanting a terrific picture, and I'll also recommend Amazon's delivery service!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: JudieInNV
Reviews.Content: The TV was delivered on time with free White Glove service.  We are loving this TV.  The picture is amazing and we have no complaints about the sound, even though we haven't hooked it up to a home theater sound system yet.  However, we are not audiophiles.  We can understand why this model was rated #1 in Consumer Reports.  The remote is easy to understand and use.  Currently, we only have the satellite receiver and an old DVD player hooked up, but setup is very easy and switching between devices is a snap.  I'm not a big fan of the color red, but the red in the frame isn't as distracting as I thought it might be.  Overall, we couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Matthew J. Sutton
Reviews.Content: The picture on this tv is absolutely incredible, much better than other tv's I looked at that were significantly higher priced.  White glove service was excellent as well.  Overall, not a single complaint.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Texas Cheyenne
Reviews.Content: This model Samsung is actually a better deal than the two models that come after it.  Great picture and works equally well with cable/Directv.The in home delivery from Amazon was handled perfectly, too.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" TV
Reviews.Author: Farhang Zandi
Reviews.Content: Samsung 52" TV with it's wide screen has a very clear picture. We really like it.  Amazon's service is great.

Reviews.Title: Christmass Gift
Reviews.Author: bandit "bandit"
Reviews.Content: I received it a little later than I thought I would get it.  The delivery driver was great, very nice and helpful.  There was no putting things together, just plug it in and start it up.In all I love the picture and the hole tv.  The only difficult thing was to set up the internet bridge.  In all a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Raymond J. Carrier "BMW 2002 Racer"
Reviews.Content: This is a great LCD flat panel and Amazon was a great pleasure to order from.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: SF
Reviews.Content: I've personally experienced this TV for many hours of game play and movie watching.  Stunning image...  and I don't even notice the "touch of red"

Reviews.Title: Great TV/Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Trae Schaefer
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv.  If you are looking for a 52' LCD - I highly recommend it.  The independent installer I used said this model was a great choice as it was one of the best on the market right now.  Not to mention the best price on it was at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: 52" SAMSUNG LCD 650 SERIES
Reviews.Author: Shirley R. Mckenna
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv from amazon.com right after Christmas. best price anywhere, including ebay.  no shipping, no tax. First large purchase like this on internet, and perfect transaction, arrived 3 days earlier than expected, white glove delivery included.  I am just thrilled with the gorgeous tv and the awesome HD pic. and dealing with Amazon.com, very easy to get to a real person.  will definitely use them again...and no fears of large purchases now on web.

Reviews.Title: Value buy
Reviews.Author: Carolina Vivy
Reviews.Content: We bought the Samsung A650 based on recommendations from the Consumer Reports magazine. We are happy with the purchase - TV looks sleek and nice, and the picture quality is good. The only thing I don't like is the sound quality. For best results, hook up a home theatre sound system and the TV will come alive. The Amazon purchase process, delivery and installation were easy and convenient. The hardest part was finding and installing an appropriate TV stand that we both liked.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: M. DUBORD
Reviews.Content: Samsung makes great TVs it has all the bells & whistles you could imagine and the picture is so clear - it's amazing!But Amazon ruled with free shipping, delivery and the in home set-up was an unexpected delight!!!  Way better deal than purchasing locally.  I saved $800 - the whole experience relieved my fears of purchasing electronics online.A Very Satisfied customer in Minneapolis

Reviews.Title: Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Joan in Gasport
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful product!!  The picture on the TV is magnificent!  We are very pleased with all aspects of this purchase especially the excellent service from Amazon.  Will not hesitate to buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Levine "Thumper"
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best TVs I have ever owned and Amazon was very good the way the shipped and put it in my home

Reviews.Title: Sansung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: architect
Reviews.Content: This is a huge improvement from my previous 720 P projection TV.  It has all the features you could want.  The picture quality is first rate and the documentation makes setup easy. The high cotrast rate and color quality provide a exceptionally deep level of image depth.

Reviews.Title: buy the best in picture quality
Reviews.Author: tek "Tom"
Reviews.Content: Samsung no doubt the best in picture quality. We purchased this TV on recommendations of friends and family. After our review of comparable TVs there was no doubt Samsung has the best picture quality!  Amazons price was unbeatable,delivery and set up was great! Our next purchase will be a 40 or 42" Samsung from Amazon for the office. We considered the 42"-46" for the family room, don't undersize go to the next larger picture you will be much happier.

Reviews.Title: Enjoy!!!
Reviews.Author: A. Sanitago
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this television greatly. It exceeds my expectations. Only thing I had a problem with was the delivery time but it was worth the wait.

Reviews.Title: Saved big $
Reviews.Author: S. Capps
Reviews.Content: We read reviews in Consumer Reports, did comparison shopping at big box stores, and purchased the Samsung 52 inch A650 from Amazon along with the the HDMI cable and surge protector.  We cancelled our original purchase of these three items at our local Best Buy because we could save hundreds of dollars at Amazon.  The delivery service was great, as promised.  This was, by far, our largest purchase ever at Amazon and we were a bit nervous, but no problems!  We would not hesitate to do it again.

Reviews.Title: SUPER!
Reviews.Author: Sandra "cowboy photographer"
Reviews.Content: We shopped local stores for this TV so we knew what to expect. It surpassed the comparable Sony brand by far with a greater contrast ratio and refresh rate. Just needed to complete our system with a Blu-ray player to take advantage of what the TV has to offer. Amazon beat competitor prices by $600 plus and provided excellent, speedy delivery as usual.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LNA650
Reviews.Author: Candido Rodriguez "NYCDTSGT"
Reviews.Content: I love this TV! It is attractive, lightweight and has great picture. It  has (4) HDMI inputs. Samsung customer service was helpful in set up. I had a problem because the TV would not accept the HDMI cable I had purchased for it(aftermarket). I went out and bought a monster HDMI cable and it worked. The remote is excellent and very functional. I haven't worked out the sound yet. It seems as though when im watching a movie I get a lot of the background sound instead of the actor who is speaking. I will follow up with samsung about it but besides that its a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LCD HDTV LN52A650-52 1080P
Reviews.Author: James Cuppy "GEM C"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorExcellent picture with easy to see control especially for older folks.

Reviews.Title: Simply Awesome
Reviews.Author: Gautam Gupta "GG"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about a month ago. And it's simply awesome. Picture quality is outsanding. Now I have read in many reviews, that the black colors are not deep enough and it shows. But, in order to get deep black colors you have to shell out a lot more money. So for the price, I think this is the best TV in the market today. i would recommend it to anyone. Amazon was awesome. The guys came in, unwrapped the TV and installed it. Very good service. If I were you, I would not give a second thought to this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this TV, the picture quality is terrific, and I couldn't be happier with the picture quality.The only complaint that I have is that I wish Samsung was more open with their compatibility.  They require that you user their LinkStick USB wireless device.  Also, I did not opt for the DNLA option on the 750.  However, I wish that I had as it would have made it easier to connect to PS3, etc.

Reviews.Title: The reviews were correct...
Reviews.Author: J. Crossland
Reviews.Content: I researched 52" LCD TVs and watched prices for about a month before purchasing the Samsung LN62A650.  All of the reviews/ratings that I could find pointed me to this unit and they were absolutely correct.  The pricing and delivery from Amazon just added to the overall success of the package.  Setup was effortless and the picture is unbelievable.  Even before the HD cable was installed, we noticed a signicant improvement in picture quality versus our old TV.  The only negative I have about the unit is the sound but it is about the same as all of the other LCD's on the market.  As prices come down further, this unit should be an even better decision.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 HDTV
Reviews.Author: Donald Kimmel
Reviews.Content: I am completely satisfied with this purchase. The white glove delivery, the price, and the excellent performance of the Samsung LCD HDTV exceeded my expectations.This is the first major electronic purchase I have done online and I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Dazzling
Reviews.Author: Janice Matson "buttons"
Reviews.Content: I have been researching and planning an HDTV purchase for months.  When I finally decided on this Samsung 52 inch LCD I just watched and waited for the right price and seller.The picture is incredible. I put in my Phantom of the Opera DVD and couldn't take my eyes off the vivid, clear, dazzling display.  I was in awe.I have had no problems with shut off so far and I don't even notice the reflection (I just retired a regular tv with glass screen so I guess my brain has learned to ignore it).I also purchased a Samsung Blue Ray player with Netflix access and look forward to their library of watch now movies that stream right to my tv.I also love the swivel stand.  I have living room seating in various locations and can just turn the tv to wherever I am sitting.Love it, love it, love it.  You won't regret this Samsung purchase!

Reviews.Title: how do all these people get inside
Reviews.Author: MJB "photoman"
Reviews.Content: amazing clarity and look. was dubious about this brand but read very positive review in consumer reports and went with it over the Sony.Glad I did!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52A650 rocks!
Reviews.Author: D. S. Harris "Avid Amazon Fan"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Samsung 52A650 model LCD TV for Christmas, and he is beyond happy with it as am I.  I saved a significant amount of money by purchasing it as an "open box" product from the Amazon Warehouse.  We both couldn't be more pleased with the product.

Reviews.Title: 52inch lcd samsung-650
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Clearfield
Reviews.Content: this tv is great.Its easy to operate,and the picture is fantastic.I looked at alot of tvs including sony,and the picture on the sony don''t even come close to the samsung.Buy the ln52a650 make sure it has 120hz.I love this tv,Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Awesome - no other word!!!
Reviews.Author: Erin K. Dunn "MomErin"
Reviews.Content: Great TV! We had been shopping for over a year and watching prices.  We hooked it up to surround sound and the Wii. We love it - great family time.

Reviews.Title: My first HDTV - L O V E IT!
Reviews.Author: J. Seaman
Reviews.Content: I waited and shopped and checked out Consumer Reports for months.  Arrived at what consumer reports rated best and then waited for it to drop below $2K.  It was all worth it.  I hooked up our PS3 and watched Bluray movies from Christmas to New Years.  I am so happy with this television.  Our family room is over 20 ft. long and the 52" is perfect for viewing from anywhere in the room.  If your room is less than 15 ft., you could go with the 40 or 42".  I have used all of the inputs except the vga.  I use a DVI to HDMI to view from my Mac.  Very cool for watching netflix online and youtube videos.  The USB port is great for view photos.  Sound is great, although I use a surround system.

Reviews.Title: Sound, USB, Remotes solutions
Reviews.Author: GNDNCR "River Runner"
Reviews.Content: -PICTURE Detail for regular DVDs impressive, for Bluray,you feel you're in the movieHaven't been able to solve multiple remote problem so watch with 3 remotes to control TV, bluray player and Comcast CableSound is fine for high quality DVDs but I find myself going back to catch a phrase that was mumbled by actor and feel I may get an Onkyo system to enhance soundGot USB connection by pre ordering it 3 months before I got the TV--found it to be in short supplyI have had the TV for 3 months and am impressed by its performance--it makes me critical of the quality of movie theaters and impatient for the DVD release of new movies

Reviews.Title: Amazing Samsung 52" LCD tv
Reviews.Author: Beverly P. Watts
Reviews.Content: I am really impressed with the service and price from Amazon on this t.v. I shopped forever before deciding on the Samsung 52". It was easy to set up with my satellite service and the picture is amazing. I couldn't be happier with the transaction or the t.v. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Diane Parmigiani
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Researched many televisions before deciding and I am very happy with my decision. Colors bright and crisp as is the picture and sound quality. There are enough ports on this TV to add games, DVD player, receivers, etc. I have to say something about my experience with Amazon.  If there are consumers out there leery about using websites for such an expensive purchase they can feel secure using Amazon. I had this TV in my cart for some time before deciding to buy it. The cart was updated regularly and by the time I did buy it the price had decreased significantly. I for one do not know any other website that does that.  Amazon keeps the consumer informed. Add to this free delivery and deferred interest I am secure in knowing I got the best price from anywhere else. Oh yeah the best thing the TV was delivered the day after purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: Lance Pickard "lancep97"
Reviews.Content: This TV was bought to replace a 42" plasma and it blows it out of the water in regards to picture quality and brightness.  The depth of the tv isn't as shallow as I would've liked and the sound leaves a lot to be desired, but the picture definitely makes up for it.

Reviews.Title: Superb picture !
Reviews.Author: Craig A. Moss "mossman"
Reviews.Content: Have had this LN52A650 for going on 3 weeks now.  Sit in front of this thing with my jaw hanging low and drool coming out of the corners of my mouth !!  I watch programs just to see how clear and clean the picture is, never mind what the show is.  During the evening, my wife and I will say probably 4 to 5 times..."I can't believe the picture on this thing".  Very happy with my purchase and honestly trying to think of a way to buy another for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great Samsung LCD!!
Reviews.Author: M. Bykowski
Reviews.Content: We received the TV per the "white glove delivery" from Amazon. The service itself was great except that when we were notified that the TV was in town, it wasn't actually delivered for another 8 days!! Once it was delivered and set up in the house, that service was totally fine.The TV is wonderful!! We haven't experienced any of the problems that some owners mentioned. It's a beautiful set, so if you're wondering if the red finish might put you off, just the contrary. It gives it a really rich look. The picture is awesome and once you roam through the different settings that you can use and get more familiar with them, it's a snap to use.We were a little leery at first about making such a big purchase online, but we price compared all over and found this to be the best deal. We saved almost $1000 over retail, by the time you figure in the price difference and paying no taxes on the item, free delivery and set-up. We watched the price on Amazon for almost three weeks (they did vary from day-to-day). It was almost like watching the stock market!! All in all, we've been very pleased with the TV. Also, bought a Samsung Blu Ray on Amazon and got another great deal...... MB 1/16

Reviews.Title: AMAZING!!!
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Great first buying experience here with 6ave.com and Amazon....The TV itself is amazing - great blacks, exceptional color accuracy, and great overall picture quality.... it has surpassed my expectations. It is now truly a joy to watch sports in HD. Everyone who sees this TV loves it. I had a small problem with the shipping and Amazon took care of the problem immediately. They could not have possibly been more customer friendly. They followed up on every phone call and email and took every step to ensure that I had a positive buying experience. I would now highly recommend Amazon.com for any purchase and will surely be back myself. If you are worried that you may be taking a big risk buying such an expensive item online, I would say don't be... Amazon's A-Z guarantee has you covered....along with Samsung's 1-year manufacturer warranty, you can't go wrong. I am %100 satisfied with Samsung, 6ave.com, and Amazon. Thank You Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Choice
Reviews.Author: B. Dickson
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the purchase of this TV.  The purchase through Amazon was great and delivery was outstanding.  The company called to schedule a time to deliver.  They unpacked the TV and used a flashlight to make sure that there were not any scratches or cracks in the screen.  The men plugged in the TV to make sure that it worked and then repacked.  I ordered the Cheetah wall bracket and had the TV mounted and working about an hour after unpacking.I found the remote easy to use.  My 4 year old has already mastered it.  Picture is great and we have not purchased a surround sound yet, but the factory speakers are really impressive.For the price, this is a fantastic TV.

Reviews.Title: Impressive picture
Reviews.Author: Lartech
Reviews.Content: Bigger is better and this TV is impressive in size and a good clear picture. No reflection issues with the screen. I don't notice the touch of color and that's fine with me. Standard TV is acceptible and HD is awesome.Go ahead and jump!

Reviews.Title: Delivery Review
Reviews.Author: Barbara Stephens
Reviews.Content: I just received our new tv. We are waiting for direct tv to come on Monday to set everything up for us but I want to comment on the delivery. We orginally went to Circuit City and chose this tv set. The price on Amazon is 500 cheaper for the exact same set plus freee shipping and delivery. I read many review here online and we deceided to give it a try.The delivery people called to set up a time. They came the very next day and right on time. They carried it in, took it out of the box, turned it on and explained what they were looking for. They suggested we keep the box until our set is all up and running and we are sure everything is ok. They were polite and friendly. I recommend to anyone thinking of such a big purchase to go with Amazon. I'll come back on and write a review of the tv itself after we have direct tv come on Monday. They are bringing a new box and disk for the HD and we are getting the dvdr with the box too. I hope we like it. Please don't hesistate to go with Amazon and their surperb delivery service and of course the price is great!!!!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful
Reviews.Author: Elsie J. Arnold "TV Addict"
Reviews.Content: We love this TV, it  is the clearest picture we have ever seen and we have been around a long time... If anyone is thinking of buying a new TV please look at this one first, because once you see it,,, you have to have it.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Gerard O. Couture "Gerry"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorAs I said, WOW. After a month of looking at every tv out there and reading all the reviews I must say I feel realy good about this tv. On high def digital progams the pics are great, The light reflection off the screen is not a problem. This tv is really made to watch movies, that is where you go WOW. The delivery from amazon went on time and the white glove treatment was good.I hope it we be trouble free for a long time. Recomend, YES.

Reviews.Title: 52" Samsun TV
Reviews.Author: Tapdancer "tapdancer"
Reviews.Content: The clarity of the TV is outstanding.  When a dog appeared on the screen, my dog stood up, went to the screen and started sniffing, where dogs usually do.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV, Picture Quality is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Michael Petrow
Reviews.Content: I received the Samsung A650 just before Christmas. The white glove delivery wasn't quite what I expected.  There was 1 delivery person (Pilot, not Ceva) who could not carry the box into my house on his own so I helped.  Not a big issue considering I was there, but If you couldn't provide the help it would have been a problem.The picture quality is excellent.  The only issue I have is the reflectivity of the screen.  The windows in front of the screen are clearly visible during the day and does distract from viewing. This was the same issue with my CRT but at a much bigger scale with a 52 inch screen. I read many reviews on this issue and most didn't consider it to be a showstopper. Nightime viewing is absolutely amazing.  I'm struggly with an exchange for the XBR6 although reflections will not be totally eliminated and the XBR picture does not have the same contrast and brightness as the Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I have owned...
Reviews.Author: G. Tate
Reviews.Content: Researched buying a new TV for several months and had a hard time deciding between plasma and LCD. Finally chose the Samsung LCD over the Plasma for several reasons. The plasma seemed to have to many restrictions compared to the LCD i.e. weight, picture quality and finally handling. What I mean by handling is that everywhere I researched the review always mentioned keeping the plasma upright at all times to keep from damaging the screen. In the final analysis the LCD seemed to be more rugged.Comparing the two at a local store I actually preferred the LCD over the Plasma. Brightness was the big factor. Both pictures are fantastic but I give the edge to LCD.I have Dish TV, Apple TV and a Onkyo 606 all connected via HDMI. They all work fine. The CEC HDMI communication on some of the features do not work properly but I put this down as the CEC standards set by the different manufactures, each have their own quirks.Watched the Titans game the other day and that was great in HD. The 120 MHz motion program worked great and I have it set at medium.The complaints on glare I have read about have not affected me. I am in a great rooms with lots of light. The only glare I notice is the reflection on the black bezel around the screen. Setting the picture viewing to Dynamic I feel cuts back on a lot of glare.The menu setup list is great. When you select the menu item there is a brief exclamation what that feature does listed at the bottom of the screen...nice touch.Had the TV for 5 days and no problems. Really enjoy the HD and movies more now.Malco theatre has probably lost a customer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Y. Qian
Reviews.Content: Amazon is a good place to get this TV.  Price is the lowest among all the vendors.  Delivery is superfast. Scheduled to deliver in 9 days and actually delivered in 3 days. The TV is as described and the Samsung LN52A650 is the best.  The touch of color (red hue around the frame) is actually very appealing and subtle.

Reviews.Title: make the samsung logo in the front light up...
Reviews.Author: John J. Hyun
Reviews.Content: excellent unit with not too many faults. Make the SAMSUNG LOGO in the front light up and it will look better.120Hz refresh rate really does not make that much of difference in everyday viewing situation.Can't complain about the performance though...

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Kupp
Reviews.Content: Arrived very quickly, no issues out of the box. Had some trouble getting the base off. Bought motorized mount and they work well together. Have had it 3 weeks and have yet to find the Touch Of Color. The picture is UNBELIEVABLE!!! Amazing color, sharpness, depth and brightness. Love all the abilities to adjust. The only issue I have is on non-hd channels, in whatever format the picture is being pushed, you cannot adjust out the line at the top without losing some of the picture. Changing the ratio does not help. Regardless, I would buy this TV for all the rooms in my home. Very good picture, value, price and speed of service.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture-Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: A. Kahn
Reviews.Content: You are definitely getting your money's worth with this TV. It is very easy to navigate and the picture quality is incredible. I highly reccomend this television.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Thomas M. Hauserman
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV based on a radio show that was reviewing the best LCD TV's. This unit had very high marks. When I ran a blue ray dvd all I could think of was WOW. The color, picture and qaulity are fantastic. Watching football & hockey is amazing on this TV. I would reccomend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 52" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: HERBINI "HERBINI"
Reviews.Content: THIS TV WAS DELIVERED IN A TIMELY MANNER, IT WAS WHITE GLOVE DELIVERED AND SET UP. THE TV IS GREAT AND WORKS PERFECTLY.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV, Hate the Shipping
Reviews.Author: M. L. Becker
Reviews.Content: The tv is just awesome.  Absolutely 100% happy with the tv so far.  Oh wait, 99% happy...  The TV has a loud chime when you turn it on and off and I have not figured out how to turn it off.  But other than that, it is perfect.I had problems with the white glove service delivery.  The shipping company only sent 1 person to deliver the tv.  So he couldn't lift it by himself.  He didn't want to take it out of the box and said all he was to do was deliver it in the box.  There is definitly an issue between the shipping company and Amazon.com's white glove promise.

Reviews.Title: Quick comment about the Amazon stats for this TV
Reviews.Author: D. Payne
Reviews.Content: I just received my 650 yesterday (Jan. 8, 2009)  and am thus far happy with it. I have one comment regarding the Amazon.com stats for the TV... if you look at the connectivity features under the "learn more" heading, you're likely to find that the TV supposedly has two RF antenna inputs (ostensibly one for a coaxial cable TV connection and another for over-the-air antenna). This is incorrect. The TV has one RF input. So, if you're planning to use a coaxial cable connection (not HDMI or component) AND an over-the-air antenna, you'll need to scrounge up or purchase an RF splitter switch (aka an A/B switch) for your cable TV and antenna. If you're going to pay for HD cable or satellite, I suppose you're probably going to use one of the HDMI or component inputs for the Set Top Box. If this is the case, then you won't need an A/B switch.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: George S.
Reviews.Content: Have been using this HDTV for about two months and its performance has been outstanding. Over-the-air HD programming is great with this unit.Free delivery arranged by Amazon was great. In less than a week after my order the delivery company called to set up a convenient four hour window for delivery. When the unit was delivered, the delivery personnel were very courteous, asked me first whether I wanted them to unpackage it, removed the unit from its box, set it where I wanted it, plugged it in and verified that it turned on.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV.
Reviews.Author: Aldo222
Reviews.Content: Agree with other reviews. Excellent TV quality and picture. I will highly recommend.The only thing that I'll improve is reduce response times from the remote, from the time it takes to turn On/Off and from the time to change input sources, but I guess that's the standard for HD TVs.

Reviews.Title: everything CR said it would be!
Reviews.Author: JL
Reviews.Content: as I usually do when I make a major purchase, I researched LCDs on Consumer Reports and this was rated the highest (82/100). It really does have the best picture on the market. We also later bought a Samsung blu-ray player and love the Anynet feature which automatically finds the player among all your components. It took a few days to hook up with the local shipper in Miami and a long day waiting around for them to deliver. Other than that we're very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, good features
Reviews.Author: J. Bridges "gen x'er"
Reviews.Content: This has been a great tv.  Picture quality is nice, convenient remote control features for picture sizing, favorite channels, swivel stand, etc.  The red border on tv frame is hardly visible so don't let it sway your decision.  A couple things I'd note is there is a spinner button on the remote.  You're supposed to use it in menus to scroll, but it doesn't go quick if you spin it quick, kind of intermittent fast/slow.  Annoying, but still works.  Also PIP, picture in picture, it seems to only work if the main screen is a video input like a video games or player, then the 2nd screen can be your TV.  I would like the opposite but it doesn't seem like it can do that.  Also, switching sources, say from game to tv seems slow, but maybe they all are.  Overall I love this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Aleta Keegan
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52A650 TV is the greatest.  Clear pictures, GREAT action views and fantastic picture size.

Reviews.Title: A clear winner
Reviews.Author: Brandon Wang
Reviews.Content: The TV: unbelievable!  Coupled with HD channels, it totally changed my TV viewing experience.  I spent so much time watching it, so much so that one of my new year resolution is, guess what, to watch less TV.Amazon: always delivers.  Great buying experience.Delivery: Pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Braves scout "Steve"
Reviews.Content: I realize "great" is used too often...however...after researching televisions for at least 8 months before making a purchase...the Samsung LN52A650  was the BEST choice for me!  Outstanding picture, sound is fine...I've heard others complaining about it. The remote is exceptional...very user friendly.  Made a good choice on a GREAT product.  I'm very, very happy.

Reviews.Title: Best LCD TV in its class
Reviews.Author: R. Stewart
Reviews.Content: I did extensive research for a 50"+, 120hz, best picture, and all around great LCD TV. My research led me to this Samsung. Consumer Reports also gave it Top Pick.

Reviews.Title: On Terrific HDTV
Reviews.Author: Albin Kulvinskas "Rocket Scientist"
Reviews.Content: After months of research my oldest son in CA and I both decided that the Samsung 5 Series and 6 Series were the best LCD HD TVs. He purchased a 4665 (predecessor to the 5 Series) early in 2008 and I waited till the 52 inch version could be had for under $2500. I bought the LN-52A650 5 months ago from Amazon, and as others had warned, I needed to download and install new firmware to eliminate the random shut-down events. The TV features are fantastic and Hi-Def and normal Cable reception shown just great. The upscaling to 1080P from the DVD player in my rather ancient Sony Home-Theater-in-a-Box shows considerable improvement in DVD viewing quality and I am looking forward to Blu-Ray home-theater-in-a-box when that becomes more affordable. I would like to note that the family research has been confirmed by the recent Consumer Reports' ratings on LCD HI-Def TVs that placed this set at the top of the 52-inch LCDs and the Samsung 46-inch and 40-inch at the top of their peers as well. CRs evaluations were hands-on for the different sets tested and if you are looking to get your first LCD Hi-Def television, I would suggest that you spend about $4.00 and buy the Consumer Reports Dec. '08 issue and take their advise on your purchase. If you are getting ready to spend about 2 grand on a purchase, the more research you do, the better assured you will be that you will not regret your decision.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: Shixiong Hu
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after reading the reviews and testing out the TV at Sears.This was an awesome step up from my old 27" tube. It was dazzling! I received the latest firmwire pre-installed. Pilot shipping did a great job unpacking and setting up the TV. Even standard quality (Cable) channels look incredible.

Reviews.Title: All I expected and more!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: A consumer reports top pic. A fantastic TV. Light. Large. Fantastic Picture. Amazon shipper CEVA does a great job of delivering undamaged.Only issue is with the Anynet feature for the remote. The remote with this TV will not operate a Direct TV Sat box. Get ready for multiple remotes.

Reviews.Title: 46" was planned set, then 52" was loaded in my truck
Reviews.Author: Philscbx
Reviews.Content: Much has already been said of this set.It has plenty of ports on the back, and nicely placed ports on the edge just out of view.Even the rear shell design is a classy look.I studied these sets for more than 2 years, and was set on the 46", but when the 52' was not much more, it was loaded in the truck.I picked up at same time the Yamaha RX-V3900 theater which needs to be set up yet.Also a 37" for out in the shop hanging up over the shop door on it's Omni Mount.The 52" is in the office.Granted basic cable isn't very impressive, but the Digital feeds, are Oh Yea.Can't wait to purchase a few Blue-Ray discs for the new player. Iron Man comes to mind.*This set has been a learning experience with the info button on any source, you now see that most DVD's are only 720p and some cable channels down to 420p* Here's a tip about the Omni Mount hanging a 37" not shown in any documents if it's going over a door.Make darn sure you have a good 3" above screen to ceiling or you will not get Tv to access the mount hub.I struggled with the 37" on a ladder wondering what the hxxx is going on.No warning to mounting clearance is in the directions when near the ceiling.The mount allows the 37" to be viewed in any direction and still plenty of clearance above the door.The 52" remote/Now talk about cool. Just go near it at night with the slightest touch and it lights up.Cables/Granted I have extreme distance for the second screen in the shop, and I ended up with 35 foot HDMI cables.I would seriously look at bluejeanscable.com recommended by avsforum.com.They have the largest gauge wire in their high end cables, far more reasonable.Reflection/I don't seem to notice it much.I have to stare hard to see it, but otherwise, a great looking screenI'll update The Monster Garage as it progresses.I need to acquire the tools and make HDMI cables myself in the future.I've had to make cables similar to digital phone systems in the field.Those crimping tools are 250.00.Cheers UPDATE JAN 2012It's been a while, and It took a while setting up this complex system for two separate parts of the building with rack tower between.This is so different that any setup on the planet, And why it took so long,No Speakers can be anywhere near the floor,They all sit secure at least 5-6 feet off the floor, including 1500.00 Klipsch passive sub.The only downside playing at level (0), is putting the siding back on the building after a tour with Pink Floyd.Both of these Samsung's in my shop the 52 & 37 are flawless.But there is one strange thing with the interference that is given off effecting my Niles Remote Control system for the Rack of components in the next room.This had taken me a couple years to somewhat figure out.If I lower the brightness of the 52, then the interference seems to go away.The interference activates the IR sensors in the room for the Niles remote that controls the theater for two systems. One in the shop & one in the office where the 52 sits, plus both huge ground shaking sound systems.Making it almost impossible to use the Yamaha's remote to control the system.There is a forum avsforum of just this IR interference at [...].This is where the Stereo /Tv Gods live.The thread on my stereo is 195 pages long, that's how complicated it is.Some have claimed to cure the issue with applying tape over the remote sensor , or a piece of solarizedsunglasses.I haven't tried the sunglasses trick yet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Ln52A650
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and relied heavily on reviews to make this purchase, so I feel it necessary to leave my own. I LOVE this tv!! I bought it specifically to watch football games, and it's great! Amazon had a great price, so I bought it and am absolutely in love! Finally got an HD cable box from my cable company, connected it via HDMI cable to the tv, and I've never seen such a clear picture! The sound quality is great as well. I highly highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Amazing.. awesome TV worth every penny
Reviews.Author: dvinay "vinny"
Reviews.Content: 52A650 is amazing. Though little heavy with the base, the swivel base is useful to adjust the horizontal direction. Touch of red color and unique transparent cabinet border extensions makes this TV eloquent and sophisticated. We loved it. Ordered HD Dish and boy I imagined what I was missing for so many days. Amzing picture quality, deep bright colors. Please watch Planet earth, Coral rif from HDnet, Science channel, and National Geography and you will appreciate more. Haven't seen such splash of colors on any other TV including sony. Absolutley no calibration required. Just adjust brightness based on room light and you are done. Every TV has the screen reflection problem little or more. When samsung TV is tuned on, you will forget about screen reflections. absolutely not noticeable or none due to bright and flawless picture. Dusted off my old UHF/VHF antenna and tuned the channels. And Whola...it captured 17 local HD chanels(NY, NJ area). Didn't have to pay dime to Dish for local chanels. The local chanels also look amazing. So before you buy HD antenna, give a shot with your old ones. Overall satisfied with Samsung 52A650. Can't describe more.

Reviews.Title: Feels like you are there
Reviews.Author: Brain
Reviews.Content: The size of the screen and brightness makes you feel like you are part of the movie or sporting event.  Sometimes you will see a drag of some images but when you connect with a Yamaha receiver using surround sound and Blu-ray it is like being at the movie theater.  Purchased HDMI cables on Amazon (not Monster type) and also saved.  HD from cable company is great but non-HD do not have the quality you would get with picture tube.

Reviews.Title: Amazing color and clarity!
Reviews.Author: LadyR
Reviews.Content: This tv is simply AMAZING!!!!  Perfect color and clarity. Purchased from 6th Ave Electronics through Amazon and shipped via Manna Distribution Services.  Received in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: M. Fusaro "cosmic1too"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and soul searching before making the purchase of my Samsung LCD TV and I have no regrets or second thoughts.  The Amazon price was great, the delivery service was excellent and the product performance met all my expectations.I'm very pleased.  I was a little hesitant because of the new Touch of Color bezel. I had tremendous reflection issues with my old TV screen, but I'm happy to report that it hasn't been a problem.If you're on the fence, don't hesitate.  It's a beautiful TV, looks great in the room and the picture is superb.

Reviews.Title: I would buy it again.
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: After using this set for about a month, I see why Consumer Reports rated it first in its' class. Nice!

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture for the price
Reviews.Author: CCP "tc"
Reviews.Content: I can see why this TV is rated so well, the picture is much better than the Sony 52" LCD we returned to purchase the Samsung.  We're very happy with this set and I have yet to find any faults.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture- right out of the box
Reviews.Author: R. Jacobs "MJ"
Reviews.Content: Great television. We love it- it has re-newed our interest in watching movies again. My only complaint- and this is very minor, the power switch and other touch controls on the front edge of the TV are worthless. Why did they waste the money. Oh well-- buy this TV you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Happy
Reviews.Content: I really like this tv.  Upgraded from 720p LCD projection tv.  Great improvement.  It does have reflections the old tv didn't have.  But not a problem.  The funny thing is I don't notice them during the day with the curtains open.  But I see them at night and it's the wall I see not the lights.I have it connected to my PC via super VGA cable.  Looks great.  At first I used a cheap cable I had lying around and had ghosting problems, bought a quaility cable and cleared it up.Only draw back was my tv was shipped through Pilot shipping and it took them 13 days to get here.  Amazon with a simple phone call and one step up the food chain did give me my shipping charge back.  Yes they say free shipping but they hide the cost you see, but they know how much it is. Upon delivery the guys did a good and fast job.  Only 15 minutes and they were out of my house and I was enjoying my tv.Blu Rays look fantastic.

Reviews.Title: New dimension to DVD viewing
Reviews.Author: Sarasotan
Reviews.Content: The clarity of picture of this TV makes DVDs look superior to any I have ever seen. The blacks and color trueness and separation are outstanding.And of course this quality is present in watching regular TV programming, whether HD or standard. I've seen some criticism of the handling of SD, but I see no problem with it. It is certainly no worse than other TVs on that. It's just a matter of going into SD shows with reasonable expectations. SD is simply rather weak and the weakness is exaggerated on big-screen TVs. SD on this TV is fine and HD is phneonmenal. (My cable provider is Verizon FIOS.)The colors were set nearly perfectly, right out of the box. The contrast was set to 90%, so I reduced that to about 60 and made some other slight adjustments, but it is hugely impressive right out of the box and easy to set up.I can't speak to the sound, since I use a home theater system, and I rarely use the remote, since I am using a universal remote, but from what I have used of it, it seems fine.Some of the settings are buried deeper in the menus than I would like. There is a PIP function, but no button on the remote to access it. (The PIP allows you to view a channel in the TV input mode together with something from another input, but not 2 channels in the TV input mode, since there is only one tuner). To access it you have to scroll deep into the menu.Overall, I am hugely impressed with this TV. It is replacing a 3-year-old Samsung 50-inch DLP. I was always very happy with that old TV, but I would say this TV makes that one seem ancient. This is the best TV quality upgrade I have ever had (and I always seek the best) - a higher upgrade than the reasonable price indicates.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased.
Reviews.Author: Archie Rowland "L. Potter"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this product since my spouse is extremely happy.  I must admit that I enjoy the TV as well and at our age it is easier on the eyes, and it is a new experience.  I look forward to several years of watching sports and NASCAR.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Pam H. White
Reviews.Content: I have this tv mounted above a fireplace and it looks great, has a crisp picture and the sound is good. I had no problem with the set up of the tv and no problem with the software causing it to turn off. My HD stations are clear and crisp. I need to switch back and forth between hdmi and tv since some stations are not broadcasting in hd and that is a pain, but it is more a problem with my cable company than the tv.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Neil Mclaughlin
Reviews.Content: HD and this LCD go hand and hand. Very happy with this Samsung. Did not need the extra bells and whistles with the 750 and 850.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture quality
Reviews.Author: Swedgeman "Swedgeman"
Reviews.Content: One word  breathtaking. Never owned a true HD TV before and can honestly say the picture quality is absolutely magnificent. Had the Samsung for 5 months and had no problems..touchwood. The sport coverage makes you feel as if you are really there and wildlife doumentaries are so life like you almost have to check under the sofa for snakes!!

Reviews.Title: Great shipping service
Reviews.Author: Steve Ecuyer
Reviews.Content: I had read the reviews and had even seen this TV in local stores,but I was most concerned about shipping damage.  Pilot did a great job and the box looked like it had just come out of the factory, not a scratch on it. As I expected, the picture is great, and in my opinion the sound is much better than some reviews I had read.  Less than half hour out the box, I was watching TV.  Football games have a whole new meaning watching on this TV.  And to top it off, I saved about $700 compared to the local stores.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Thomas K. Lefler "indyhntr"
Reviews.Content: This TV is simply great, I went from a 26" tube to this TV. There is no comparison in the quality of picture and the size is perfect. Any bigger and the picture would come out of the TV. The options for making picture changes are very easy navigate through and even explained very well for those that don't know all the TV feature terms. Iknow it has a higher rating on the controls than other TV's, but I think the layout of the controls for Rev. & Fast Fwd could have been located so it would be easier to control using your thumb. The buttons are clear at the top of the controls. Overall, I now know why this is rated the #1 LCD TV out there, because it deserves to be.

Reviews.Title: After Months Of Searching For First HDTV
Reviews.Author: dukeofjuke
Reviews.Content: I waited patiently until the most important aspects of the perfect LCD HDTV were finally realized like 1080P, 120hz and motion blur. Only then did I decide to take the plunge and buy a HD TV. My timing was right and now I believe that any near future improvements/advancements in TV picture quality will be inconsequential by today's standards and manufacturers will likely focus their attention to things like energy efficiency, weight saving and panel thinness.With that said, I wanted a 1080P LCD HDTV with the best picture quality available. After spending months reading, comparing, viewing and scrutinizing the specs for all 50" or larger LCD HDTV's, this LCD HDTV is the best one bar none. I've had it two (2) weeks now and I still can't believe the quality of the picture.Please don't take my word for this sensational HDTV. Just look at the sheer volume and overwhelming number of reviews from happy customers. The proof is in the satisfaction of ownership.

Reviews.Title: What a great TV
Reviews.Author: K. Carl
Reviews.Content: This TV is great.  Picture quality is out of this world.  Feels like you are sitting in the room with the actors.  I was looking at the Sony Bravia, but this one was $600 less and had the same if not better picture quality.  Definitely the way to go!

Reviews.Title: Slim & Sexy
Reviews.Author: Star Hunter "Carpe Diem!"
Reviews.Content: What a great deal Amazon had on this TV. We are thrilled with the beautiful design, awesome picture, ease of operation.My husband researched many different brands & features of TV's. He decided on this one because it had everything he was looking for in one TV. Especially the price!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Reza Shifteh
Reviews.Content: Everything about this tv is amazing. The biggest difference I notice between this and my Sharp Aquos is how great football games look. The 120 Hz refresh rate is great. I was skeptical at first, but am amazed at how big of a difference this makes. Great buy, you wont regret it!

Reviews.Title: Exceeds Expectations
Reviews.Author: Amazon Addict
Reviews.Content: It's all been said here before but this TV exceeded my expectations.  Very happy and will buy Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: Plainsman
Reviews.Author: South Dakota "Plainsman"
Reviews.Content: This is a fine television and works just fine as set up by the manufacturer. I don't think anyone will be disappointed with the picture or with their purchase of the product.That said, it isn't perfect. There is a little uneveness in the scan across the screen. It is like a very light shadow in one part of the screen that only shows when the picture is light in color and lacks any detail. I don't know if professional adjustment would eliminate the issue. It isn't enough of an issue at this point with which to bother.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TVs
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: TV is great.  Manual leaves a little to be desired.  It explains all the adjustments and settings, but does not give you any help as to exactly what they do or how to figure out the best settings.  For example, the TV supports 120 Hz processing, which you would assume is always on.  But you can set it to off or one of three settings and there is no advice as to how to pick the best setting.

Reviews.Title: 52" Samsung LNA650 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: L. Keith Folkers
Reviews.Content: Picture is remarkably clear and color is outstanding. Sports programs are particularly impressive. I am very satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS THE BEST TV, PERIOD!
Reviews.Author: Dale Colbert
Reviews.Content: THIS IS CONSUMER REPORTS BEST TV ON THE MARKET. THEY ARE VERY MUCH TRUE.I LOVE THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Ashe "QuikSilver"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV.  Fast and courtious delivery from the seller.  It arrived in excellent condition and I'm very pleased.  I'd defintely buy from you again.  Thanks.Robert

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Harold "Harold"
Reviews.Content: Just a great picture.  The broadcast HD images, in particular, are just incredible.  Although this set features four digital (HDMI) inputs, there is only one S-Video input and two composite video inputs, one of which doubles as a component video input.  That makes it a little tricky to connect up a collection of older, non-hi def set top boxes, VCRs, and standard DVD players.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Josh "Man of the House"
Reviews.Content: I've had the TV for a day and think it is great.  The non HD channels aren't the greatest, but the Full HD channels are awesome.  I went with the LCD because I have a fair amount of light coming in from windows.  I also bought the Samsung BlueRay but haven't watched any movies on it yet.  Delivery was great, the delivery person called the day before he would arrive and set up a time.  Had 2 guys show up, carry it up my stairs, unpack and take the box.  I was able to lift the TV up onto my stand myself, it's half the weight of my old 36" CRT.  I can't wait to watch football this weekend.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV and Great Service
Reviews.Author: Green17
Reviews.Content: My TV just arrived yesterday, so I have not had too much time to play with it, however, the initial comment I would make is that its absolutely perfect.  The picture is top notch, especially for those channels that broadcast in 1080i.  Couldn't be happier with the TV.My experience with Amazon was also great.  I bought the TV on black friday, the day after the price had dropped by $100, and Amazon was kind enough to refund the difference in price with absolutely no hassles.  The entire conversation with their service rep took less than 5 minutes.The delivery service was also great.  My TV was shipped first to Pilot, who then handed it off to Meyer as Pilot does not deliver TVs larger than 52 inches.  The people at Pilot and Meyer were very helpful and I was able to pick a window when I would be home with ease.  The two guys at Meyer brought the TV in, took it out of the box, and placed it on the stand.  As it was cold out they recommended I wait for the set to come to room temperature before turning it on, so I did not test it.  As a result of that I held on to the packaging, which they would have taken away if I'd asked.  They were in and out of the house in about 5 minutes.Altogether this is a great purchase for anyone on the fence.  Great product, fantastic service and delivery.

Reviews.Title: samsung 52" lcd tv
Reviews.Author: Gerard Bawiec
Reviews.Content: great picture and sound. nice little extras like a swivel base and a remote with large buttons. easy to connect up  home stereo system components. the red touch of color border has been commented on by friends as a unique great idea. great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: R. Knobel
Reviews.Content: I had this TV for 3 weeks now. Delivery was fast, on time and no damages. I bought this TV from Amazon. TV looks very good. The picture quality is amazing. Sometimes some shows look like real picture. Did not have any issues yet. Had to read manual in order to find the touch panel. Has enough HDMI inputs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV impressed with Amazon, good delivery by Pilot
Reviews.Author: Lee S. Rossavick "Leefeller Guy"
Reviews.Content: AFter much thought and wringing of hands, the 650 turned out to be just right. Glare is not a problem for us, fine we may have to turn off a light or close a blind.  So the 630  in my opinion would not have been necessary with the flat screen.Delivery by Pilot was much better than expected, they had called me to make a delivery appointment, the dispatcher  who was in Hayward, was on top of the delivery and she kept her word.  Two guys showed up in the deliver truck,  I asked if they could removed my old 46 inch very heavy TV off the stand. They said they would, I was worried because  it is so heavy I do on know if I can lift it.  They unplugged and disconnected the cables and  moved it across the room for me.  Then they Removed my  new 650 from the box and placed it on the stand, could see no damage to  the box or the TV,  they plugged in the TV,  placed batteries in the remote and showed me it was working.  I signed the papers and they left.  Not many stores would have come  out to my place and done the extras. Since I live 16 miles from the closest town, I had figured on a Freight Truck delivery and they would not do more than kick the box out of the truck, but Pilot came in a van and made it a pleasant experience, they made sure the TV was not damaged.I hooked up everything else myself and it works great.  What  great pictures we get with Dish HD programs and my 1080I DVD player, not sure if I will feel a desire for a Blue Ray player?Originally I was going  for a Plasma TV, but after researching,  the lower energy use of the LCD Samsung, plus it seems LCD's have less problems than Plasma.Watch the prices on Amazon they move up and down, I was lucky  we purchased on a low price day.  Great deal with Amazon and free delivery, you cannot compare it. .

Reviews.Title: Great Crisp Picture!
Reviews.Author: T. Marlow "lost40000"
Reviews.Content: The picture on this television is awesome! It's actually kind of freaky watching hi-def compared to the dlp we used to have. The colors are very crisp, the ambient light glare is minimal, even the non hi-def is really clear.The touch of color is hardly noticeable but I personally find it attractive.What I'm not crazy about is the sound is mediocre (we  have a surround system, so that fixes it,)and the  reconfiguration from regular to hi-def and vice-versa lags a bit. [...]

Reviews.Title: Far surpassed my expectations!
Reviews.Author: Henry Iovinelli Jr. "Henry I"
Reviews.Content: This TV is definitely at the top of its class.I own an older model Samsung (LN4041), which  is a 720p unit, and it was time to upgrade to a 1080.  I have been looking at this LN52A650 for quite some time, comparing it to other manufacturers and models, and checking prices.  The 50,000:1 contrast ratio, 120HZ, and 4ms response put it at the top of my list.  When I finally bought it, I couldn't wait for it to arrive!On the scheduled delivery day, I was told to expect delivery between 11am and 3pm, with a call 30 minutes prior to arrival.  That call came at 10am - earlier than I expected, but fine with me!  At 10:30, they arrived.  The delivery men brought it into my living room, unpacked it, put it on the stand, plugged it in, opened the remote, put the batteries in, and handed it to me.  After verifying that the TV works, I signed their paperwork and they were on their way - about 10 - 15 minutes, and back to work for me.When I got home that night, I couldn't wait to finish the installation.  I have a wall mount for this, and all I had to do was take the old one down and put the new one up.  Well the old TV is pretty light (about 50 pounds), so it came down easily.
