Well this new one is much bigger and heavier!  It took about 6 tries before I got it hung on the wall mount, and I was pretty tired afterwards.  It was recommended that I have help doing this, but I didn't think I needed it.  Looking back, I now recommend a second person.  The last thin you would want to do is drop your new $2000 TV while installing it.Once installed and connected, I turned on my new TV!!  The last channel I was watching was Spike HD, so that's the first thing that came on.  Star Wars III was playing when my new TV booted up, and let me tell you, the picture and sound were simply AMAZING!!  It looks 100 times better than my other TV.  I'm not sure if it's the 720 vs 1080 or the size difference (or both), but I couldn't be happier with it.  Every channel, whether HD or not, looks incredible.The controls are pretty straight-forward.  I didn't need to read through the manual to figure out the basics, although the manual is well-written.  I also have a Samsung blu-ray player, and it still auto-detects it even though it is plugged into my Sony receiver.  I have the TV hard-wired to my internet router, and it easily set itself up.So far, after 2 weeks, I can't find anything negative to say about the LN52A650.  I looked at the A750 also, but the only difference between them was the additional storage capacity, which I don't need.  Also, the A750 does not included picture-in-picture, and while I don't use that feature much, I want to have the option.If you're thinking about buying this TV, I highly recommend it.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: just what the doctor ordered
Reviews.Author: K. wilson "forkdude52"
Reviews.Content: Must admit i was worried about buying something like this online. But have no fear Amazon came through with flying colors. Speaking of colors all i can say is WOW this t.v is awesome it really delivers the goods. I did a lot of research and had decided this was the one for me. Delivery was as promised and i did purchase some 1.3 hdmi cables from amazon for 10.00 bucks a piece and they work great with my blu-ray and yahama rec. with hdmi and 1080 passthrough. sports , movies hdtv and even basic cable stuff looks sooooo good. You can plug in almost anything to it to. DONT BE AFRAID  I RECCOMMEND IT HIGHLY

Reviews.Title: Extremely satisfied
Reviews.Author: A. Roemer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv in June (not from Amazon.  Found it cheaper elsewhere) and have been in love with it ever since.  Based on my purchase, I strongly look for Samsung products now when I am shopping for other electronics.  Picture quality is excellent.  Design is delightful.  My only complaints are 1.  it seems a little slow turning on or switching between devices (but that isn't much of an issue compared to the quality of the product). 2. The wireless connectivity seems pointless since all I can use it for is newsfeeds, weather, and stockfeed (I was disappointed that the wireless capabilities came out just as I purchased my tv and mine didn't have it, but as a pleasant surprise, Samsung sent me the wireless connection as a free gift after registering the product with them).I highly recommend this product and have no regrets (other than watching the price drop as newer versions come out).  Excellent tv!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Oscar Sebastian Reyes
Reviews.Content: I must be fairly lucky, I ordered this TV through amazon and was a little bit worried about getting a bad set...but It's perfect. No clouding visible to the human eye. Blacks are very black, better than the xbr4. It's almost perfect, some minor viewing inconsitencies but compared to every other TV I would rate this probably the best you can get(even though I have not seen any of the LED models). I even heard about the Pio Kuro Elite having noticeable smearing, and this set has basically none. I have no dead pixels, no smearing, no ghosting. I would say from everything I have gone through and through my research, this would be the best TV to get. Although the sharpness the XBR4 can outclass by a small margin, It's a big trade off for the consistency in the picture and the black levels. Most people probably wouldn't even notice. This TV is UNBELIEVABLE!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Basil MacDougal
Reviews.Content: This has been our first large screen TV and it is such a wonderful, clear picture.  It is great especially for watching nature programs or movies.  I have never watched as much TV as I do now.Our friends have a large screen projection TV and it seems to have a darker, fuzzier picture.  Plus, it fades out when you stand off to the side.  Our LCD does not do that.  This makes it perfect for our living room since we have a couple of chairs that are kind of off to one side--everyone gets to watch the same great picture.We've had our TV now for about 8 months and have had no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Incredible TV
Reviews.Author: D. Kadlac
Reviews.Content: I finally decided to upgrade from my 36" tube tv. I was debating between the 46" and 52" Samsung A650. I really wanted the bigger tv but didn't want to spend $500 more on it. Then I found out about Amazon's warehouse deals. I was able to get the 52" tv for $1640 plus shipping (shipping isn't free when it is warehouse deal). Even including shipping, I only ended up paying $175 more than the 46" new version.At first I was hesitant because the description says "cosmetic blemishes". But after reading the success other purchases had with warehouse deals, I was sold.The TV was delivered 5 days after I ordered it. It didn't come in the Samsung Box, but really, does that matter? I inspected the tv, but couldn't find a single thing wrong with it. Everything on it is amazing. Even after a few weeks, I'm still in awe when I watch tv.If you are like me and can't decide between the 46" and 52", go for the 52" warehouse deal. You save money and will be much happier in the long run.

Reviews.Title: GREAT DEAL
Reviews.Author: Crystal A. Shore "TAYLORGIRL"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv 3-weeks ago and couldnt be happier. I was really sceptical about buying it from Amazon but after reading reviews decided to take a chance.It was delievered in 5-days.The truck driver brought it into the house,unpacked it and hauled away the box.It took me about 5-min.to hook up and have playing, the picture is beautiful.Some complained about the remote but I have no problems with it or with the red around the frame which is hardly noticable.Havent had any problem with it shutting off either.So far so good and saving 800.00 was even better!!

Reviews.Title: Great LCD
Reviews.Author: Frank H. Holliday
Reviews.Content: I read some bad comments about  the sound. All I know is We have nothing bad to say about this set. 52 " was the way to go. Hardly ang glare even with window faceing the set people around me say all I need do is open the curtins so they can watch from across the street. When I called cable company for my HD hookup the sales man asked what TV I had bought when I said SamSung he guessed it was the A650 model and that he was going to buy one also.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded expectations
Reviews.Author: jhklck
Reviews.Content: The Samsung tv exceeded our expectations.  The picture must be seen to be appreciated.  The Amazon delivery service were truly white glove service!  Set up wasn't that difficult.

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Hung Gar
Reviews.Content: I moved up from a Sony 40 inch lcd to this one primarily to enhance my movie experience. I don't watch TV, so I can't comment on whether it handles HD broadcast better than other brands, but I can tell you, this has increased my movie watching pleasure by 100 fold.... I didn't go out on a limb with tweaking the picture since I have a close to ideal environment for an LCD with no direct light hiting the screen - I just put it on movie mode and it is close to perfect.Delivery was anothe story; this is NOT "white glove" delivery. Pilot was the shipping company and they used a local contractor for delivery here in North Florida. Apparently, they don't take Amazon's promise of what they will do for you when they deliver the set very seriously. The guy was nice enough (I guess because I agreed to help him carry the set in off the truck), but he obviously wanted to get out of there and didn't want to carry the box with him (I ended up discarding it myself). After I helped him take the top part of the box off, he only went so far as to plug it in the wall and make sure it powered up. He wouldn't have known if there was an issue with dead pixels or not. If I had planned to put it on a stand, he would probably have felt put out to help me put it there. Pilot didn't bother to tell some of it's subcontractors that Amazon had claimed they would perform these services and they were expected to perform them...Oh well, the TV works fine, and I have a good back, so I'm not terribly put out with the free delivery.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV and fantastic delivery service
Reviews.Author: D. Harvison
Reviews.Content: We've had our TV now for over 3 months and it has worked flawlessly.  Great picture, lots of input options.I was looking at this particular TV at Bestbuy and saved over $400 by getting it through Amazon.  It was delivered with the "White Glove" service which means that a local electronics company delivers it, unpacks it, sets it up, hooks up the wiring and tests it to make sure everything works properly.  We were truly amazed at the service.When we have guests over, they are truly amazed at the picture.  Of course, to fully showcase its picture quality, you have to tune into an HD station or play a dvd.  The picture is truly amazing.The built-in speaker is ok, but I ended up getting a Sony soundbar with sub. Hooking that up to the TV is very easy.This is our 3rd Samsung flat panel (we also have a 42" in the bedroom and a 40" in my office) and we're very satisfied with them all.

Reviews.Title: The best LCD on the market
Reviews.Author: Travis Goodnight "Gnight"
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this LCD screen.  Gorgeous picture and the touch of color around the edges make it look so classy.  The sound from the TV is definitely loud enough but I wouldn't plan for it to fill a large room.  Analog broadcasts are inadeuate after watching HDTV but that is with every TV that's not CRT.  Fortunately everything is going digital.  If it isn't HDTV, I get irritated though.  It really spoils you, especially while watching footbal.Outstanding TV.  Great picture.  Good controls and inputs.  Adequate sound.  Great price on Amazon with shipping.

Reviews.Title: ln52a650
Reviews.Author: B. Romero "BR"
Reviews.Content: so far i am very satisfied with it. the white glove delivery service was a joke.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny...
Reviews.Author: D. J. van Arkel
Reviews.Content: I have to say like other reviews here I was a bit skeptical about spending this much online. However my doubts were laid to rest once the TV got here and the company hooked it up.  The picture is absolutely stunning, I watched iron man in blu ray and just about shat myself. The auto motion 120hz takes a little getting used to, and I even managed to get slighty nauseous from the blur. After a few hours the initially disorientation faded but I am still blown away by the picture. Watching movies is just ridiculous I feel like I could just tap them on the shoulder and ask them a question its so life-like. Worth every penny!!!As a side note my TV was shipped via a company called Pilot. I ordered the TV on a friday and the following monday they called to let me know that the package had arrived as reflected by the tracking information provided by amazon.com's website. They said that I would recieve a call in a "day or two" about setting up a delivery time. 3 days later I had to track down the company which the amazon representative said was a new shipping company and finally got their corporate headquarters on the phone. Lee and Jill at HQ were extremely helpful going out of the way to assist me. However I got transferred to Cecilia at the San Francisco office and what a rude @$&*#. After having to argue that i never received a call back and when it needed to be shipped she finally relented and agreed to the next day morning 8-12. Taking time off work to meet the delivery was not a problem, except cecilia screwed the pooch again and put it down for afternoon. I filed a formal complaint with HQ but if you ever get Cecilia just hang up or ask for Sharon. Anyways /rant off great tv however :p

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: C. Morales "shopper"
Reviews.Content: i just purchased this tv. i got the bundle package with the samsung bluray for a total of $1840 (free shipping). they were shipped separately. this tv is amazing and you will be pleased with your purchase. the only thing i wanted to note was that amazon no longer does a price match (as of sept 1st) so i would definitely watch the price fluctuations before you buy this tv.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TV review
Reviews.Author: R. Farnsworth "retired law enforcement"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and had some trepidation about ordering something of this expense on line but I have to say that I am quite pleased. Shipping and delivery were handled professionally with the new TV unpacked and set where I wanted it. Due to cold weather for delivery I waited about an hour for the unit to warm to room temperature before hooking things up and starting the set up procedure. I did have one immediate problem and that was a problem with the ON/OFF button for the remote control not working. I was able to get on an on-line chat with a Samsung Technician without difficulty and we went through a couple of things that did not work. He provided me with a link to order a replacement remote control but I wasn't able to complete that part of the on-line procedure. I then made a call to Samsung Customer Service and had no problem in almost immediately talking to a customer service rep. I told him of the problem and provided him with the on-line ticket number for returned merchandise. He took a couple of minutes to confirm everything and told me that a replacement remote control would be shipped immediately. I received an immediate follow up e-mail inquiring if I was happy with the way the customer service assisted me. The LCD it's self is beyond my expectations. The picture is fantastic. I took me a few minutes of experimenting with the remote (all other functions work fine) but I have been very pleased with the intuitiveness of the set up of the programming. HD channels are clear, bright, realistic. The 120hz refresh rate is a big plus as far as I'm concerned. It cleans up the action sequences very nicely. The only thing I would have liked is a bit more boost to the audio capabilities. I haven't hooked it to my Hi-Fi yet but don't anticipate any problems.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased with product and shipping
Reviews.Author: R. Flint
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with this whole experience! I was a little nervous about spending a large amount of money on an item that I could not see prior to purchasing. But Amazon came through.... no problem. The set arrived with a special delivery service that called me prior to arrival so that I would be home. They unboxed it, turned it on to make sure it was working properly, and even offered to take the trash away. All for one of the best prices I could find anywhere. Great job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LCD
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey Williams
Reviews.Content: Researched this on Consumer Reports and Amazon. I've had it for about a month and all I can say is "toto, I don't think we're in Kansas anymore". Wow! If I knew TV could be like this I would have taken the plunge earlier. Got all the cool HD stuff, surround, blue ray disc. etc. Performs flawlessly. If you need more than this you have life issues that won't be settled by technology.Update 12-28-2012: It is now 4 years later and the set still performs flawlessly.

Reviews.Title: Even better than expected!!!
Reviews.Author: Emergency Ian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung 52 inch TOC 650 120Hz series LCD HDTV in August of this year (2008). Amazon's delivery service got it to my door several days earlier than the date given and I was kept informed of this early arrival inadvance. This was a delivery into NYC, and you never know what you're going to get, but the white glove delivery was just fine.As for the TV, it's terrific! The picture is just amazing. I honestly haven't any issues with the built-in speakers or the much maligned remote control, either. They do the trick for me. Also, I did not have any of the issues with the TV turning on and off, on it's own. I guess my TV's software was updated in the factory/production.If you've been considering buying this particular model, it would be an excellent purchase. It's well worth the money and the price continues to drop. I give it my highest recommendation. There IS a reason that Consumer Reports gave this very model it's highest overall rating (LCD HDTV's over 50 inches).

Reviews.Title: Annie,  AZ
Reviews.Author: Ann L. "Ann Langford"
Reviews.Content: Best Lcd TV, after much research, I narrowed my options to 3 Panasonic, Sony, Samsung. After several trips to different stores checking on price and comparing pictures. Samsung to me was a clear winner. Next choice where to buy. As it is just me, my biggest problem would be getting it in the house. Delivery seemed to be my best options. Nobody could match Amazon Sale price and it came with free delivery. They actually come inside and set it on the stand. I had the cables right there, HDMI and Sat.A great experience and a perfect buy.

Reviews.Title: fabulous TV
Reviews.Author: Alfons Wiegandt
Reviews.Content: Have a 42" Samsung in bedroom and replaced my old 50" DLP Samsung with this marvel.  Everything is exceptional.Con.  Am experiencing little more glare than I'd like with the screen

Reviews.Title: Best bar none
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Drake
Reviews.Content: Quick review.  This had the best picture when I compared dozens at Best Buy side by side.  All Samsungs had the best screens; the black is pitch and colors beautiful and sharp. Amazon had about $700 off the competition, so I bought it.  This is simply and by far the best purchase of just about any thing in my life. All Pros, I can't think of a Con.  It even makes many of the old shows (B&W; and Color) look HD: I was watching some 50's movie and it looked like it was filmed yesterday with quality video.  This is the best TV I've ever seen and by far ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52a650******Super
Reviews.Author: Vincent Laratta
Reviews.Content: We received our TV two days ago from Amazon and the whole experience was great.  We received the TV within 3 days after ordering.  "Pilot" the shipping company, was great to work with and went out of their way to deliver when we wanted...  The TV picture is spectacular and we have absolutely no complaints at all.  Amazon had a great price---$750 less than Best Buy, shipping was great, TV was in perfect shape, and picture is way above our expectations.  You would not believe the difference using your DVD(1080 capability) movies with this TV.  I can't imagine how good a blue-ray would look.  Five Stars plus with using Amazon.

Reviews.Title: REVIEW OF SAMSUNG LN52A650 LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Johnny S. Smith "ALBERTKING"
Reviews.Content: THIS TV IS AMAZING!  DELIVERY WAS RIGHT ON TIME AND WELL DONE.  THE PACKAGING IS VERY CONSUMER-FRIENDLY.  EASY SET-UP.  TOOK ABOUT ONE HOUR TO READ THE INSTRUCTION BOOK AND FINE-TUNE THE SET-UP(I AM A TECHNOLOGICAL CRIPPLE).  THE HD PICTURE IS SCARY GOOD!  I RECOMMEND THIS SET TO ANYONE.  AND AMAZON'S PRICE, SERVICE, AND CUSTOMER RELATIONS ARE UNBEATABLE.  GET THIS SET TODAY!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: S. M. Groff "Sports Fan"
Reviews.Content: So far, so good.  Great looking picture.  Looks just as good as a friend's Pioneer Elite Plasma at about 1/4 the price.  Amazon shipped it promptly and was delivered and set up to make sure that it worked by trained people that knew what they were doing.  I would certainly not hesitate to buy another TV in the future from Amazon and save hundreds of dollars off retain in stores.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV Purchase
Reviews.Author: Wood Duck
Reviews.Content: I has been a month since I have the TV. The rave reviews at Amazon gave me the confidence to purchase the biggest ticket item I ever bought through the Internet. I chose the Samsung LN52A650 model after months of research and contemplation. The CNET's Editor's Choice award helped too. I bought it with the Samsung Blu-ray player with an extra $200 off. What a deal to get HD movie quality! The picture quality is wonderful, clear, accurate color, etc. It is even spectacular after adjusting the settings recommended by CNET. For the price, I believe that the Samsung LN52A650 is a much better buy than the Sony's. I could see that the glossy screen might be a problem for others in bright settings. However, this is not a problem for me as the TV is in part of my basement that is away from windows. The CEVA delivery went very smoothly without any problem. I got a call from them as soon as the TV was at the delivery center. They delivered the TV in the time slot they said they would come. There were two guys, not just one guy as in some of the reviews mentioned here. They unpacked the TV and brought it to where I wanted to put in the basement. They helped me hooked it up and tested it before they left. This was a perfect purchase. No regrets! Thank you, Amazon for a perfect purchase.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic LCD
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "fift8"
Reviews.Content: I researched and shopped for a few years before finally making the investment, read all of the reviews and bought this baby a month ago and I am 100% satisfied, no regrets at all.  After setting it up, I went to a few links noted on amazon comment lists where it was said you can tweak your color and sharpness settings provided by other users.  After a few links and tries, I got even better reception than factory settings.  The HDTV channels are awesome, and even the regular channels look good on cable.  Watching football and sports on HD is really a treat every time.  The baseball playoffs and world series on this LCD was mesmerizing.  You cannot miss with this TV in my opinion and the price is unbeatable.  I used a DV cable instead of the connectors my cable company gave me, the cable connectors transmitted a weird kind of color glow.  I swapped the cable co. cables with a DV cable and BAM, perfect picture.  I live in Tucson and the white glove delivery was great!  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Jaspal Banti "jb"
Reviews.Content: my product arrived on time and it was in  very good condition and customer service at amazon was very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Magnificent!
Reviews.Author: Alberth Hansen
Reviews.Content: The Best picture quality. You may have the soap opera effect removed or you may leave it by using the dynamic contrast ratio.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD HD TV 52"
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: The set was very easy to install.  The picture is excellent.  Service from Amazon was excellent.

Reviews.Title: What can I say
Reviews.Author: J. Nuno
Reviews.Content: Shipment came fast, very well packed. I am not going to get into technical stuff cause you've probably already read about this. After I did inmense search on this TV, I finally bought it, and I'm so glad I did.I have owned home theaters sistems since I was a teenager. I have bought all kinds of displays, and I can assure you this is the best on the market today. New models like the 750 and 850 have almost the same features as this one but a bit more expensive.Believe me, if you are looking for the best TV at an affordable price, buy this one, you won't regret it. By the way, this red touch of color thing looks extremely beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Amazon service priceless!
Reviews.Author: B. Stuart
Reviews.Content: I took the plunge after reading the reviews and visiting a Circuit City store to see the actual picture quality. Before the visit, I was going to buy the Samsung 61" DLP because I wanted the biggest TV I could afford. But after comparing all the TVs, the picture on the Samsung 52" LCD was far and away the best. It was simply stunning. I went home and ordered it on Amazon. The total price, including no shipping or tax, was about $400 less than Circuit City..I must admit that I was a little leery about ordering such a item online, but it turned out to be a wise decision. When I received the TV, everything was fine except that there were some smudges and scratches on the bezel. I called Amazon Customer Care and they simply ordered a replacement. It came 5 days later, and it was perfect. Make sure you keep your packing box for at least a week in case you need to return it. Bravo Amazon!The bezel was important because it's simply gorgeous. The infused red color was a brilliant idea (there must be a woman at Samsung with come clout). And the picture on this TV is jaw-dropping. Everyone who has seen it has been blown away. You need to sit at eye-level to really appreciate it. ESPN never looked so good!I bought 2 HDMI cables from Mediabridge (on Amazon)to hook up my cable box and my future Blu-ray player. I also hooked up my Panasonic DVD recorder. Even my older DVDs look good. You can adjust the picture size to full screen by going into the picture mode, scroll down to picture options, size, and select wide fit. Wow! It's like I'm standing next to my hero Sherlock Holmes (Basil Rathbone of course)! I'm a movie freak, and there's nothing better than being totally immersed in your favorite films. (Make sure you go back to 16:9 size when you go to HD channels).If you have a lot of DVDs, you might want to check out discgear holders to keep them organized and each DVD pops up when you select it. They are so cool (QVC had the best price on them).I bought the 650 model because I wanted the swivel stand. I can now watch TV while I'm at my computer desk in another part of the room. I have an entertainment center with 2 huge black display towers and 2 upper connecting shelves. There is also a stand at the bottom with shelves and glass doors. I was able to move the towers apart so that the TV would fit on the stand and below the upper shelves. I put the cable box and recorder below in the stand and everything worked out perfectly.If you are considering a new HDTV and don't want to break the bank, you must see this one. You won't be sorry if you took the plunge like I did.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Value and Product!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: R. Puryear
Reviews.Content: After comparing televisions at all of the local chains and warehouse clubs, my wife and I both agreed that Samsung had the brightest and best picture of all of the LCDs.  The model that we ended up purchasing, the Samsung LN52A650, was a step up from what was being offered at the afore-mentioned stores, and we were able to purchase it at Amazon.com for several hundred less than the lesser 52" models, and on top of that, we paid no shipping or sales tax.  I figure that my total savings, compared to purchasing locally, was about $500!  The picture is incredible, especially with sports programming, and the sound is pretty good as well.  There were no 'dead' pixels on the screen, and we have zero complaints.  I would certainly recommend this television, and purchasing avenue, to anyone.

Reviews.Title: If only the sound...
Reviews.Author: R. Tarkanian
Reviews.Content: Bought ln52a650 after purchasing the 120 hz 47" vizio.  The picture on the vizio just didn't WOW me...this is my first time with an HD signal/TV...I wanted to be WOW'd.  I hooked the Samsung up...bam!  George Clooney is standing in my living room (O'Brother movie).  But, the sound, oh the Vizio was WAY better than the Samsung.  I still haven't bought an external sound system...I'm just not that into it.  You can make the sound enjoyable...either use the Movie sound mode or make a custom one, where it roughly forms a diagonal line, least on Treble, most on bass.  Most people claim the sound is "tinny"...this helps.  Very easy to set up...used HDMI cables from Costco.  The remote is fine...I only use it to re-size the picture and change from mode-to-mode (sports, cinema, game, off).  Touch of color is barely noticeable, really takes direct light.  No glare...only on dark scenes, shutting the blinds corrects. LOVE IT.One movie that looks great is The Astronaut Farmer. Many picturesque scenes.I will eventually hook up a Blu Ray player...will probably get the Sony 350.

Reviews.Title: So far... very impressed
Reviews.Author: C. A. Boehm
Reviews.Content: Impressive deliver of product as well as product performance! Delivery guys were excellent... box did not even have a mark on it and in 5 minutes it was unpacked sitting where I wanted it.  Hooked the system up in about 10 minutes and wow, what an experience! Worth every cent.

Reviews.Title: This is an awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Mendy C. "Mendy"
Reviews.Content: The TV picture and color is beautiful.  We love it!  Football is probably the most amazing thing because the colors just pop off the screen.  You can't go wrong with purchasing this TV.  Check the prices, Amazon probably offers the best....we looked at Best Buy and they wanted 2599 for the same TV.  Delivery was smooth and easy, I will always check Amazon first before going to the stores!

Reviews.Title: We love our Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Giuffre
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for our family room and it looks gorgeous. Also, the picture is fantastic! Watching HD channels, you feel like you can hop right inside the picture - it looks so 3 dimensional! The service from Amazon was outstanding; the delivery was quick and efficient. I was a little apprehensive about ordering such an expensive piece of electronics online, but I would definitely do it again!

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: Young Seo
Reviews.Content: -awesome image quality.-great price.-TV itself looks great.Just get it. won't regret. :)

Reviews.Title: Tough decision, but I beleive I made the correct choice.
Reviews.Author: Happy Buyer "Sunday Farmer"
Reviews.Content: I only buy a new TV after reviewing what's out there.  Right now there's a lot of quality merchandise to evaluate.  I think the Samsung I got is of the best quality available.  My Dish guy hasn't came to change out my receiver for HD yet, so not sure how much better the picture will get with HD. Right now the picture is very good and will possibly get even better.

Reviews.Title: LN52A650 is a good choice
Reviews.Author: James Ruffin "jrstriker12"
Reviews.Content: I've had the LN52A650 for nearly a month and I am quite satisfied with my purchase. This HDTV has a great picture and plenty of options to tweak to customize your picture. Some people complain about the reddish tint of the frame and also complain about a shiny screen. So far, I've found these to things to be a non-issue. On my HDTV, you have to look pretty hard to notice that there's any hint of red in the frame. In fact, I think it looks kind of cool.  Also, the screen doesn't seem to be as reflective as some people say. The picture is clear and strong, even with the drapes in my living room open. I'd recommend this HDTV to anyone. It also received high marks from the editors of CNET. Can't wait to get an Xbox 360 and hook it up to my Samsung.

Reviews.Title: beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: RI
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the quality of the picture - it is superb!  Amazon also delivered bery quickly.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV Fast Shipping Through Amazon
Reviews.Author: re chicago
Reviews.Content: The LN52A650 is great TV with an amazing picture.  We never really cared about HD or picture clarity before.  However, that is before we knew what we were missing.  If you purchase through Amazon and they ship through CEVA (eagle). You can call to see where your TV is.  I ordered on a Thursday and would have received the TV on Saturday, if not for a holiday weekend.  Amazon had estimated that I would have to wait one week to get my TV.  You need to call your local CEVA handler if you want faster service.  Delivery was the one thing I worried about for ordering such an expensive product on Amazon.  I would do it again, service was great and I saved on the price and tax in comparison to big box stores (~$500)

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!!!!
Reviews.Author: L. Legates
Reviews.Content: Just a note to start: I ordered the LN52A650 but received the LN52A750.  Since it was an upgrade from the tv I paid for, I didn't complain.  My review however will have to be on the 750 model.This TV has excellent picture, no blur even on sports!  It has great sound and looks awesome hanging on the wall!  The "red" around the edges is hardly noticable but looks really nice to me.  It was delivered VERY quickly - 3 days I think.  The guy unpacked it and turned it on before leaving.  It was very easy to start using.  I have NO complaints!!Amazon had absolutely the best prices on tv's.  Any of the sites with lower prices have horrible ratings so I will stick with my trusted Amazon for big purchases such as a 52" LCD!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN 52A650 52 in LCD tv
Reviews.Author: DJ Brydges
Reviews.Content: Love this TV. No let down. Delivery was free and went flawlessly. Saved 500.00 from the brick and mortar centers.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be happier with my new Samsung!
Reviews.Author: WileyG27
Reviews.Content: This set, the Samsung LN52A650, has been great right out of the box and enjoyable from the first time I turned it on! Having Dish Network with a HD-DVR doesn't hurt either. The set up was far easier than I expected since I did order a HDMI cable along with the set(paid less than $10), plugged it in got the initial settings done and got absolutely nothing else done for the rest of the day! Now fine-tuning has taken a while but it was worth it to get the clearest picture and the fullest color. And using the 'Tools' button makes it easy to jump to different modes such as movies or sports. It's my first LCD and I'm glad I waited until this set became available and affordable. Paid less than 2000 thanks to Amazon and it's well worth it. Can't wait to watch football tomorrow!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Steve Mann
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing LCD panel! The deep blacks almost make the picture appear 3d, imagages just pop out at you. The video processing actually makes standard definition channels much cleaner and better looking than any of the 5 other HD tv's/projectors I own or owned. I suspect that the Sony 120Hz LCD is good also, but with the lower price of the Samsun at Amaxon I am very pleased with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Impressive
Reviews.Author: Joseph N. Smith
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture and it looks great! Amazon had the bext price. I checked Costco, BJs, Best Buy, Circuit City, and other online stores. It was delivered on time and the setup was flawless. Every one that sees it loves it.

Reviews.Title: From the experts
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth H. Misich
Reviews.Content: Both C-Net and Consumer's Reports gave this Samsung LN52A650 their highest rating in the category.  I also read the reviews on Amazon and was therefore satisfied that I got the 2099 price.  All of the finer points like reflection weren't of great import to me. I watch lots of television, not much junk TV, and I quickly become accustomed to the screen and sound of what we have.  I like this television on the floor rather than on a table since we use it in a relatively small room where it's 12-15' away.  I very much appreciated that the delivery included unpackaging and setting up the TV.  There's sometimes a white flickering line that probably shouldn't be near the top of the screen. I'm sure it will all improve when I read the manual.

Reviews.Title: Another Rave Review
Reviews.Author: Ryan Maple
Reviews.Content: Got it off Amazon a few months ago.  Delivery was great -- two guys brought it in, unpacked it, and waited until I turned it on to check for dead pixels.  They carted away the trash and left before I could give them a tip (it was in the other room).The television itself is amazing.  Everybody who comes by mentions how much they love it.  The "touch of color" really is only a touch, if somebody complains about it then they are just being anal IMHO.Would recommend this television to anybody.  Great television, great price, great service... what more else is there to say?

Reviews.Title: Excellent product..excellet service from Amazon
Reviews.Author: racketmaven
Reviews.Content: I have been in the market for a top of the line HDTV for some time. Did my research, looked at TV's at the store and thought the Samsung 52" was the best choice. Was not sure about buying a big ticket item like this on-line from Amazon but their price was very competitve and the service had been good in the past.Couple of things:- Amazon service has been superb, easy ordering and the TV was at my house within 5 days. Delivery guys set it up, were on time and courteous.- TV picture is incredible. The colors are so vivid it almsot takes some getting used to, its that clear and defined.- Set up took all of ten minutes. Easy to configure and operate.Only downside is speaker quality. For a picture that good you need decent sound. The internal TV speakers are barely audible and the sound quality is poor. Buying $50 speakers and attaching solves the problem.In summary, great TV, great price and service from Amazon! Impressive...

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Fan "Amazon Fan"
Reviews.Content: From the moment of purchase to the delivery, this was a smooth process.  The product was received on the date that was promised, and the TV is awesome.  I read the reviews about CEVA, the shipper, and I was getting worried.  Maybe we just got lucky, but they were great for us.  As soon as Amazon gave us the tracking number, I went to their website and started tracking.  Additionally, I found their phone number for their office in my area and I called them.  They gave me all details and kept me informed of where the product was and when I should expect delivery, which the did not only on the day the promised but they called one hour earlier than delivery to confirm and where at my house exactly an hour later, so I didn't have to waste any time with this and was able to get right to work.If you are looking at getting this TV, don't be afraid.  Amazon group are professionals and their prices are much better than stores.  You will not regret it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: G. Michalak "Greg Michalak"
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I waited for this model to come out, it has a awesome picture that is so good I don't know where technology can do any better other than just adding whistles and bells. This new model (650,750) allows you to adjust the picture quality to 3 different levels, we watch the lowest other than a sporting event otherwise it looks like people are flat out coming out into our home theater in best mode and we don't need that.The info link is cool but falls into whistle/bell category, it's not really that useful, for example, of the 3 topics you receive from INTERNET is weather, well all you get is the temperature of your zip code, not so fancy and blocks my beautiful screen I'm wanting to see more.If your concerned about the "touch of red" looking OK or being obtrusive....when I do see it it's a soothing touch unlike under the bright lights of a electronics store, other than that it is hardly noticeable and looks more black than red to me.I highly recommend this TV, and if you have been waiting for the best or better stuff to get here... well it's here in my opinion.I bought mine for right at $2100 + instant $200 back on Amazon special of buying the Samsung newest blue ray player that was on sale for $279 (a $79 blue ray player!!! it don't get better). If that wasn't enough, I received 24 month 0% financing, and a $200 gift certificate from Samsung toward sports collectables.If the package deal at Amazon isn't enough today... wait a day or so and they will throw you a bone you will like as I have found.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and excellent delivery service
Reviews.Author: Dragonlady
Reviews.Content: For several years now my husband and I couldn't justify the cost of a large plasma or LCD TV, but after seeing the Sony 52 inch at Costco, we said wow they have come along way in price and looks.  After lots of research, we deceided to purchase the Samsung LN52A650 52 inch LCD and are we glad we did.  First the delivery only took 4 days from the day I ordered it and they unpacked it and set it up for me.  The TV picture is so clear and colors so true, it's like looking out a window.  We have alot of windows and doors in the room it the TV is in and we were afraid it would be like our old TV, where we couldn't see the picture until evening time.  But we have not have any glare problems at all.  The TV is a true dream and we can't believe we waited this long to purchase one.  It did take some getting use to such a large screen as we had an old 36" TV before, but after a few hours, we adjusted and now couldn't go back.  Amazon had a terrific price.  The TV is easy to setup and adjust, but the remote did take a little getting use to as part of it is a wheel and is very sensititve.  Highly recommend this LCD TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: G. Hale
Reviews.Content: Great product and great price.  Very pleased.  Delivery was on time and all I expected.

Reviews.Title: Great T V
Reviews.Author: bayou ben
Reviews.Content: I am not "electronicly" learned but this is a great TV. Picture great. Sound good, Delivery service timely and excellent. one con the picture makes things and people look larger in full screen. I would definitely recommend this set.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color
Reviews.Author: D. Satz
Reviews.Content: So far I am incredibly happy with the Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color. It looks great on the wall. Watching football on this set is absolutely awesome. Movies are better than a movie theater (if they are in HD).

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my decision to buy from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Guninder Bagga
Reviews.Content: This TV is excellent and I love it. Much has been said about this TV already so I can't add much.I do not have any HDMI components yet and I wish it had more S-Video or RCA connections.Amazon service is the best! The TV was delivered before the promise date and delivery was very smooth. Delivery company called and scheduled the appointment and then I got a call from the driver around 30 minutes before delivery time.I will definitely buy again from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: John Goltz
Reviews.Content: This samsung was delivered on stated delivery time with the white glove service as promised. I can highly recomend direct purchases from AMAZONJOHN IN SW.FL.Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorPS.THIS HD. TV. HAS SUPER PICTURES W/DIRECTV HD.EQUIPT

Reviews.Title: Great value - happy buyer
Reviews.Author: D. Burns "dburns105"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52A650 is a great value.  The picture quality is outstanding and the price is very reasonable.  For me, the biggest negatives are:1. the screen has more glare than other TVs.  The glare can be managed by putting the screen at the right angle.2. The glossy bezel with a touch-of-red is attractive, but also distracting - it reflects too much light; and who wants red on their TV anyway.  I would have prefered a no-gloss black bezelSome other reviewers complained about the sound and the remote control.  Both are fine to me.  I have a 5.1 sound system when better sound is required.I looked at both the new plasma Panasonic 50" 800U and the Pioneer Kuro 5020.  They both have very nice pictures, but their pictures don't look any better than this Samsung.  I'm happy that I bought the Samsung.Also - the Amazon white glove service was great.  So much better than having to go to the store and lug that huge TV box home.

Reviews.Title: samsungln52a650
Reviews.Author: Barbara W. Stechenberg
Reviews.Content: great tv as advertised.  had problem initially with flashing lights on cable hdmi input and required replacement of computer "motherboard" for inputs and now tv is perfect.

Reviews.Title: FANTASIC - BEST OF 2008
Reviews.Author: Noel Liu
Reviews.Content: I've read alot of reviews - ALL A++, I've listened to many - ALL A++...  If you're still thinking JUST GET IT and you will never regret it!!!

Reviews.Title: Purchasing experience
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This was the first time that I bought such an expensive item online and I had considerable misgivings about the arrival condition of the TV Set.  Amazon set a date for the delivery of the product and it came in on time and was in excellent condition upon arrival, Whew!!  I was somewhat confused about the rebate ($200) that I was to have received upon purchase.  The Rebate turned out to be for the purchase of NFL Regalia which I could care less about.  A Consumer Services Representative E-Mailed me and gave us a $100 gift certificate for the confusion.  Additionally Amazon also lowered the price of the TV three times during September as the price of the TV kept dropping.  Amazon demonstrated that they are a reputable business and has earned my gratitude.  The TV is great!! I have noticed that different channels of HD vary considerably in quality of picture.  HD DVDs maintain consistent quality throughout the viewing experience.  I will purchase a video disc for picture adjustments.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price!
Reviews.Author: DigitalFan
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. The picture quality is fantastic. Easy to mount on the wall. Only thing i don't like is you have to click on the source button twice each time you when you want to change picture source with the remote.

Reviews.Title: I agree with all the 5 and 4 star reviews
Reviews.Author: Michael Algarin "Michael"
Reviews.Content: I am not going to repeat what all of the other reviews say about this TV. All of the pros are true and so are most of the cons. If you are thinking about buying this TV, I would say buy it, for a TV in this price range you will not be sorry!

Reviews.Title: happy customer
Reviews.Author: Paul Bartolotta
Reviews.Content: i dont know what is better the 52"samsung or AMAZON  both were great Amazon made everything the best it could be I was still on the 30 day price guarantee and Amazon honered it for $200 I have always been happy with amazon and now even more so  oh yeah the tv was great out of the box Idont understand why people get it calibrated I cant see the picture getting any better than the PERFECT it is I will contue to be an AMAZON customer I have been looking at a26" for the kitchen  and a32"for the bedroom both samsung

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 inch LCD TV Start Up!
Reviews.Author: Paul R. Kelly
Reviews.Content: I recently upgraded from a 29 in. Sony CRT to a 52 in. Samsung LCD.  The unit arrived on time and in good condition.  The "White Glove" trucking company movers (2) were professional and located the TV where I requested, recommended I keep the box for 2 weeks (incase I had to return the TV) and noted that if any problem developed requiring return of the unit I should make all arrangements via Amazon.The TV has performed flawlesley from the initial "plug in".  My only concerns at this point are the poor quality sound and the picture distortion for some broadcasts.I'm told the sound problem is typical for the small speakers in the TV case and can be corrected by buying a Home Theater set up for an additional $300/$900.The picture distortion is not present for all broadcasts and seems to be  due to the type of input signal from my satalite receiver.  I receive input from a "DISH" satalite receiver.  The picture changes height and does not fill the screen for different kinds of signal input.  The signal is completely lost for some stations everytime a cloud goes by to the South of my dish receiver.  The (non HDMI broadcasts) picture seems to be streched to the sides causing the people to appear fat(er).  I can correct the height - fill the screen, using the remote control (P.SIZE) but this is annoying.  Samsung recommends using the 16:9 wide mode but also has a Zoom1, Zoom2 and 4:3 setting none of which are satisfactory for normal viewing.  A "Wide Fit" and "Just Scan" for viewing with no cut off for HDMI and DTV signals is noted in the Owners Manual but not functional on the Picture Options Menu.  Guess this comes later but is needed now.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: J. Gelvezon
Reviews.Content: This was my first big purchase on Amazon.  What a great deal!  The shipping by CEVA was very professional.  The two guys that brought it upstairs set the tv up and made sure it worked.The Samsung TV is beautiful and has a super clear picture in HDTV and Blu-Ray.If you can purchase this TV applying for an Amazon.com VISA card you earn rewards points. Chase(Visa) triples your points if you buy on Amazon for the 1st 90 days plus you get $30 back on your next purchase. I have additional $180 I will be getting back.  Don't forget VISA extends your warranty another year for free, just contact them.

Reviews.Title: All the negative reviews are wrong........
Reviews.Author: Justin A. Linker "a.k.a.  Dr. Justin"
Reviews.Content: Just like everyone else I did my homework on the different types of TV's and technologies that were out there.  It came down to the Samsung and the Sony Bravia.  The biggest difference besides price between the two was the glare factor the Samsung's were supposed to have, and the "touch of color" feature being irritating or unattractive.  Let me tell you both are false!  First, our TV is on the first floor and surronded by windows and we have never had a glare issue!  I can't believe it.  SO happy.  And the "touch of clor" feature is so subtle that most of the time I either can't see it or I forget that it is even there.  I am extremly satisfied with this television.  We are so satisfied that we will be buying the blue ray and surround sound Samsung players to compliment them.  I would highly recommend the A650!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic set!
Reviews.Author: Spart02
Reviews.Content: As my first foray into HD, I am very impressed.  The set looks great, both on and off.  The picture quality is fantastic.  I sometimes notice minor artifacts on fast moving scenes.  I have the feeling these could be eliminated with some of the advanced picture settings the tv has.  The Info Link has proven unnecessary, and I'd prefer they had left it out and knocked $100 off the price.  CEVA delivery was fast, but only one person was sent, and if I hadn't offered to help there might have been issues.  Some CEVA advice: follow the tracking information and call as soon as it says "Waiting for customer contact."  I did and it saved about 4 days off the delivery time.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding HDTV
Reviews.Author: Tom L.
Reviews.Content: This HDTV exceeded all my expectations.  Perfect picture right out of the box.  Minimal setup and when I connected it to the internet, all updates are automatic plus news, weather, and financial information can be displayed 24/7 in real time.  I am not sure what the "Red" refers to on the frame.  It is very faint and not obtrusive at all.  I highly recommend this HDTV or any model in the series.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase
Reviews.Author: Hud
Reviews.Content: I've had the tv for one month.  Met or exceeded all expectations.  Price - best I could find was Amazon and, after the price dropped, they refunded the difference to my credit card.  Delivery - great service.  Helpful and timely.  TV performance - terrific.  Picture is incredible, setup was easy, all were better than I expected.  I highly recommend this tv and Amazon's service.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is an awesome TV!  We were hesitant to get it because it said it has a "red" trim.  It has such great reviews from Consumer Reports and everywhere else we read we decided to go for it.  Thankfully it isn't a striking red... it's very subtle - the red doesn't stick out like I thought it would.Great picture!!!!

Reviews.Title: Super picture for my 1st LCD
Reviews.Author: sports648
Reviews.Content: Guess i'm lucky i haven't had the shut off problem.I thought that was mostly with the earlier models.Figured Samsung would have cleared up that problem mid-year.Mine says it was manufactured July 2008...So to hear some are still having that problem surprises me.

Reviews.Title: amazon's service is super!
Reviews.Author: Q. Su "njman"
Reviews.Content: lot of people already reviewed this TV. I don't need say any extra words to it. amazon's service is super. free, fast delievery, post purchasing price match,...

Reviews.Title: No complaints here!
Reviews.Author: G. BLAIR "GBlair"
Reviews.Content: A new TV is a purchase I could have kept postponing forever - there is always a bigger/better/brighter model around the corner. Then came the opportunity to buy the Samsung series 6 with "wife approval", as she wanted a new living-room floor and didn't want to put the old entertainment center back on the new bamboo flooring.I did all the online comparison shopping for size and features, then went to a big box store to compare models firsthand. In a side-by-side comparison, the Samsung model had a sharper, crisper picture than the Aquos. Amazon had the best price (and free shipping) of any of the reputable etailers, so I purchsed from Amazon.Shipping happened a few days sooner than I was led to expect - no complaints there! Initial setup was easy - defaults out of the box were quite usable. PS3 in one HDMI port (for Blu-ray), DirecTv HD DVR in another HDMI port and I was set.The picture is INCREDIBLE compared to my old 27" CRT set. You can see the writing on golf balls, the individual pieces of clag on the Formula One tracks, the scuff marks on the baseballs, etc... I was just blown away, and still am every time I switch on the set. I should have bought one of these when they first came out - I wasted a year!!! No complaints here...well, maybe just one tiny one. Would it have cost Samsung THAT much more to have included wireless network instead of just cabled ethernet?

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED
Reviews.Author: SD
Reviews.Content: First, I am VERY happy with Amazon's price and service! I got $350 refund after I purchased my TV because Amazon has a 30 day price guarantee. You can get a refund if you see a lower price for your same TV on Amazon and e-mail them.  They process the credit within a day! Check every day and you can request multiple credits anytime the price is lower for 30 days after shipment.Second, the television was the lowest price of any reputable internet shop and much LOWER than any retail store (Best Buy, Circuit City, Brands Mart, Frye's).  I saved about $1,000 compared to a regular store.I was NOT charged shipping or tax. The delivery service was good and they set up the television for me.  TV was delivered in perfect condition.The TV is great..Animation (Cars, etc) is amazing on this TV...HDTV, blueray, DVD, and playstation look great.Motion is greatly improved on this LCD with the 120MZ processing (you need to select if you want it turned off, on, medium, or high).  Motion on plasma may be incrimentally better, but the picture and color of this TV is #1!!!I am recommending Amazon to all my friends and you for electronics purchases...Also, they have cheap options for purchasing HDMI and other cables for your home theater.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 Inch 120Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN52A850 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with RED Touch of Color Best 52 Inch 120Hz LCD's I could identify in the market. Product was at a price far below Best Buy and Circuit City. It was shipped quickly with white glove installation in the home by the delivery person. Worked flawlessly from the start. It is a smart set and thus recognizes immediately other equipment attached. Thus it knows when the DVD has started or a photo SD Card has been inserted. It provides its own slide show for photos. One area that needs improvement however is the annoying time delay switching from channel to channel as a black screen stays in place far too long before the next channel appears. I have accepted the delay as part of the price paid in order to present the best quality picture possible. As for picture quality, I feel like it reproduces a picture at least equal to that being sent to it by cable, photos, etc. The quality of a 52 inch photo in a slide show presentation is really impressive. I am very please with this set and would recommend it to anyone who is interested in a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV Great Service
Reviews.Author: Andy Allan "Icee"
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV about a month and are very happy. It has an amazing picture in a fairly light room. I choose LCD over Plasma as the room it is is fairly light and I play a fair about of video games and any risk or burn in was too much. I did not want to to manage my viewing on any level. I use an up scaling DVD player, Xbox360 and pull in HD over the air. It has been easy to set up and use.A word about customer service the first model I had had significant scuffing on the bottom right of the bezel. Amazon customer service was great. They quickly validated my concerns and had a replacement model to me with no hassle in two weeks. I buy a fair amount from Amazon but I was nervous buying such a large ticket. They have made the experience great. I would definitively use Amazon again for a large purchase. In fact this was better than buying from a store as I did not have to carry this item around. The only problem with the delivery was that company they contracted with could only deliver on one day of the week. This caused some timing issues with my work. But it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Wayne W. Williamson "Wild & Wonderful"
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorGreat Product!!!!!  Excellent picture!  Great service from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: No Regrets
Reviews.Author: K. Johnson "Golden Gopher Fan"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a great product from a great retailer. From the better than promised delivery time to the very helpful white glove service to the quality of the product. I love my new LNA52650. Have not had any problems with the TV and my wife is happy too!, which is most important.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic picture, well worth the price
Reviews.Author: Wizard-of-id
Reviews.Content: This is by far one of the best HDTVs I have seen. The colors are striking and beautiful, the blacks are really deep. My friend has a Pioneer plasma and I was pleasantly surprized to find that this TV outperforms the plasma in some while matching the plasma in all other respects.The speakers are really bad, so you should invest in a home theatre system when you buy this. The remote is OK, but could have been made more attractive - I hate the clumsy jog dial. But the TVs performance more than makes for all these minor shortcomings.The red color on the bezel is lovely - all my friends liked it too :). One minor issue is that the bezel reflects a lot of light - but trust me, once you start watching the TV, you generally will be so enthralled that  you won't notice the bezel's reflection. Truly a masterpiece. Touchwood.The TV does take 3-4 seconds to start - not a big problem. The menu is pretty good.Overall, I rated it as a 5 star because of its superb picture quality.Update: Nov 2009================I've had this TV for 1 year now. No problems to report. The picture quality is beautiful as usual. I had a friend who had bought a SONY 52" Bravia, 120hz LCD 18 months ago. He regrets his decision after seeing the quality of my TV. Two other friends of mine have a Panasonic plasma 720p which they bought in 2005 and 2007 respectively. These TVs do not even come close to the picture quality of this masterpiece. The only TV that I have seen perform better than this (and that too marginally) is a Pioneer Kuro that one of my friends has.Update Feb 2010: TV shut off automatically and won't turn on now. Will go to service center which is 20 miles from where I live. I dropped the rating to 4 stars because of this.Update March 2010: I do notice some issues with the black level. Picture appears washed out on many channels. Also the TV's optical out sends out only stereo sound, so you cannot connect a HDMI cable from the source to this TV and expect 5.1 surround sound. You will need to run a separate cable for the sound to your receiver. I would now rate this TV a 3.5.

Reviews.Title: Perfection!!! Sports and Movies like you have never seen them before
Reviews.Author: S. Holderfield
Reviews.Content: I did research on TV's for about a month. Between reading reviews on different websites and going to the stores to see them in person what it came down to was this TV just looks better than the rest. The only bad reviews I ever really saw about this TV has been taken care of with the firmware update. I love watching Sports and Movies and between watching my Baseball and Football games in HD and Movies on Blu Ray on this TV I couldn't be any happier.

Reviews.Title: Better Than I Expected
Reviews.Author: Edd New
Reviews.Content: This is my first HD TV and my first purchase of a large, expensive item from Amazon. I did a lot of research (online and in person at the big box electronic/computer stores) and finally selected the Samsung model 650 with 120 hz. I am completely satisfied. Our viewing room has a lot of natural light in it from one side--about 15 ft. from the TV. No problem. No glare and no negative impact on the quality of the picture.  Our wide viewing angle is fine, too.Amazon's white glove delivery is top notch.And, finally, the price was very competitive.I highly recommend both Samsung and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Wehave had the TV for about a month and all is fantastic.  We got it in time for the Olympics and it is a great picture, easy to use, and easy to setup.  Great TV!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV and great purchase experience.
Reviews.Author: Buck Seibert.
Reviews.Content: I have nothing but great things to say about this TV.  Everyone who has seen it in operation has been greatly impressed.  I don't know anything to say bad about it.  Amazon.com had the best price by far.  It was delivered in 2 days.  I took advantage of the 30 day price guarantee and got an even better deal.Buy this TV, you will be happy with it.

Reviews.Title: The Touch of Color is the touch of heart
Reviews.Author: I. He "HWG"
Reviews.Content: some people may wonder how special the touch of color around the rim would be? well, it's not functionally useful, but it will TOTALLY lights up your room with it. It makes the TV set elegant and high-class. TV is the biggest subject of most people's room, it also serves the decoration functions. none of my friends visiting was not touched by the color. - Samsung's TOC is the touch of the heart.

Reviews.Title: I BOUGHT TWO!
Reviews.Author: John F. Monroe
Reviews.Content: This TV is so amazing that I bought a second one to wall mount in the bedroom. As I watched the picture for the first time I kept saying to my wife, LOOK AT THAT, LOOK AT THAT! There is a 3-D quality to the pictures. Football, tennis and golf are seen in a whole new way, like you are almost there. I remember seeing the first black and white TV on our block in the late 40's and the progress from then till now is unreal.John

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lucky Mon "Lucky Mon"
Reviews.Content: Great picture - easy to use - delivery went very well - they even put it up on the stand for us.  We use it  with cable, HD and DVD - great pictures.  Menus are easy to understand.We had shopped the big box stores - we are very happy with buying from Amazon.  It was an easy transaction - shipping and delivery went off without a hitch.Great picture for movies and sports.  This was the right decision for a new TV and our first HD TV.It just fits in our space - the perfect size.  If you are torn between 2 sizes, go with the larger screen size.

Reviews.Title: WoW!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Big Bopper"
Reviews.Content: After all the research was done, I chose the Samsung LN52A650. All I can say is "Wow, what a picture!" This is an amazing TV. My wife gets motion sickness sometimes because the picture is so lifelike you feel like you're there! There is no reflection to speak of. I got it during the Olympics and saw Bolt break 3 world records--with no blurs! Watched our old "The Sound of Music" DVD with our Samsung upconvert DVD player--it was like seeing it for the first time. Amazing! Highly, highly recommend this TV. And the best thing: I got $220 back from Amazon since the purchase price dropped in the 30 days following my order. Can't beat that! Buy this TV--you won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: Out of the box AMAZING
Reviews.Author: B. Mailloux
Reviews.Content: After years of plain old CRT watching, I researched a lot and asked a lot of questions about HDTVs.  Best Buy & Circuit City employees recommended the Samsung, Amazon customers recommended it and Consumer Reports listed it high.  This TV has not disappointed, not even a little.  The picture is pristine, the sound is great and the controls are easy to manage.  It handles motion very well; sports are a joy to watch.  The picture is so good, with such depth- sometimes it almost looks fake.  Anyone who wants a big HDTV and can afford a quality model should really look long and hard at this TV... Now I just wish I had more time to watch it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture. Remote sucks
Reviews.Author: F.H.
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Picture quality is fantastic. The touch sensitive buttons on the side are useless. Can't see them so you have to blindly touch the side until you get a menu pop on the screen.Remote control with its rotating wheel is difficult to handle. You can easily move selection when you're actually trying to click.Still a great TV and great value. I will get a universal remote anyway so hopefully the remote will not be an annoyance

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Terry A. Bass
Reviews.Content: Very sharp picture with great colors.  Very good sound from front down firing speakers. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful tv excellent white glove service from amazon!
Reviews.Author: David Dulkan "ddulkan"
Reviews.Content: Beautiful tv amazing picture no problems at all delivery was excellent 2 guys brought it in unpacked and hooked it up tv was in excellent condition when it arrived at my house the box was in perfect condition to! Get this tv excellent price here at amazon cant go wrong with picture it feels like you are actually there Thanks Amazon for providing excellent prices and wonderful delivery thats free by the way!

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT VALUE PRICE & DELIVERY!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: cpscpscps
Reviews.Content: ORDER THIS TV FROM AMAZON. The picture with Blue Ray disk is AWESOME. The price from Amazon was the BEST DEAL around + the White Glove Delivery was very smooth - it was actually available for delivery within a couple days. The price I paid was $2279.98 and it has dropped 2 times and they refunded me $80 the first time and $50 the second time - so I paid $2149.98. YOU WILL BE VERY HAPPY with this TV. NOTE: Amazon said they are phasing out the post-order price drop refund service.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 is superb.
Reviews.Author: Gadget Nut "RichR"
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52A650 is one of the best large screen LCD TVs I have ever seen to date.The color reproduction is amazingly accurate with excellent black levels.The sound quality is surprisingly very good for internal speakers.The 120 hz refresh rate effectively reduces motion blur.Watching Hi-def programs is almost like being there.This TV is definitely the one to get.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 - Excellant
Reviews.Author: D. Botros
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for 1 month and have been very pleased thus far with my decision. I decided on the 52" LCD vs. Samsung 50 "plasma after comparing them in the store. Each had different advantages but I finally decided on the 52" based on the larger screen size.I've turned off the 120Hz feature as it makes movies look different than originally intended. It's fine if you are watching sporting events or animated movies. I wish they had made it so you can choose different refresh rates, i.e. 90hz, 100 Hz, 120hz. similar to an LCD monitor.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!!!!
Reviews.Author: J. T. B. "Vietnam Vet"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this television about a month ago and connected it to high def. about two weeks ago.  Our old TV is a 48" projection.  The new TV has a sharp brilliant picture even in bright daylight. HD TV, all I can say is that any actor on HD TV needs to have everything in order, because the picture is so sharp and clear.  Hook-up and operation has been seamless. This is a great TV.JTB

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: cobblestone1820 "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Beyond my expectations.  I had it narrowed down after months of review to the Sony and the Samsung.  I was a bit concerned about the reflection matter during my deciding process, but I purchased the Samsung and the reflection issue is NOT a problem at all for us.  Great picture and sound, even though I mostly go thru my Onkyo receiver and my surround speaker system.  I like the remote features but they could have made the small wheel on the remote not so touchy and cheap.  The red around the screen is not that noticable, but to us with two burgundy leather lazy boy recliners, it would not have been a factor anyway.  I got it at Amazon.com when it was $2188 and I figured that the $$$ I would save over the Sony paid for my Onkyo, my Sony PS3 (Blueray player), my cabinet which is all black and costs $400, and my HDMI cables, which I bought on line for less than $10 each.  The deals are out there, you just gotta be patient and search, search, search.  If I had to do it all over again, I would not have changed a thing.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: K. Chapman
Reviews.Content: The colors are amazing on this TV.  Compared with Panasonic Vierra 800u and the whites on the Panasonic looked "dirty".  The reflective glass is not a problem for me and I have 3 large windows in this room.  Rated best LCD in Consumer Reports and Cnet.  I highly recommend this TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great tv, perfect picture
Reviews.Author: T. Ryan
Reviews.Content: I have a 50 plasma from samsung which has a good picture, but this blows it out of the water.  Great price and delivery from Amazon, saved several hundred dollars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: James L. Bahr
Reviews.Content: This TV is incredible. Great picture, even in SD thru cable box and HDMI, decent sound, easy to setup and use. Screen reflection is certainly present (mostly notable when set is off)  but with the swivel stand it doesn't have to be an issue. Red TOC looks nice against black frame, stand, and components. Olympics coverage is mesmerizing. Previous Mitsubishi WD-52527 (LCD rear projection), while still a great set, doesn't come close to this TV. Haven't needed to adjust the picture for any scene or lighting condition.

Reviews.Title: Love the tv, loved the service
Reviews.Author: Allison K.
Reviews.Content: I ordered the tv late on a Monday night, and by Thursday night the friendly delivery company called and said they had the TV ready to deliver to me.  They happily worked around my schedule, set the TV up in my basement (and made sure it worked) and offered to take away all the trash.  The TV was a couple hundred dollars cheaper on amazon than everywhere else, and it came to my door without my having to lift a finger.  I'm very happy with everything.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Eugene J. Myers
Reviews.Content: I researched HDTVs for weeks. Everything I read led me back to the Samsung 52" model 650. Then I spent weeks looking for the best price. Amazon was about the lowest price with no tax and free shipping. I was leary about ordering such a big item online.Amazon was great. It took less than a week. Two men delivered the TV, carried it upstairs, unboxed it, and set it on the shelf. They were great. I will definitely not be afraid to order other large item from Amazon.  The TV is everything I could ask for. It is beautiful looking with the touch of red. Set up was very easy. The menu walks you through everything step by step. The TV has plenty of connections for everything  I would want. I am not a techy so I will not bore you with all the stats  and data. I love sports and good movies. But I spent the first 2 days watching Disney movies. The color and clarity are unbelievable. Go for it you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Ugly Dudley
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research prior to purchasing this TV, and after 3 weeks of watching it, I am convinced that I made the right choice. The picture is incredibly sharp. Watching sporting events on this TV has been a true pleasure. Connections to DVDs, laptops, digital cameras, etc are all self explanatory. I know some had problems with the wheel on the remote, but if your fingers are that unsteady, you can always press the darn thing to scroll through the menus. I also considered purchasing Samsung HL62A750 DLP TV, but when I went to a local Sears and compared them side-to-side, there was really no comparison. This is the best TV that I was able to find after 2 months of research.

Reviews.Title: Great TV -- Spectacular viewing
Reviews.Author: Sergio Salgado
Reviews.Content: I bought my Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color about three weeks ago. After an initial problem with the motherboard (which was rapidly replaced by Samsung) the TV is working spectacularly. It is hard to believe that such a large TV can be so clear--but it is! I am not sure why the slightly red trim around it bothers folks. I thought it would light up or something but in fact it coordinates well with my TV room's walls. I highly recommend this product and the service after the sale from Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Kapil Dukle
Reviews.Content: Have this TV for close to 2 months now. It is near flawless.Here is the summary:Pros: Amazing colors, great black levels, good AMP (Auto Motion Plus) settings, menus easy to navigateCons: Glossy screen attracts glare (huge problem in bright rooms), remote wheel a little awkward to use

Reviews.Title: Simply Stunning!
Reviews.Author: Meghan
Reviews.Content: I, like a lot of people that have written reviews for this TV, did quite a bit of research before finally pulling the trigger on this Samsung. One of my main concerns was that I have a 65" Mitsubishi rear projection TV that is only 6 years old and still had a very nice HD picture, and I was worried that dropping down to 52" would make a major difference. It does not. The old TV was a giant box in the middle of the room and I was ready for something sleeker.All I can say is WOW! When we were watching the old TV, we thought it had a great picture. After setting up the Samsung, we are now seeing what a great picture really looks like. It is amazing what this TV will do with an HD signal. We have a PS3, XBox360, Directv HD all hooked up through HDMI. Watch a movie on StarzHD and it will blow you away.The colors are rich, the blacks are DEEP and the clarity is beyond words. I happen to really like the 120 Hz motion effect as it seems to make everything stand out just that much more. I'm sure some will disagree, but it is a personal taste.Purchasing through Amazon was great, as was the delivery. I could not be happier with my decision.If you are on the fence like I was, hop over and buy this TV!

Reviews.Title: samsung lcd tv- 52 "-pem
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Miller
Reviews.Content: This tv has an excellent picture straight out of the box. I was leery about ordering a tv over the net but my fears were groundless as the tv arrived promptly and was well packaged and secure. I would absolutely recommend this tv and how my order was handled.

Reviews.Title: The best LCD I have seen
Reviews.Author: Paul B. Howard
Reviews.Content: I wanted a 52" LCD and did many comparisons.  I was able to do a side by side with the Samsung LN52A650 and the Sony Bravia XBR4 52".  I had narrowed down my choices to these two before this comparison.  The Sony was a little better at displaying blue, and the Samsung displayed green better.  This could have been due to the way the store had set them up.  Other than that, the quality was identical.  The LN52A650 is loaded with features and is hundreds less than the Sony.  I almost spent the extra $200 for the LN52A750 to get the built in content, and internal memory.  SSince the TV was delivered, I have been even more impressed with the picture.  One note on the delivery and shipping.  This item does not qualify for the free shipping even though the ad says it is.  This is not white glove delivery.  They set where you want, and check to see if it turns on.  You will have to hook everything up after they leave.  In my case, that was fine, and I received it in about a week.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LNA5260 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Dick  - Football Fan
Reviews.Content: Every aspect of this purchase was superb.  The ordering process was easy and comfortable. The price was easily the best of those I researched from reputable companies and I did not have to pay state sales tax or shipping and handling costs.  Shipping was handled very efficiently and the TV carried directly to the room I asked by two very courteous gentlemen.  The TV itself is utterly awesome in every respect. DirecTV only provides a 1080i picture to date but I'm ready for 1080p when they do.  The picture is mind blowing, particularly in HD.  I haven't found the great visual advantage of 120 Hz yet but certainly will by football season.

Reviews.Title: phenomenal tv
Reviews.Author: John Zubrin
Reviews.Content: Just received my samsung 52"  A650 tv from Amazon. The standard delivery by Amazon's agent Cerva was a breeze. They called to make an appointment, showed up on time, brought tv into home, and completely unpackaged and set up.  The picture quality of the tv is incredible. Standaed definition reception is 10 times better than my old tv. High defintion channels are phenomenol.

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Great Price.  Couldn't be happier
Reviews.Author: W. Frierson
Reviews.Content: Had this as one of the recommendations from the AV guys doing my living room setup.  Looked around a lot in stores and online, read CNET reviews and this is THE BEST TV for the money.  I have no regrets.  Amazon was also the best on price all said and done.  TV arrived in 4 days and delivery was very professional.Picture looks fantastic (Blu-ray just blows me away) and the TV looks great on the wall when not on.
