Reviews.Author: S. Thompson
Reviews.Content: For the price this is the most awesome tv I have ever owned.  You will need to adjust the setting a bit for "dark" atmosphere shows, but it can be done easily.  Tv speakers are decent, but more than likely if you have money for this tv you probably spent money on a sound system too.

Reviews.Title: Unbelieveable picture!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rich C.
Reviews.Content: This TV is incredible!!!!- the clarity of the picture is amazing, especially the sporting events in HD. We just got this TV yesterday and we're in complete awe at the picture-the HD movies from cable look almost 3D and even some of them look like live TV!. At $1,699.99 from Best Buy with free delivery and free haulaway of the old TV this was absolutely the best purchase that I've ever made!.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD TV
Reviews.Author: M. Wen "Helpful Advise"
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung LN52A650 for about a month now. We are very happy with the ease of setting up, the super clear picture effect and the good price. Compared with our 52" Sharp 1080p LCD we bought near two years ago, the Samsung is far more better than the Sharp 52" LCD we have. We read a lot of reviews from Amazon's customers before we made our purchase. the very high ratings helped us to go for this TV. Amazon's service is very good. But the shipping company's service really destroys amazon's good reputation. We missed the first time delivery because the driver came an hour earlier than the scheduled time. When we called for redelivery, we were not given any options but stay home and wait from 9:00 am to 1:30pm Mon. to Fri. Otherwise, we were told to go to their warehouse to pick it up (which is more than an hour drive one way). In the end, my husband had to take a day off to get the tv delivered to our home. Now we are happy with the tv. We just need to forget the pain of how it got here.

Reviews.Title: Great TV compared to the other LCD brands
Reviews.Author: MDJr "Mike"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV in March and have been very happy with it so far.  HD Cable is excellent, although some stations are better than others.  BlueRay through my PS3 is excellent.  The TV is very easy to set up, use, and the picture and sound quality is excellent.  I only see "jaggies" on certain TV stations which seems to be due to a slow broadcast signal.  I don't notice any problems with BlueRay.  If you're comparing this to the Sony, or anything else in it's price range with similar features buy this one.  You won't be disappointed.  I hope that the TV lasts for a long time but that I can only wait to see.  And, if you're buying this make sure you get a BlueRay player and a subscription to rent them cause you'll never want to go back to a normal DVD again!

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV 52"
Reviews.Author: K. T. Woods "teechur"
Reviews.Content: The delivery was prompt.  The set up done quickly.  I had to request certain hookups from the set up team which they did, reluctantly.The TV itself is large and clear.  Sports are especially enhanced.  The Amazon price was the best I could find after thorough research. I would highly recommend this product and Amazon as its seller.Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color

Reviews.Title: Samsung Has Struck Gold
Reviews.Author: W. Joshua Melhorn "VOLS4Life"
Reviews.Content: I was reluctant to buy this tv over the internet, especially since I was going off of peer reviews and Consumer Reports (which ranked the tv the highest in its category), but.....I'm so glad I did! It has excellent picture, excellent sound (when I'm not using my sound system), 4 HDMI ports, USB ports for ease of showing digital memoirs (pics, video, etc.). I give it overall an A+. The only MINOR downside is that there is glare when viewing from wide angles, that's it...I promise. The only reason I'd get another tv would be to change to OLED instead of the LCD. Hands down, perfect tv.

Reviews.Title: Very good for the price
Reviews.Author: Thomas C. Evans "Ironhead3fan"
Reviews.Content: Just purchased this TV from another retailer.  I looked at it for about an hour before deciding to purchase it.  I was on my way home with it, when my wife called and asked if I bought a TV.  I reluctantly said yes (I thought I was in trouble).  She said good, because my rear projection TV just blew.  She said she was seeing 3 of everything.  I got it home and got it connected to my HD cable.  This is with out a doubt, the best TV that has ever been in my house.  The picture is so clear, much clearer than the rear projection ever was.  The sound is a little tinty, adequate for regular TV, but not for movies and sporting events.  I have a 7.1 home theater for that, so no worries here.  Overall, I am very pleased.UPDATE: After almost 3 years after purchase, I am still very pleased with my purchase.  The TV looks as good now as it did then.  I know no one is looking at these reviews anymore, as this is an outdated model, but I had to say it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Best Bang For The Buck
Reviews.Author: Aaron "MyNameIsAaron"
Reviews.Content: After doing endless research I settled on this 650. Was able to purchase at much better price than local retail store. I was hesitant about the shipping but was pleasantly surprised on how well the free delivery was handled. Beautiful picture! Have no regrets over this purchase!

Reviews.Title: LN52A650 Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: L. Labonte "chloe"
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with the purchase of my 52" Samsung TV # LN52A650, the picture is absolutely beautiful, I received this on time and the deliverer took it out of the box and set it up for me.. I would highly recommend this to everyone, I would definetly purchase from Amazon again.Lorraine from Attleboro, MA

Reviews.Title: AFTER A MONTH USE
Reviews.Author: pb
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS TV ABOUT A MONTH AGO. GREAT TV I LOVE IT THANKS AMAZON!

Reviews.Title: met all expectations!
Reviews.Author: Avid Reader
Reviews.Content: This TV has lived up to its reviews, almost all of which were very favorable.  Picture is beautiful, has every feature desired - you can't go wrong with this set.

Reviews.Title: Best TV Ever
Reviews.Author: P. Thompson "Patriots Rule"
Reviews.Content: This truly is the best set on the market. The big box stores were selling it for $600.00 to $800.00 more than this excellent Amazon price of $1899.99!!! Ready to go right out of the box. Phenomonal picture quality and features. The Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color outperforms anything out there for much less $$. I am a very cautious shopper. I research evyrything in great detail and do not purchase until I'm certain. Even then, this was the largest "online" item I've ever bought (in both terms of $$ and size) and I was somewhat apprehensive about the whole thing. Well, I couldn't be more impressed with the outcome. There was a slight glitch in the delivery schedule but once that was squared away the delivery/installation went perfectly. The driver stayed on (without any prompting) following set-up to be sure everything was working and I was completely satisfied. He was great, he even waited for the entire programming sequence. Very thorough in every detail. Once he left, I played with the system for hours. It is a fairly intuitive television even with its numerous features. I don't know how I could be more pleased with the results. Hi-Def live sports programs are absolutely amazing. The 120Hz Auto Motion Plus and 4ms response time lets you follow the action at any speed very clearly. From a slapshot to a line drive homer, you see it all!! If you are considering a purchase such as this, I say do all the research you want and the process will probably lead you to the Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of Color.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: R. Vaidyanathan
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant about buying a Samsung. To date I have only bought sony products - including tv, dvd, receiver, etc. I've had the TV for about 2 months and so far so good. I'm not going to get into the details of comparing this tv to others in terms of performance. But I'll just say that I haven't had any problems. It's easy to hook up, and the menu is easy to understand and use.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch - a great buy
Reviews.Author: Mark O'connor "Mark O"
Reviews.Content: Had this tv for about 6 months now and I'm very happy. Picture is good , sound is good, and there's no need to have it calibrated.It's like being at the movies when we turn on the surround speaker system.Had it shipped by Amazon and it arrive on time and intact!Sales guy from Best Buy said that this is the tv he would buy.Well, I did and I'm very happy.

Reviews.Title: Happy with TV and delivery
Reviews.Author: J. Hooks "TTownPops"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture and it was delivered earlier than expected. The delivery and set up was quick and the delivery guys were very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: UNREAL!
Reviews.Author: MissingToof
Reviews.Content: WOW, what a picture!!!  This TV rocks!  I researched for several months to find "THE" TV, and I finally bit the bullet and bought it in January.  I went from a 52" Sony Projection to this remarkable LCD...  I'm telling you, it's like going from a Ford Pinto to a Bentley...  I went to the big box stores to compare pictures, and I could easily tell that this one was the best of them all (size, price, etc.).  I think it says a lot that the price has not gone down since I purchased 4 months ago.  I will agree with some reviews that the sound is lacking, however, it's not enough to keep me from regretting the purchase of this TV.. I use a home theater system anyway.  Amazon was easy to purchase from and delivery was much faster than I was initially told.  You WILL NOT be disappointed with this TV!  Cannot wait to watch Ole Miss in HD this football season!  GO REBS!

Reviews.Title: Ecstatic
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Had some concerns over product based on other reviewers' comments on room glare and red case decoration.  The room glare is non-existent and I would have never noticed the dark red on the case if I had not looked for it when I unpacked the set.As far as color and sound....everything is simply outstanding.  This set replaces a two year old HDTV (that is now in our bedroom) and surpasses the old set in every facet of operation.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Camaro1967 "Ray"
Reviews.Content: We received this TV quickly.  It was packaged well, and we are pleased with it.  We have ordered from Amazon.com several times and have always been happy.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Harold M. Spriddle
Reviews.Content: Its late im a little tired but i want to leave a review.  I had the tv for around 2 months and i love it.  I have not tried all the settings, everything is still set at the factory default and the picture is super clear with directtv hd. Can't wait to try verion fios. The amazon free shipping was a plus and the delivery men brought in the tv and would not allow me to do anything. They unpacked it, put the base on it, put it on top of my entertainment center and hooked up the hd box. They even gave me a demonstration of the tv. This was my first purchase from amazon and it was great along with the tv which was cheaper than the big box stores. Im ready to purchase a samsung 46 for my living room.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: K. Basheer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV an year back, not from amazon. Was checking to see the current prices. The prices has gone down a little bit but not too much,which could also mean that this is still a popular buy.I really like the TV and did not have any issues and i would give a 5 star rating. I did a lot of research before i purchased the TV like everybody else, and came up with this and i have no regrets...yet.

Reviews.Title: This HDTV Is Worth It!!!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Sierra
Reviews.Content: Recently purchased this HDTV in April 09', I owned a Samsung DLP before this one. This LCD HDTV is amazing!! Have it hung on my wall, looks like it was meant to be there.. Have my PS3,xBox360 connected to it via HDMI, the 4HDMI's come in very handy. They look remarkable. Blue Rays..makes you feel like you are there, they look soo real it actually freaks some of my friends out. Definitly Worth It. Going to connect my Onkyo 7.1 surround to it this weekend too. Can't go wrong with this HDTV!! Compared to the Sony Bravia which is next on my list, this is far better. Only one that can beat this LCD is the new Samsung LED HDTV!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Awsome TV
Reviews.Author: Juan M. Martinez
Reviews.Content: Received TV as expected with no problems.  This was a refurbished unit and its look brand new when received and to top it off at a very low price.  Picture quality is excelent especialy when viewing DVD movies it makes a big difference.  Blueray movies picture quality is even more clear and sharp.  I use the HDMI connection of the Blueray player to the TV to get top quality viewing.  I recommend this TV and also buying from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Product satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Saifur R. Chohan
Reviews.Content: It's a good product from samsung. It's a thrilling experience to watch programs on this TV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture out of the box
Reviews.Content: This LCD is hard to beat at $1750.  This was and is the best deal in the market.  I have owned some Samsung products in the past that I was disappointed with.  Knowing (2) people with Pioneer 5020 Plasmas, I have no buyers remorse w/ the LN52A650.  As others will claim, there is a glare on the screen with direct light.  120hz seems like a gimmick, when turned on (High), it actually gives me a headache.  If you want to be blown away with excellent picture quality and insane colors, this is the TV to buy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture!!!
Reviews.Author: G. Stuckey
Reviews.Content: I shopped this TV for over a month waiting for a price drop.  Bought it from Amazon finally because they were the cheapest.  I couldn't be happier with the quality of the picture.  The shipping experience was also top notch with great communication and follow through.  Kudos to Amazon for really stepping up and becoming competitive in this market!  You will not be disappointed in this TV or the shipping from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: L. N. WHITE "NEIL"
Reviews.Content: GREAT TV EASY TO NAVIGATE THE SYSTEM. I THOUGHT I WOULD RECEIVE HD PICTURE QUALITY! FOUND OUT I STILL NEED TO HAVE A CONVERTER FOR THIS. MY SON HAS THE SAME TV AND HIS PICTURE IS FANTASTIC. THATS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU ARE AN ANALOG PERSON IN A DIGITAL WORLD. GUESS I'LL SWITCH TO SATALITE BECAUSE CABLE WON'T SUPPLY ME ONE AFTER 20 PLUS YEARS WITH THEM. I WOULD AND HAVE RECOMMENDED THIS TV TO FRIENDS.

Reviews.Title: Crisp, Bright and Smart
Reviews.Author: Jordane Elmassian "Jordane"
Reviews.Content: I am a huge fan! The picture is perfect to me very crisp even on fast action movies. It is very bright as well, which is perfect in my sunny living room. Finally I think Smart because the integration with the other Samsung product is very smooth, one remote for all without even thinking about it. The plus is you can configure your stocks, weather and local news to show up on the screen. Oh and did I mention the HDTV receiver integrated, it automatically configured a bunch of channel found in the cable; as I only use an Apple TV and a Blu ray player, finding some HDTV channel on the airwave was perfect... loving this product.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: MSUMom
Reviews.Content: The Samsung LN52A650 52 inch LCD HDTV is a great tv.  The picture is really clear, the sound is very good and the setup was very easy.  I would highly recommend this television to anyone looking for a large HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: JY
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for 3 weeks and except for the glare, this TV is awesome. Picture quality is the best in its range. Audio and video are very clear. It was very easy to setup (less than 5 minutes). There are more than enough external connections for all the devices one would want to hook up to a TV. The computer and network connections are a bonus. Excellent Price for quality. Delivery was on time and they even helped unpack and did initial setup. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Samsung ,LN52A650 ,52 Inch, LCD, 1080p, 120Hz, red touch of color
Reviews.Author: Lorac C "Lorac C"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the Samsung.  I kept reading about a problem with the sound being hard to hear. The sound is very good unless i have the tv turned to a different part of the room, then i have to turn the volume up.  The picture color is great.  The only problem i have is everyone looks fat and there is a slight blur sometimes because I have not bought HD satellite yet, but pretty imperceptible.  I didn't even notice it, but my sister did... now i do.  It also looks a lot bigger than my old box 27" Sony, and after a month it still looks huge.  I love all the extras you can do onscreen.  It is easy to figure out, has great directions ... overall i would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Henry Freeman "topkick"
Reviews.Content: Picture is excellent, sound is excellent (I have conectted to SR system), ease of operation is good. Problem was in set up, after running setup, the manual did not state that you had to select HDMI contact which I was using. Once selected, TV will return to last selection. Excellent Buy, fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great TV,Great Price
Reviews.Author: VA Belle
Reviews.Content: All the reviews for this TV were right on. Picture is bright and crisp. Bought via Amazon and got it for $600 less than in BestBuy, plus free shipping!

Reviews.Title: Samsung LCD TV
Reviews.Author: AJG "BIG BLOCK ARNIE"
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about my Samsung LN52A650 52in. LCD TV with the Red Touch Of Color. After receiving and viewing this TV, it became apparent why it was rated number 1 by Consumer Reports. We love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Mr Marathon
Reviews.Content: After researching TVs for several months, I purchased the Samsung LN52A650.  It's a great TV, better than I anticipated.  Great color, features, and easy to navigate remote.  TOC is a classy upgrade from the normal shiny black frames.  Matched with Blu-ray, it's a homerun!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV; excellent delivery
Reviews.Author: kands6191
Reviews.Content: This TV was top-rated in a consumer magazine.  It's picture is beautiful, especially in 1080p.  It is everything that I expected.  I saved $500 off of the sale price at Best Buy, plus shipping and tax.  I am very glad that I  bought this TV.  It is a great value.  The shipping service was excellent.  Free delivery.  Unboxed and set up in our home.  It was plugged in to make sure it worked.  This is the second large TV I have gotten from Amazon and I will buy from them again.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Terri J. Bullard
Reviews.Content: We have had this TV for about 4 months and it's great.Beautiful picture, but the speakers are horrible.We hooked it up to our home theater so it sounds great.Everything is so much sharper on this set than on our old Sony.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: JMB "JMB"
Reviews.Content: I've waited 3 years to finally buy an HD TV and I am absolutely thrilled with the Samsung.  The picture quality is first rate.  HD shows look like real life.  My wife loves it so that tells you something about the aesthetic quality as well.  I am a true believer in Consumer Reports which rated it the best HD they've ever tested ... I'll back that up.  Top notch!  First rate!  You pick the superlative and it fits the Samsung.  Now, if I can only convince her that we need a second one.

Reviews.Title: samsung 52 inch
Reviews.Author: Jay F. Steele "Jay F. Steele"
Reviews.Content: This tv was everything I dreamed of and then some. What a fantastic color/picture. I did a lot of research and found this to get constantly high ratings. I see why it did. I recommend this Samsung 1080p LCD 52 inch tv is a must if your serious about a lcd big screen tv. I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Gehley
Reviews.Content: Samsung LN52A650 52-Inch 1080p 120 Hz LCD HDTV with Red Touch of ColorThis TV is like having the show right in your living room. It is like 3 Dimensional characters are right there with you. It is SO worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Barry Clark
Reviews.Content: For the money,you can't get a better T.V. I own a samsung 50" 720p. It'sa great t v,but this 1080p 52" has more richness in color&sound.; Try one!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Andrew Smith
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. still a top notch option if you want to save a few hundred bucks.

Reviews.Title: Best TV I researched
Reviews.Author: William W. Burnham "wburnham"
Reviews.Content: I search & read all reviews for as many LCD & Plasma 50 & 52" TV's I could find.  For the price, you can't beat this TV.  I would highly recommend this TV for anyone.  The blacks are as close to a Plasma as you can get.  The extra features make this TV great too (4 HDMI's, ethernet, etc.).This was my first big ticket item I bought from Amazon.  I was a little hesitant at first, however I could not be more pleased.  The price was untouchable & TV was delivered into my house.  I could not be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: -MM- "-MM-"
Reviews.Content: This tv does a great job.  I would recommend getting it with one of the Bell-O stands here on Amazon.  They look great together.  The stand is a bit of a pain to assemble and mount.  However, once setup the TV and stand a great!

Reviews.Title: Awesome in Every Way
Reviews.Author: M. Woodward "Mark S. Woodward"
Reviews.Content: I purposely waited to critique this HDTV in order to be able to draw from a actual/historical perspective.  We have been using this HDTV since it was setup/installed in Nov., 2008 with SonyPS3 (as BluRay Player), and typical Home Theater setup.  The best purchase we've ever made from Amazon.com.  Awesome in every way.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Johnson "tooldude777"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding picture quality with over the air HD channels, Blue Ray disk picture is smooth, excellent quality with 120hz.  Highly recommend to anyone unsure if this is what they want or not. I was unsure between the 46" 750 series and this 52" 650 series, but am very satisified with my decision. Amazon delivered it within 3 days and no dead pixels or damage, even the box is in great condition.  Overall very satisified with my entire purchase.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG RULES THE HD WORLD FOR A REASON!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Hatcher "Mighty Mighty Broncos"
Reviews.Content: I am truly amazed at the picture on this HDTV. I did my research & after 2 weeks, I decided on this one. You simply can't beat the quality of the picture & the 120 hz adds the finishing touch to the perfect HDTV... Now that I can watch the Mighty Mighty Broncos in HD, what else is there? Answer: Nothing unless you are sitting around watching "Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman" instead of the Super Bowl like Brian Rockwell does... {;)...hATCh - "You can trust me, I'm an air traffic controller"...

Reviews.Title: Great TV  at great price
Reviews.Author: KF
Reviews.Content: Looked at this model since consumer reports recommended. The picture was as good or better than the comparable SONY but Samsung's price was better. Have had the TV 4 months. Good picture with standard digital cable and fantastic with HD cable or blu ray. No problems with screen reflections and in a living room that has seating with a wide viewing angle no noticeable drop in contrast with increasing angle. Absolutely no regrets on the purchase.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PICTURE!!
Reviews.Author: Glenn H
Reviews.Content: We bought this set last month after several months of research, we could'nt be more happy.  The picture is the best I've seen in a 52 inch LCD and the audio is right up there as well.  I'm very confident we made a wise choice.

Reviews.Title: great tv!
Reviews.Author: Tasku "Tasku"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv! The picture is amazing! Very clear and 1080 hd looks great! I was stuck between the Samsung and Sony but the Samsung is a better picture and also cheaper. Honestly  even compared to the Sony  xbr I prefer the Samsung !

Reviews.Title: TV Time
Reviews.Author: Wendell R. Reeves
Reviews.Content: The Tv was delivered and set up without a hitch.It has worked flawlesslyever since.Tv sound is not bad and certainly not as bad as some reviewersindicated.The only problem I have had is getting used to the reflection on the screen from outside sources and from indoor sources ie. lamps.The latterdepends on your viewing angle and the darkness of the picture being viewed.All in all a great TV at a price unmatched anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: Great picture if you could hang it on the wall
Reviews.Author: W. D. Farmer
Reviews.Content: Great picture, but the top screws in the stand would not come out, so we had to take the stand apart to hang it from bracket on the wall and now there is a large tubular section of the stand sticking out from the bottom of the TV.  If I can't eventually get the screws out to get the rest of the stand off, I guess I will have to cut this part of the stand off of the bottom of the TV.  Luckily the lip of the TV covers the back section of the TV where I might have to perform surgery.Its ashame that Samsung can't get the whole thing right.

Reviews.Title: 52" samsung LN52A650
Reviews.Author: Bill B "Bill"
Reviews.Content: We have had this set for about a month and are very pleased with the quality and performance so far.  The price was unbeatable and delivery was simple for us.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: I N C R E D I B L E
Reviews.Author: TiagoBR
Reviews.Content: After 4 months since I bought this TV, every time I see this TV it looks so gorgeous that I love it. The image is unbelievable amazing.PROS- everything everybody has written and more...CONS- Not found yet...After an year of research I could not have made a best decision.ENJOY!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 inch TV
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Schubert "J. Schubert"
Reviews.Content: What a great picture! I did a lot of research and conculed that the Samsung LN52A650 was the best buy for the money! Great color and crystal clear picture! I'm glad I made the right choice, all my friends agree, what great picture! It also as the same bright picture in the daylight as night time!Great choice!

Reviews.Title: price was high but tv is outstanding as was delivery by pilot
Reviews.Author: charlie jackson "A retired TV viewer"
Reviews.Content: I kept waiting for the price to drop, but finally decided to go with the $1899 price as I wanted a Blue Ray also and the $200 discount took care of getting the Samsung Blue Ray so it is difficult for me to complain.  The Samsung Touch of Red LN52A650 was delivered within four days by Pilot delivery service two guys.  They took about ten minutes to unpack, set in on my stand and hook it up. The TV is outstanding quality as is the Samsung Blue Ray.  Amazon is definitely the way to go in my opinion.Thousand Oaks, CA

Reviews.Title: Samsung 52 inch LCD HDTV with red touch of color
Reviews.Author: Nutz
Reviews.Content: This television is excellent. Coupled with the Blu Ray player it really shows off everything it can do. Incredible clarity. Needs a good HD receiver with proper speakers to maximize the experience, as the sets speakers, while adequate for casual broadcast viewing, is not enough for movies or DVD's.Regarding the storied 'less glare' reputation of LCD vs Plasma, I feel that is overrated. The LCD does glare less, but not really to a significant extent imo.The remote is a little bizarre to deal with, but if you have a TIVO you will get used to it fairly quickly as they seem to mimic each other to a degree. Set up is easy but finding the right setting for Sport, Movie, Theater etc. is a little confusing. Hardly a deal breaker though.If I had to do it again I might wait for the LED set coming out, which I have seen demonstrated. The clarity on that set is even better yet imo, but a lot more money. And at some point you are just splitting hairs...I mean how clear can you get or need?I have still to drill down and tinker with all the detailed settings to dial this set in perfectly, but so far, based on the price I got through Amazon and the performance thus far, this set LCD is a solid winner.

Reviews.Title: 1st purchase through Amazon
Reviews.Author: Mark F. Otstot
Reviews.Content: This is the first time i have purchased such a high dollar item via Amazon and the internet.  Cudos all around.  the TV arrived earlier than expected.  The delivering company set it up for me and it works perfectly.  A+

Reviews.Title: turn on and enjoy
Reviews.Author: empty
Reviews.Content: I purchased  home prewired for surround with 4 ceiling speakers. I read reviews on tv for about a year. I purchased this set and Yamaha RX-V565 and a cheap subwoofer(polk PSW10. I hooked up tv when delivererd to my comcast cable box, set the display to movie mode and sound to surround and did not feel the need to do anything else. Sound, view etc was just fine. The next day I hooked up the Yamaha and yes the ceiling speakers are nice but if I had not found the Yamaha at such a good deal I may have never bothered getting. Without a blue ray I cannot appreciate what I am missing but am satisfied with cable tv as I never play movies much anyway. I have amp defaulted to medium from factory delivered and have not bothered trying anything else at is seems okay to me. Maybe when I rest up from all the installation I will experiment but for now just enjoying.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jim Marshall
Reviews.Content: 5 STARS just doesn't happen - But I have to make an exception in this case - I'll leave the specs. and details to others but what I can tell you is to STOP LOOKING, you have just found a fantastic TV and you will NOT BE disappointed - don't be concerned about delivery either (at least in my area) I recieved it in a matter of 4 days in perfect condition - I have ordered many items here and things never seem to go this good but they did - Everythings excellent - Hope it goes good for you - I KNOW you'll love that TV

Reviews.Title: Damn good TV
Reviews.Author: Christopher D. Smith
Reviews.Content: Best TV for the money you can buy.  Did months of research.  1080p blu ray playback is just amazing!!!!

Reviews.Title: A bargain at the price
Reviews.Author: Frank F.

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN52A650 -- Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: RFKROX "RFKROX"
Reviews.Content: Updated Review - 2/2/09Okay, I bought the TV from Best Buy, but I wanted to review it for everyone buying it through Amazon.  First of all, the reason I bought it from Best Buy was that they were selling it at $1,899.99 last week.  Moreover, they have an exclusive deal with Samsung, whereby if you return the UPC from the box to NFL.com, along with proof of purchase, then you are eligible for $200 worth of free memorabilia from NFL.com.  Furthermore, thru the end of January, you get $200 off the $250 calibration fee.  So even though I paid tax for this TV and shipping of $70, the calibration (scheduled for mid-March) only cost $50.Anyway, the 52" TV sits right next to the 52" Sony Bravia at the Best Buy in Leesburg, VA.  As far as I'm concerned for comparison sake, the USS Samsung blows the USS Sony right out of the water! LOL  This TV is second to none!  Why pay more for the Sony (a lot more, I might add), when the Samsung looks much better, anyway?  Seems like a "No-Brainer" to me...The set-up was simple.  A quick set-up guide comes with the TV, but I didn't even use that.  I pretty much just hooked everything up without even using the manual.  I have checked out the manual since I hooked it up, so I could see what some of the options are.  For the most part, you can familiarize yourself with all the functions just by going through the remote control, if you know what you are doing.In any event, there are only a few minor things I don't like about the TV, but that certainly didn't persuade me from buying it...that's for sure!  This is me just being picky:1) The manual buttons on the lower right-hand side of the TV are extremely difficult to see, especially at night if you have the lights off.  Then again, why would you need to use them since you have the remote control (which has a function that lights it up in the dark)?2) The remote control's spinning wheel function may be a liability to some users.  I am going back to Best Buy to get the "normal" remote control for that model.  The sales guy that sold me the TV told me he would give me one free, if I wanted one.  The spinning wheel is actually easy to use if you are familiar with an IPod.  Plus, you can just use the up, down, left, or right function, without actually spinning the wheel.3) The remote control is very sleek.  But if you lay it down on your coffee table near the edge, it will slide off, due to the shape of the remote.  No big deal, but just wanted to mention that.Anyway, I am waiting for the Panasonic DMP-BD35K Blu-Ray Disc Player  to come back in stock at Best Buy.  It's sold out at 3 Best Buy stores in my location, and Amazon is charging $400 for it, when Best Buy is only charging $300.  The reviews on that player are better than the Sony's and Samsung's.Buy this TV now!  I watched the Super Bowl yesterday, and the colors and clarity are "Mind-Boggling"!  Use the Dynamic function for very bright rooms, Normal function for normal circumstances, and the Movie function during movies.  Then again, there are plenty of options for everyone to use.  Different strokes for different folks!Oh, and by the way, there is absolutely nothing wrong with the audio speaker sound on this awesome TV!  Comparing that sound to a 5.1 or 7.1 surround sound is like comparing...well...the Detroit Lions to the Pittsburgh Steelers.  LOLAnd I have it set up in my family room in a beautiful mahogany entertainment center, so the "Touch-Of-Red" bezel looks sweet!  No need to hook up an entertainment system because that would be too much clutter in that room, according to my wife.  :)  So if you want to rely on the speakers from the unit (without a surround sound system hooked up), then you won't be disappointed.  Besides, there are plenty of adjustments on the remote control to enhance/improve the sound coming from the TV.  You just have to know what you are doing.Danny from Leesburg, VArfkrox44@hotmail.com

Reviews.Title: My first TV purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: J. Gleissner
Reviews.Content: I am almost 40 years old, and this is the first TV that I have purchased in my entire life. No kidding. I've always had hand-me-downs or have gotten gifts, but never researched and purchased my very own TV. This 52" Samsung LCD is replacing a big, heavy, 34" tube television - good riddance!For years, I've been using the internet to research any big purchase, and for electronics, my search usually begins at CNET. I never expected to spend as much as I did, or get a television as large either. Amazon helped me out a bit, by offering a great price, free shipping, and 2-year interest free financing.This is undoubtedly the best television I have ever owned. OK, that's not saying much at all, but it has the best picture I have ever seen on a television. Nothing else comes close. I watch other people buying no-name LCDs or whatever BJs or CostCo happens to have on sale - they're saving a few bucks now, but they don't know what they're missing. I hope to have this TV for the rest of my life!I read many of the reviews here on Amazon regarding this TV. Some of the bad reviews focused on isolated problems with the actual television, but most of them were due to shipping problems and had nothing to do with the television. Don't let that stop you! I ordered the set on a Friday night, and the TV was delivered early Wednesday morning, less than 5 days later. White-glove delivery was included in the purchase, but I wasn't ready to set it up when it arrived and it was pouring outside, so I had them put it down just inside the house. Because of the cold, I waited a few hours before powering the TV on (condensation can form due to the temp change and can cause a short-circuit). The driver had a form for me to initial saying that I did not open the box and inspect the set, and that I had 30 days in which to do so. They told me to hold onto the box for 30 days in case it needed to be returned.A couple other negative comments were about the speakers. I have to say that the sound is pretty good for built-in speakers. Understand this though - I've never owned a sound system of any kind. I want to get a system of some kind, along with a Blu-Ray player, but I'm in no rush.Out of the box, the picture was pretty amazing. I found some picture setting/adjustment recommendations on CNET and on AVSforums and I've only begun trying to tweak the picture. You can play with it all day, but take notes on what you do & don't like. If it gets all crazy, it only takes a second to reset the picture - nice!Be sure to order a HDMI cable right away. Don't buy a "monster" cable for $100. A $2 cable on Amazon is probably enough. I splurged on a $10 cable and it works great! If you wait till the TV arrives, you'll be stuck paying at least $40 from any of the local stores for a basic HDMI cable - a total rip-off!If you don't already have an HD box from your cable provider, get one before the TV arrives. You'll hate yourself if you have to watch "regular" television on this beauty! My cable provider sent me a new HD box via FedEx after I saw on their website that they'll ship it directly to me. I used the component cables they included with the set-top-box to hook up my old DVD player - thanks cable guy!

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV  -  After owning it for 3 days!
Reviews.Author: M. Hebbar
Reviews.Content: After I planned to buy an LCD TV, I did lot of research and finally the selection was between Sony 52'' XBR and Samsung LN52A650. However on further analysis, I found that LN52A650 TV was almost equal to Sony in all aspect and is the best value for the money. One option I liked was that this TV has an Optical digital Audio output which I think is really cool when using audio receiver. However the TV outputs 5.1 channel audio only while using  ON-AIR (antenna) signal. If the source is digital (dvd, cable) the out put is just 2 channel stereo.Amazon had the best deals on this TV compared to any other reliable retailers. They shipped the TV the very next day. I was notified that the TV has been shipped via Pilot shipping service.This is where things started changing.I called Pilot after 3 days to check on the package and they informed that they will be delivering it on Monday and they will be sending two guys since it is a white glove service. Even then, I planned to be at home during delivery and that turned out to be a very good decision. Even after confirmation, they sent only one guy for delivery. I had to help him to lift the 109 lb package. Secondly, I saw a huge hole on the box at the bottom right corner and gashes on the sides. My initial thought was that the LCD must have been damaged. There were couple of holes even on the inside cover. However I couldn't notice any damage/scratches on the panel. Since it was cold outside, he suggested me that I  wait for at least 4 hours before switching on the TV.That was the longest four hours I have spent for quiet sometime now. When I finally switched on the TV, I simply couldn't believe the amazing HD pictures. Both I and my wife were blown over by the clarity and the richness of the picture. If you are a fense sitter, I would suggest you buy this TV in a heart beat. Definitely worth the money.However I did notice scratches on the stand and the bezel. I called Amazon (1-866 423-5355) about this and they promptly offered 1) to replace the TV or 2) Discount on the sale price.Even though there were some incidents, I would definitely buy from Amazon. They have a very friendly CSR and they tend to take care of issues very quickly.AddOn: I am planning to buy the 5 yrs extended service warranty from samsung again on Amazon. I think it is better to have such an insurance on such a large investment. When I called samsung about the service, they said that it is in-home service for all TV's above 32''.

The picture was a live HD sports transmission..as close to a no compression source as you can get.Result? I set them both up to match as closely as possible, but the Sony picture is just fractionally cleaner/crisper than the Samsung. (I should tell you I have spent the better part of twenty years working on film to tape digital tv post production, and I know artefacts!)The Samsung is great- but you get what you pay for. The Sony isn't thirty percent better- even though it was thirty percent more costly- but if you want the very best- no expense spared- its still the Sony

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL TV, EXTREMELY POOR WHITE GLOVE DELIVERY!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sandy1323
Reviews.Content: I am extremely pleased with this television, the picture is beautiful and it is exactly what I've been looking for!!  Unfortunately, my happiness with this product has been tainted by the extremely poor supposed "White Glove Delivery"!  I read other reviews before I ordered the tv and some people seem to have had wonderful experiences; whereas, mine was quite the opposite and my son's was even worse!!  My husband had to help the delivery man carry in the television (I don't know what he would have done if my husband wasn't able to help him), I asked about it and he said the person who usually works with him called in sick.  Isn't it amazing that the same delivery person came to my son's home this morning by himself (again had to be helped bring the tv in the house) and then left--DID NOT EVEN OPEN THE BOX, PLUG IT IN OR EVEN TAKE AWAY THE BOX!!!  How can Amazon advertise "White Glove Delivery" and list what it entails and then let situations like this occur.  They were made aware of the problems, and the only answer given was to write a poor review.  I would think that Amazon would be a little more concerned about misrepresenting facts on their site--what they describe as White Glove Delivery certainly were misleading for my son and myself.  I am very disappointed in the delivery service and I believe it is Amazon's responsibility to do something about it, or they should not advertise something that is not happening!!!

Reviews.Title: Pricing Keeps Changing
Reviews.Author: Jim "Concerned Buyer"
Reviews.Content: I haven't purchased this item yet Samsung(LN52A650, LN52A750, LN52A850, LN52A860 or LN55A950), because every time I look at the pricing it changes on Amazon. I noticed that the price went down several times each day as the "White Glove Delivery" was not available after Christmas and shortly before New Years. Now Amazon is offering the "White Glove Delivery" again after New Years and the price keeps going up every day. What's up with the pricing increase and decrease. Do you think you are going to sell more TV's this way?I as I see it, the product looks great, the reviews are great but one thing that I don't understand is why the manufacture doesn't offer a longer warrenty. 1 year is not long, especially when you are spending $1,500 or more for a TV. Who wants the power supply go out or some other problem go wrong with the TV after 1 year? Then you have to make arrangements with a TV repair shop to come out to the house or take your TV into the shop, pay a minimum of $200 or more to get it fixed and only have a 3 month warrenty. I just don't understand.I have an old 27" Sony TV that still works and it's over 20 years old. Is it because most of the TV's are made in China? Can someone speak to this? I don't want to through good money after bad merchandise....

Reviews.Title: Consider a plasma -- Particularly a Panasonic G10
Reviews.Author: Walker Donald Kerr "Grandon"
Reviews.Content: This is an edit of the review I posted about eight months ago. At that time, because of the Consumer Reports rating and the customer reviews in this thread, I had determined that this is the HDTV I wanted. Since I was delayed in my ability to go forward I had planty of time to look at other threads and, more important, to observe the HDTV's in the homes of family and friends.Because of this I ended up deciding that I wanted to look at plasmas. The reviews alerted me to the facts that plasma sets are at a disadvantage in brightly lit stores, since all sets -- LCD's and Plasmas alike -- have to be set in a vivid mode to attract our attention. In other words, the settings have to be "bigger than life" to be in the running.Since the very vivid settings on the LCD's is even more vivid than the plasmas, they tend to get all of the attention.The comments in the blogs that swayed me were the ones that referred to the more realistic, life-like pix the better plasmas offerred. As I observed the LCS's of friends, I ended up agreeing with the ones who had written that movies, particularly, played on an LCD had a cartoonish look -- unreal.I became more and more interested in looking into plasmas and ended up focusing on the Panasonic G10. I stumbled on this thread[...]which is now over 200 pages long. I finally found a store that had one that was hooked up to a pretty good program source. I became convinced that this was the one that I wanted. I have now had the 50" G10 for six weeks or so and I do not believe I have ever seen a TV with better PQ. (The possible exception is the Pioneer Kuro. Since I have not seen them side by side I can not be sure. Certainly both or outstandig. Since the Kuro costs over twice as much I can say without qualification that, unless money is no object at all that the G10 is the definite choice.I bought my set from Amazon Warehouse, where the price fluctuates even more wildly that the regular Amazon listings. I figured that, for around a thousand dollars that, with the 30 day return privilege I had everything to gain and little to lose. The reviews I had stumbled across that were uniformly positive helped make my decision.I was overwhelmed. Everything was so much better than I was led to believe from the Amazon Warehouse listing. The delivery time was about a week, the delivery was white gloves -- perfect in every respect -- with the TV assembled on its base and placed into the armoire that I had prepared for it -- before the delivery man left.The TV was absolutely new. Although it was an "opened box" offering, I don't think the set had ever been out of the box. The set still had the protective covering on the bezel. Perfect in every way.This is probably the best thought out best purchse I have ever made. While it will not be right for everyone I can assure you there are a vast number of people who buy another brand or another model who would have been happier with a Panny G10.By the way, the Panny successors -- the V10 and the V15 -- are basically the same, as I understand it. The lesser Pannys -- like the S1 -- are not as good as the G10, G15 and V10.I hope this helps your decision making process.

Reviews.Title: can not add a channel when using an aerial antenna
Reviews.Author: Steven W. Tebeau
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great. I am disappointed in that once you set up your channels you can not add a channel. This will affect you the most if you have an aerial antenna and recieve your broadcast over the air. I scanned my channels in with my antenna facing the west, which allowed me to receive most of my digital channels. However, there are two digital channels that did not come in because they face the south. The TV does not allow me to keep my existing channel base, then rotate my antenna to the south and add the two channels that I want to view. The solution is to either add another antenna or re-scan the channels.It is surprising that the Samsung engineers did not think of this. I bought a $60 Zennith digital converter box for my other TV and I can add channels!!!Wow, what an oversight!!!! Huge disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Touch of Color plastic bezel ruins otherwise good TV
Reviews.Author: M. Storms
Reviews.Content: The Touch of Color plastic bezel is made of such soft plastic that it is impossible not to scratch. No matter how carefully you try to protect the plastic, any attempt to dust or clean the bezel results in fine scratches and eventually a white haze. What's worse, any lights in the room catch the hazy scratches and cause horrible, glaring reflections. I called Samsung technical support twice about this problem, and all they said was "we don't warrant against physical damage."It's a shame, because the quality of the picture is very good. But you can't watch the picture because your view is contantly distracted by the glare from the bezel.My advice is to spend your money on an LCD with a more traditional metal or solid black frame.

Reviews.Title: A good LCD . . . a few problems.
Reviews.Author: Jaymis
Reviews.Content: Although this is not directly related to the performance of the product; it was part of the selling point through Amazon.  I'm referring to the so called white glove service.  It seems when it was time for my Samsung to be delivered, absolutely none of the advertising points were followed.  To be more precise, I did not receive an advance notification for the delivery, it just arrived without any prior notice, only a knock on the door (I was in the shower).  Only one individual arrived and then implied that he'd need help moving the package, he originally only wanted to drop it off (in my garage) and leave, he refused to check the TV by plugging it in, saying he was only doing what he was told.  Of course I contacted the original shipper and he indicated that procedure was not followed (Hmmmm . . .I'm wondering who sent one individual?).  Anyway . . .I contacted Amazon and they basically indicated that was not normal and they would pass on my complaint.  I guess that was suppose to appease me.Ok . . . as far as the TV itself.  I received the Samsung before Direct TV installed my HD package.  I have always had an additional over the air antenna which I used for locals in the event of a satellite failure, so I thought I'd try it to see how local HD was.  The HD image that I received was impressive.Another thing I'd like to mention is that Samsung has some features that they advertise as cutting edge, which I really question.  The DNIe which is suppose to be cool appears to be nothing more than the picture turned on to vivid with most features turned to high . . . go figure.  Is it worth the additional bucks . . .probably not.The remote is another story.  It simply sucks.  It has one of those wheels like an ipod and it seemed I was always doing a function more than once.  I have several items attached to my home theatre and when I go to source to change functions the remote invariably starts another function that was not intended due to the wheel sensitivity.  Most of the menu items that you'd use has an extend feature which you have to hit the enter button.  Well, if you inadvertently move the wheel which is extremely sensitive to touch, you wind up either canceling what you were about to do or find yourself in another unrelated feature.  Anyone that is satisfied with this remote has simply never experienced one that works well, such as the MX-500 which is older technology but is still available and can control up to ten devices and has a better range than most remotes.  I transferred the functions to a MX-500 and was a happy camper again.The frame edge and other plastic parts seem to be made of a material which can be scratched by a fly landing harder than normal (ok, an exaggeration).  When dust collects, which it will in time and you make an attempt to dust, it will scratch the surface.  I realize they give you a cloth but it really makes little difference.Bottom line. . . . most people that make this purchase will ohhh and ahhh, however I'm being realistic.  I have no idea if other tv's have these shortcomings because most people wouldn't admit it if they did, instead they like to convince themselves they made a smart purchase.  The television is ok . . .probably better than most but certainly not without faults.  Would I buy the same unit again knowing what I know?  I'll let you know in about 3 years.  By the way, I bought the Samsung 1500 DVD player and it has never worked properly, even though the company sent me two firmware upgrades, which it simply spit out.  Sometimes it works . . . . sometimes not.  Depends on the barometric pressure I guess.  Anyway, I'll be sending it back soon and would suggest that people shy away from this product for a while.  It needs a bit of work.

The delivery people said they would be here between 8am - 12pm but didn't show until 3pm. Reviews.Title: Samsung Customer Service Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Omar Londono
Reviews.Content: Great HD TV, but I enjoyed it for only 3 weeks.  Unfortunately I had an accident that broke my TV Screen.  I called Samsung Customer Service looking for a way to repair my brand new TV.  After several calls they finally set up an appointment for a technician to come to my place to look the damage.  Not only the technician came 2 days later of what I was promised, but he told me that to fix the unit would cost me around $2,500.  I got the TV for only $2,000.  Samsung did not give me any other options, but to buy a new TV set since the damage was caused by me.  I understand that the insurance policy would not cover those kind of damages, but come on!!!!, how come a TV reparation will cost more than a Brand New TV.  Instead of repairing the Samsung TV for $2,500, I put $100 more and I bought a New Sony XBR6 and it's incredible.  Don't get me wrong, Samsung has great products, but its customer service sucks!

Reviews.Title: Screen flickers in the demo with blue-ray so it gave me a headache
Reviews.Author: Happy r/c
Reviews.Content: Picture contrast was great but the screen flickers so this gave me a headache.  In contrast, the Sony 120Hz model did not flicker so  I got the Sony instead and no headaches.  Sony's vivid picture mode makes the contrast just as good as the Samsung but I also get Sony reliability.  I ordered 2 Samsungs LCDs (different model) and 2 Sonys at work and the Sonys have been flawless for a year and half now whereas one of the Samsung's analog tuner had picture but no audio from day 1 and Samsung tech had to come out and replace the motherboard.  On a different 32" Samsung LCD, the picture would go off after a second or two of staying on and it turned out that the power supply was bad... part costs $200 and labor costs $200... geez, a new tv costs about $600!Before this, I also bought a Vizio brand LCD tv and hooked it up to my DVD player using HDMI but I got picture and no sound; when I hooked up the DVD player to the SONY, both the picture and sound were fine so the Vizio was not reliable and if you didn't hook up using HDMI you would never know until it's too late to return it.  By the way, Vizio tvs are made by LG.

Reviews.Title: Scratches on bezel
Reviews.Author: Mary E. Miller
Reviews.Content: I absolutely hate this tv.  At first I loved the red bezel..until I caught a glimpse of it with light shining on it.  It is all scratched looking.  If you have this tv...DO NOT rub your finger, or anything else for that matter across the bezel.  Not even a micro fiber cloth...because if you do...tiny hair like scratches will appear and you will never get rid of them.  Just a light touch with your finger will create more scratches.  I called Samsung about this and found numerous complaints on the internet.  They will do nothing about it.  I have also heard of some bezels separating from the tv.  I curse the day I bought this thing and would give anything to get rid of it.

Reviews.Title: Be Careful with Samsung 52" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: John M. Howard
Reviews.Content: It now is clear that this product has a firmware problem that keeps turning the set on and off every few seconds. It will be 13 days before the one technician on Florida's west coast will be at our home. My questions are 1) Why is Amazon shipping a product on 4/29/08 with a known defect; and 2) Isn't there a need for better service when a problem develops, or is service within two weeks an acceptable length of time?For us, we fault the product, Amazon for shipping it without the firmware update, and the lousy service. Our "new" TV lasted just 20 minutes.
